Job Description:
- Develop and implement digital marketing strategies to increase brand awareness, drive traffic, and generate leads/sales.
- Create content strategies for social medias (follow company’ guideline).
- Manage all digital marketing channels, including website, social media, email marketing, SEO/SEM, and online advertising.
- Analyze digital marketing performance metrics and KPIs to measure the effectiveness of campaigns and identify areas for improvement.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in digital marketing, and incorporate new tools and techniques into our strategies.
- Collaborate with other departments (e.g., sales, product development) to ensure alignment and integration of digital marketing initiatives with overall business goals.
Manage digital marketing budgets and allocate resources effectively to maximize ROI.
- Monitor industry trends and competitor activities to identify opportunities and threats.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
- 2+ years of experience in digital marketing, with a proven track record of success in developing and executing digital marketing strategies.
- Strong leadership skills, with the ability to motivate and inspire a team to achieve goals.
- In-depth knowledge of digital marketing channels and tools, including social media platforms, Google Analytics, SEO/SEM, email marketing software, etc.
- Excellent analytical skills, with the ability to interpret data and draw actionable insights.
- Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.
- Creative idea to make poster and video is advantage

Job Description:

- Manage marketing budget for all staffing, resources, and capital purchases.

- Build product development strategies through market insight and market competition

- Exception written and verbal communication skills

- Solid business acumen, management, and problem-solving skills

Company Profile:
Goden Farm Company was established in 2000, specializing in manufacturing products such as syrups, smoothies, fruit jams, pasta sauces, pastas, toppings,... to bring consumers international foods. , produced from Vietnamese vegetables and fruits with modern technology from the US. With the criterion of "Nutritional - Safe - Convenient", Golden Farm's products have quickly become popular with many customers and are available in supermarkets, restaurants, and hotels nationwide.

Golden Farm Company is certified with ISO 22000:2005 (International Food Safety and Hygiene) standard, with modern production technology to bring consumers the best products from clean vegetables, protect health and contribute to Simplify life for every family.

Job Description:
•	Ensure that all customer issues relating to customer service, service recovery and credit control are coordinated and managed through the relevant DHL departments.
•	Meet regularly with the Sales management to evaluate the personal sales plan/strategy so as to ensure that the required revenue and shipment results can be achieved.
•	Develop a working relationship with the relevant support departments e.g. Operations, to ensure they are kept up to date with all issues relating to customers. 
•	Build a strong client relationship to ensure that the account performs and grows to its maximum potential, reducing attrition rate and minimizing opportunities for competitors to gain business.
•	Continually develop knowledge of DHL products/services and general commercial awareness in order to provide the best possible solutions to the customers.
•	Control all documentation and data relating to customer visits, agreements and terms of reference to ensure that customer information is maintained accurately in the customer database.
•	Analyze and monitor customer data to measure success and identify fluctuations/trends so as to decide on the relevant actions to be taken.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or other related field is required. 
•	Fluent in speaking, reading, and writing in English is required.
•	Good in speaking, reading, and writing Chinese Mandarin will be an advantage. 
•	Good Computer Skills: MS Word, Excel, Power Point, Internet & Email.
•	1 to 2 years of related work experience is required. 
•	Experience in working with logistic industry will be an advantage.

Shall you require more information, please contact 023 992 618 (Ext: 814 & 822). Please note that only short listed candidates will be notified for interview appointment.

Job Description:
•	Accept and register bookings for DHL services 
•	Offer alternatives to customers and seize upselling and cross-selling opportunity of valued added services (e.g. Sales Leads, shipment insurance) during interaction with customer.
•	Respond to customer consistently and confidently by providing accurate information in all areas such as custom requirements, transit time and prices. 
•	Enhance service experience in DHL by exercising professionalism and empathy when dealing with each individual customer’s varying needs and demands. 
•	Liaise with Operations Department and other departments on quick and efficient solution of customer issues and queries. 
•	Highlight areas for improvement with suggested solutions to improve DHL’s procedures, technology and service to positively enhance customer’s experience with DHL.
•	Adhere to global CS procedures while maintaining discretion to exercise flexibility to customers’ needs within reasonable limits in consultation with CS supervisors and managers. 
•	Assist the supervisors (if applicable) to carry out relevant CS orientation / training programs for new or existing CS staff.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor degree in Business, Marketing, Communications, or related field is required. 
•	Fluent in Speaking/Reading/Writing English is required. 
•	Fluent in Speaking/Reading/Writing Khmer is required
•	Good communication in Mandarin Chinese is an advantage. 
•	Be confident, friendly, and people-oriented.

Job Description:
1)	Manage recruitment to ensure that on time with efficiency as per business required
2)	Planning, organizing, and controlling the activities and actions of the HR department. 
3)	Develop and implement strategies, goals, and policies for the HR/Admin department ensuring they support the overall company-wide objectives and goals.
4)	Coordinate the onboarding and orientation of new employees ensuring the Hiring Manager has the necessary information to provide the best introduction for all new employees.
5)	Manage and coordinate the performance development process and develop supportive procedures for the provision of relevant and useful feedback between Managers and employees and the broader team.
6)	Recommending new policies, approaches, and procedures
7)	Perform other administrative tasks such as payroll, staff attendance, staff disciplinary action, staff appraisal, Staff movement, staff safety and fine out staff problems.
8)	Develop contract, agreement and others necessary document
9)	Make monthly expense budget and record all expense incurred
10)	Motivate and train staff, Issue warning letter,
11)	Manage Security, Office Hygiene, and safety
12)	Prepare report for management (monthly Employee Master List, Monthly Attendance Report, Monthly Department Expense, Daily Weekly Monthly Recruitment Report, Test Ride List Movement, Laptop & Computer List Movement, Leave management list, and yearly staff turnover).
13)	Other tasks assigned by BOD
Job Requirement:
1)	Bachelor Degree in Business Administration 
2)	6 years’ experience in HR field
3)	Excellent verbal and written communication skills both English and Khmer
4)	Excellent interpersonal, negotiation, and conflict resolution skills.
5)	Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.
6)	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
7)	Ability to prioritize tasks and to delegate them when appropriate.
8)	Ability to act with integrity, professionalism, and confidentiality.

Job Description:
•	Prepares medications by reviewing and interpreting physician orders 
•	Serves customers by preparing medications, counseling customers on drug therapies  
•	Dispense by prescriptions and illness  
•	Checking operating daily job such as 4P, display, POP, refill
•	Preparing Prescription medicines-OTC, Skin care, Health Care… by categories 
•	Check fulfills and display products at pharmacy area and SSM 
•	Checking cleaning selling area, backroom and working place follow by Clean & Safe and 5S 
•	Checking expiry products and alert to team to preparing and display follow by FIFO/FEFO procedure and report to Group manager
•	Purchase order, follow up with ordering plan.
•	Controlling PA0, high loss item and report to Group manager 
•	Preparing sale report and meeting (proxy group manager) with Line/Proxy as required 
•	Meeting daily-weekly-monthly with Line/Proxy as required and report to Group manager 
•	Perform other tasks assigned by Line manager/Proxy
•	Complete training course from company and Pharmacy skill as required
•	Maintaining control over delivering, stocking and labeling medicine and other products 
•	Receiving products at MMD and arrange stock both in selling area and in Backroom
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor Degree in Pharmacy (fresh graduate are encouraged to apply)
• Good knowledge of health and beauty products, enjoy working with customer and developing healthy relationship.
• Positive attitude individual and passionate. 
• At least 1 year experience retail in pharmacy 
• Good in communication, interpersonal skill and good time management. 
• Good Khmer and English both verbal and written.
• Able to work rotate weekend or holiday.

Job Description:
• Assist the Head of Internal Audit in order to implement the audit plan for the internal audit Department.
• Works with business and support units to identify risks and their mitigation, including the review of systems establish to determine whether they are in compliance with plans, internal policies and procedures, and external regulations/laws which could have a significant impact on operations and reports.
• Ensuring the audit programs and flowcharts are prepared and updated.
• Work with the independent departments in order to provide internal control ratings to respective branches/departments.
• Plans, organizes, and prepares materials for the AC meetings and follows up on matters arising.
• Supervises audit work during audit assignments.
• Reviews audit reports and working papers to ensure proper documentation and work done.
• Ensures that the quality programs established are carried out within the department.
• Conduct an investigation on the suspected fraudulent activities and other irregularities, if required, and notify the result to Head of Internal Audit.
• Control testing and provides recommendations for improvement of business functions (Value added)
• Ensure recommendations are clearly presented and agreed by Management and audit report is issued promptly.
• Follow-up on outstanding audit recommendations and perform validation of
• implemented recommendations.
• Provide on-the- job training to the IA team.
• Coordinates coverage with the external auditors, including the areas of concerns.
• Carries out any other responsibilities/tasks as assigned by the Head of Internal Audit.
Job Requirement:
• At least 2-4 years’ experiences in banking industry
• Strong knowledge and experience of remittances and bank reconciliation
• Professional skill in Microsoft Excel and Advanced Excel is a plus.
• Initiative, flexible and good interpersonal skills
• Good in, communicating writing and speaking English skills
• Honesty, high commitment, hard-working and able to work under pressure.

** Remunerations:
• Competitive salary
• Lunch Allowance
• Annual Bonus, Khmer New Year& Pchum Ben
• Insurance, Uniform
• Other Bonuses...

How to apply:
Email : hr@dgbbank.com.kh, and apply to the following address: No 689B, Kampucheakrom Blvd, Sangkat Teuk Laak I, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. Tel: 023 999 990 
Only short-listed candidates will be invited for interview.
Company Profile: DGB Bank is a licensed commercial bank in Cambodia and a member of DGB Financial Group in Korea listed on Korea Stock Exchange. Candidates meeting the following conditions are kindly invited for interview to join the Bank.

• Prepares financial report for CIFRS
• Prepares regulatory reports.
• Prepares monthly forecasting and annual budget
• Review monthly and annually tax declaration and update tax information
• Assists Manager to deal with authority regarding tax issues
• Coordinates with internal and external auditors

• Problem solving skill

Job Description:
• Preparing new policies and guidelines required by the Regulator/Management of the Bank.
• Initiating to propose and request on New Credit Product; Commercial and Corporate Loan knowledge is a plus.
• Reviewing and amendment all policies and guidelines as per request of management.
• Establishing/amending of loan forms, loan agreement and other important forms to support Loan Team as per requirement of the Bank.
• Conducting internal training of credit policies, guidelines, procedures and loan memos preparation to all related staff who involve in credit granting.
• Cooperating with IT Division, related division and developer to develop all credit reports and loan products in core banking system.
• Preparing of all credit reports, including internal and external reports such as BOD reports, NBC reports, ABC reports, CBC reports and other special reports which
required by the Bank and Regulators.
• Initiating Credit Planning to ensure that the strategic planning and operational planning
align.
• Other tasks which required by the Credit Planning Manager (CPM)/Management of the
Bank.
Job Requirement:

Job Description:
- Formulate and update AML/CTF policies and procedures in light of the latest regulatory requirements and market practices
- Provide advice to frontline and other relevant units on AML related matters
- Coordinate and manage assigned AML/CTF projects
- Review Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD) cases and relevant KYC documents submitted by business
- Undertake risk assessment on the Bank’s new product offering from AML/CTF perspective
- Deliver AML/CTF trainings and maintain the Bank’s AML/CFT training plan
- Develop and update KYC and KYE checklist.
- Conducts periodic Enhanced Due Diligence reviews of higher risk customers, including politically exposed persons (and financial institutions and products if need be).
- Review customer risk profiles and perform enhanced due diligence (EDD) and customer updates as per the EDD framework or FI’s risk assessment.
- Review customer transactions to detect and deter money laundering and terrorist financing and, if needed, file Suspicious Transaction Reports (STR) as per the transaction monitoring procedure.
- Review sanction screening alerts on sanctioned individual and entities, countries, politically exposed persons and negative news to determine if it involves DGB customer and apply measures as per the sanction alert screening procedure.
- Developing and overseeing control systems to prevent or deal with violations of legal Guideline and in internal policies.
- Prepare the cash transaction report (CTR) and submit to CAFIU on time.
- Prepare the suspicious transaction report (STR) and submit to CAFIU on time.
- Provide technical support and control of AML/CFT compliance to the Bank.
- Review KYE of the Bank’s employees.
- Prepare monthly KYC and KYE report to Head of Compliance on time.
- Perform ad-hoc tasks as assigned from time to time
- Other Tasks assigned by Manager.
Job Requirement:
- Degree or above in Law, Risk Management, Business Administration or related disciplines, preferably with relevant qualification.
- At least 3 years of experience in Compliance, AML/CFT in Banking and Financial Institution at least 1 years at a management level,
- Knowledge of banking and financial institution
- Good Team player with ability to work effectively across all functions.
- Excellent interpersonal skill
- Strong Negotiation skill
- Honestly
- Certificated compliance professional is a plus.

* Remunerations:
- Competitive salary
- Lunch Allowance
- Annual Bonus, Khmer New Year& Pchum Ben
- Insurance, Uniform
- Other Bonuses...

Job Description:

 Organises and facilitates the room making process

 Check on room status such as room occupied, vacancy, dirty, sleep out room out of service/room out order report as daily/Protel system.

 Performing on room inventory count as monthly

Company Profile:
Hongkong Land is a major listed property investment, management and development group. Founded in 1889, Hongkong Land’s business is built on excellence, integrity and
partnership.

The Group owns and manages more than 850,000 sq. m. of prime office and luxury retail property in key Asian cities, principally in Hong Kong, Singapore, Beijing and Jakarta. Its properties attract the world’s foremost companies and luxury brands.

The Group’s Central Hong Kong portfolio represents some 450,000 sq. m. of prime property. It has a further 165,000 sq. m. of prestigious office space in Singapore mainly held through joint ventures, a luxury retail centre at Wangfujing in Beijing, and a 50% interest in a leading office complex in Central Jakarta. The Group also has a number of high quality residential, commercial and mixed-use projects under development in cities across Greater China and Southeast Asia. In Singapore, its subsidiary, MCL Land, is a well-established residential developer.
Hongkong Land Holdings Limited is incorporated in Bermuda and has a standard listing on the London Stock Exchange, with secondary listings in Bermuda and Singapore. The
Group’s assets and investments are managed from Hong Kong by Hongkong Land Limited.
Hongkong Land is a member of the Jardine Matheson Group.

Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. Job Description:
• Monitor the daily income, expenditure and stock.
• Review all the required GR/IR information are being recorded into accounting system (QuickBooks).
• Supervise and ensure proper functioning of all inventory controls.
• Control company operation and verify data in accounting system.
• Prepare budgeting reports and forecast revenues.
• Supervise cash disbursements by verifying check amounts against invoices with the following cash or bank policies authorization by MD.
• Assisting staff members in the preparation of daily, monthly and quarterly accounting reports.
• Supervise bank reconciliations and general ledger accounts.
• Supervise and assist accounts receivable team in collecting payments.
• Prepare daily, monthly and annual accounting reports to Finance Manager.
• Supervise the daily accounting transactions including bank reconciliation, accounts payable, accounts receivable, accounts stock and general ledger.
• Deal with team work related to accounting policy and procedure.
• Produce financial statement with accurate and up to date.
• Cash Flow projection.
• Oversee all accounting bookkeeping and approve.
• Oversee AR &AP reconciliation.
• Managed Monthly & yearly closing.
• Oversee Monthly tax declaration and yearly Tax.
• Ensure payrolls are accurate and on schedule.
• Oversee invoicing schedule and deadlines.
• Build strong relationships with banks, suppliers, clients and accountants.
• Weekly report A/R and A/P / Weekly Collection plan.
• Monthly stock count and stock closing.
• Purchasing Material by Bill of quantity.
• Prepare payment request by weekly.
• Prepare payment vouchers and closing monthly & yearly financial reports.
• Record Account receivable, Account payable and Prepare payment.
• Closing project (Record income and expense by job).
• Identify and record necessary tax payments and vouchers.
• Monitor and review accounting reports for accuracy and completeness.
Job Requirement:
• Experiences in logistics field
• Bachelor’s or master’s degree in accounting, or finance.
• Minimum 3-5 years’ experience in accounting/finance.
• Experience with financial reporting requirements.
• Ability to manage multiple projects at one time and meet deadlines.
• Ability to work well in a team environment.
• Able to work under pressure.
• Good at writing/speaking/listening English (Chinese is optional).
• Good knowledge of MS Office.
• Be able to go on field at provinces.

• Others.

position: អនុប្រធានតំបន់ (ភេទប្រុស ) ប្រចាំ ខេត្តកោះកុង និង កំពង់ធំ ($300+)
Job Description:
១.ការងារគ្រប់គ្រង៖
- ជួយសម្រួលការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃជាមួយប្រធានតំបន់។
- តាមដាន និងត្រួតពិនិត្យការអនុវត្តការងារនៅមូលដ្ឋានក្នុងតំបន់ឲ្យដំណើរការដោយរលូន។
- គ្រប់គ្រងបុគ្គលិកក្រោមបង្គាប់ឲ្យមានវិន័យការងារល្អ រួមមានវត្តមានការងារ ការពង្រឹង និងជំរុញការអនុវត្តការងារ ការលើកទឹកចិត្ត ការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហានានា។
- សហការជាមួយផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ទាំងនៅថ្នាក់មូលដ្ឋាន និងការិយាល័យកណ្តាលភ្នំពេញ ដើម្បីអនុវត្តសកម្មភាពការងារនៅមូលដ្ឋានរបស់ខ្លួន ឲ្យសម្រេចបានទៅតាមផែនការដែលបានគ្រោងទុក។
- ការអនុវត្តការងារ និងការប្រឈមមុខការងារផ្សេងៗជាមួយការិយាល័យកណ្តាលភ្នំពេញ។
- គ្រប់គ្រង និងតាមដានការប្រើប្រាស់ទឹក ភ្លើងដោយធ្វើការណែនាំដល់បុគ្គលិកយាមផ្ទះ ដើម្បីឲ្យប្រើប្រាស់ប្រកបដោយការសន្សំសំចៃខ្ពស់បំផុត ត្រួតពិនិត្យបណ្តាញទឹក និងរៀបចំវិកយបត្រចំណាយទឹកភ្លើងប្រចាំខែផ្ញើមកកាន់ការិយាល័យរដ្ឋបាល និងធនធានមនុស្សឲ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។
- ធ្វើការជាមួយបុគ្គលិកយាមផ្ទះនៅក្នុងតំបន់របស់ខ្លួន សិក្សាពីតម្រូវការ រៀបចំសំណើទិញសម្ភារប្រចាំខែ ផ្ញើមកកាន់ការិយាល័យរដ្ឋបាលឲ្យទាន់ពេលវេលាដែលបានកំណត់។

២.ការងារបច្ចេកទេស៖
- ធ្វើការយ៉ាងជិតស្និតជាមួយបុគ្គលិកយាមផ្ទះ ត្រូវប្រាកដថាបរិស្ថាននៅជុំវិញផ្ទះ មានបរិយាកាសល្អស្របតាមការណែនាំរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។
- សម្របសម្រួល និងផ្តល់វិធានការដល់អ្នកយាមផ្ទះនៅតាមតំបន់ដែលកំណត់ដោយកក្រុមហ៊ុន។
- គ្រប់គ្រង និងថែរក្សាទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុននៅក្នុងតំបន់របស់ខ្លួន ព្រមទាំងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែផ្ញើជូនការិយាល័យកណ្តាលភ្នំពេញ។
- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ការសកម្មភាពប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ និងប្រចាំខែជូនប្រធានផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេស និងថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ។
- ប្រមូលព័ត៌មានពីមូលដ្ឋានអំពីភាពរីកចម្រើនរបស់ផ្ទះបញ្ចូលទិន្ន័យក្នុងតារាងតាមដានប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ ឬប្រចាំខែជូនថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ ។
- ត្រូវដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាប្រព័ន្ធសំឡេង និងបច្ចេកទេសនានានៃផ្ទះក្នុងតំបន់ដែលទទួលខុសត្រូវ។
- តាមដានការងារមូលដ្ឋានឬតំបន់ទទួលខុសត្រូវ អោយបានទៀងទាត់ និងត្រួតពិនិត្យលើគុណភាពនៃការថែទាំបរិស្ថានទាំងខាងក្នុង និងខាងក្រៅផ្ទះ ។
- ចូលរួមការពារកុំឯឱ្យសត្វដែលជាសត្រូវ មកវាយលុកលើសត្វ ជាមួយអ្នកយាមផ្ទះ។
- ត្រូវដឹងអំពីបញ្ហាដែលបង្កការរំខានដល់ការរស់នៅរបស់សត្វ ។
- មានឆន្ទះក្នុងការរៀនសូត្របន្ថែម និងស្វែងយល់អំពីស្ថានភាពរស់នៅរបស់សត្វ និងបច្ចេកទេសនានា។
- ផ្តល់ការកសាងសមត្ថភាពដល់អ្នកយាមផ្ទះ ប្រកបដោយស្មារតីសហការល្អ។
- ការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតក្រោយការបង្គាប់ការរបស់ប្រធានផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេស ។

៣.ការងារហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ៖
- ត្រូវមានការកត់ត្រារាល់ការទទួលប្រាក់ពីការិយាល័យកណ្តាលភ្នំពេញ និងការប្រគល់ប្រាក់ឲ្យក្រុមការងារនៅមូលដ្ឋាន។
- គ្រប់គ្រងការចំណាយទូទៅនៅមូលដ្ឋានប្រកបដោយគណនេយ្យភាព និងមានតម្លាភាព។
- រាល់ការចំណាយនានាត្រូវមានវិក្កយបត្រ រាល់វិក្កយបត្រចំណាយត្រូវបំពេញព័ត៌មានឲ្យបានពេញលេញ និងមានសុក្រឹតភាពខ្ពស់។
- រៀបចំឯកសារទូទាត់ចំណាយប្រចាំខែជាមួយផ្នែកគណនេយ្យឲ្យទាន់ពេលវេលាដែលបានកំណត់។
Job Requirement:
តំរូវការចំណេះដឹង និងជំនាញ៖
- បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាទុតិយភូមិ ឬ ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ គ្រប់គ្រងទូទៅ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័របាន។
- អាចធ្វើការជាក្រុម និងដឹកនាំមនុស្ស។
- មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងស្មោះត្រង់។
- មានចំណេះដឹងបន្ថែមផ្នែកកសិកម្មកាន់តែប្រសើរ។

អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ៖
- ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំខែ
- ធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល
- ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ពិសេស
- ប្រាក់រង្វាន់ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- ការវាយតម្លៃប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗជាច្រើនទៀត
- ផ្ដល់បទពិសោធន៍ល្អសម្រាប់អ្នកចូលចិត្តផ្នែកកសិកម្ម។

Job Description:
• Prepare letters, reports and other documents
• Manage diary; understanding the importance of key meetings, building flexibility into the diary and anticipating needs
• To organize external visits, meetings and speaking engagements and coordinate briefing and material, and make travel and accommodation arrangements to ensure budget and time management pressures are met
• Prepare letters, reports and other documents
• Review incoming correspondence, distribute and respond accordingly
• Follow up where necessary 
• Reminding the manager/executive of important tasks and deadlines
• Manage and organize administration 
• Ensure correct briefing notes or papers for meetings
• Note take in meetings as and when required
• Provide support for all other administrative tasks as directed
• Attending to meetings in place of the Chairman if necessary
• Remember deadlines and prompt where necessary
• Be able to go provinces 
• Be prepared for field work, overtime and flexible working hours may be required
• All other works that assign by senior assistant/Chairman
Job Requirement:
• Age 27 – 35 years old
• Master/Bachelor Degree in related field
• At least 3-5 years overall professional experiences in related position
• Ability to manage multiple projects at one time and meet deadlines
• Be able to work under pressure and time constraint 
• Ability to work well in a team environment
• Demonstrated ability to plan, organize and prioritize responsibilities in order to consistently meet deadlines
• Good knowledge of MS Office 
• Good at writing/speaking/listening Chinese (English is a plus)

Job Benefits
• Competitive Salary
• Annual Leave
• Special Leave
• Public Holiday
• Annual Bonus
• Rewarding
• Others.

Job Description:
Monitor company’s advertising and promotion and report to management.
- Carry out planned marketing activities efficiently in timely manner.
- Tracking and analyzing competitors’ advertising and promotion.
- Research and gather relevant market information to analyze latest market trend.
- Developing new initiatives continually to bring products brand to scale further heights.
- Establishing good relationships with media, handling press releases as well as 
  managing web initiatives
- Other tasks assigned by managements.
Job Requirement:
Cambodian nationality
- Bachelor Degree in Sales/Marketing or related field.
-  Minimum 1 year of experience in Sales and Marketing, preferred from automotive 
   industry.
-  Must be able to work well with diverse groups of people from various departments
- Strong interpersonal and communication skill.
- Familiar with MS. Office, Photoshop, Illustrator.
Company Profile: KONG NUON GROUP is well known for tire’s product through product durability and high brand image. To develop and expend operation in Cambodia, We are seeking dynamic candidate to fill position as
Contact Info: Contact Information Chea Puthdavann HR Manager 081 78 79 80 / 078 888 910 kng.hr@kongnuongroup.com : No. 219, Road 182, Sangkat Phsar Depo 1 Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 081 78 79 80 / 078 888 910

Job Description: •	Conduct and execute sales activities and marketing initiatives to achieve sales objective.•	Follow up with customers for after provide sales service.•	Planning, arrangement and execute sales events, exhibition and other sales activities.•	Timely reporting on sales activities and sales performance by submitting accurate activity report on a regular basis.•	Build and maintain a good long term customer relationship for the interests of the company.•	High commitment wit clear goals in sales career.•	Responsible and co-operated with the sales team, developing a business plan covering sales & marketing and promoting the Company’s presence throughout Cambodia.•	Promote/sale to potential customers and develop the distributor at province site.•	Maintaining and improving relationships with the customers.•	Handles customer complaints, customer satisfaction surveys.•	Personally, observe the performance of sales & marketing representatives in the field on a regular basis.•	Ensure the targets are realistic and achievable.•	Responsible for obtaining profitable results through the sales team by developing the team through motivation, counseling, skills development and product knowledge development.•	Identifying target markets and developing strategies to communicate with them•	Monitoring and analyzing market trends•	Preparation of weekly sales reports•	Corporate with the sales & marketing team by establishing a system of reports and communications involving sales reports•	To deliver product in time assigned by superior•	Performing other duties assigned by Sale Manger.
Job Requirement: •	At least bachelor degree holder in Sales and Marketing or related field.•	Minimum 1-3 years’ experience in Sales and Marketing.•	Knowledge or work experience in consumer segment is a plus.•	Always maintain professional appearance and promote positive company image.•	Hardworking, self-motivated and results oriented.•	Initiative and able to handle multi tasks.•	High commitment to challenge working in Consumer Market.•	Passionate to meet with people, reliable and self-confident.•	Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, and good in problem solving skill.•	Japanese language is a plus and good abilities in English (read, write, listening and speaking).•	Computer literate, MS office, Internet, and E-mail.[Working Conditions]•	Working Day: Monday to Friday•	Work time: 8:00-17:00 (1hour break)[Other Benefits]•	Commuting Allowance•	Gasoline allowance for sales activity•	Phone allowance•	Insurance (NSSF)•	Seniority•	Bonus•	Monthly staff party•	Annual Leave (18 days/year)•	Good working Environment

job title: Market Research and Data Analyst (Assistant Manager)
position: Market Research and Data Analyst (Assistant Manager)
Job Description:
•	Work on the project planning and collaboration
•	Conduct comprehensive market research, including competitor analysis, consumer segmentation, and trend forecasting.
•	Collect the data from primary and secondary sources and do analysis 
•	Identify and evaluate market opportunities
•	Stay updated on the latest market research techniques, technologies, and best practices
•	Identify and evaluate potential risks and opportunities.
•	Proceed document works, such as preparing questionnaires surveys, contracts
•	Other tasks are assigned by the management.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s degree of Internal Business Management, Economics, or other related filed
•	At least two years working experiences for the related field
•	Have a good command of English language
•	Good organizational skills, problem-solving skills, negotiation skill, etc.
•	Have knowledge of office management software like MS Office
•	Strong teamwork & interpersonal skills, friendly and flexible
•	Be able to organize/manage multi-tasks and work in a fast-paced environment
•	Be able to work with shift schedule (weekend and public holiday shift).
Company Profile:
AEON MALL is the Japan’s Largest Specialist Shopping Mall Developer. We not only develop but also operate over 150 shopping malls throughout Japan and other countries. On expanding retail business across Asia, AEON MALL has opened our third biggest shopping mall in 2022.

Job Description:
• Monitor the daily income, expenditure and stock.
• Review all the required GR/IR information are being recorded into accounting system (QuickBooks).
• Supervise and ensure proper functioning of all inventory controls.
• Control company operation and verify data in accounting system.
• Prepare budgeting reports and forecast revenues.
• Supervise cash disbursements by verifying check amounts against invoices with the following cash or bank policies authorization by MD.
• Assisting staff members in the preparation of daily, monthly and quarterly accounting reports.
• Supervise bank reconciliations and general ledger accounts.
• Supervise and assist accounts receivable team in collecting payments.
• Prepare daily, monthly and annual accounting reports to Finance Manager.
• Supervise the daily accounting transactions including bank reconciliation, accounts payable, accounts receivable, accounts stock and general ledger.
• Deal with team work related to accounting policy and procedure.
• Produce financial statement with accurate and up to date.
• Cash Flow projection.
• Oversee all accounting bookkeeping and approve.
• Oversee AR &AP reconciliation.
• Managed Monthly & yearly closing.
• Oversee Monthly tax declaration and yearly Tax.
• Ensure payrolls are accurate and on schedule.
• Oversee invoicing schedule and deadlines.
• Build strong relationships with banks, suppliers, clients and accountants.
• Weekly report A/R and A/P / Weekly Collection plan.
• Monthly stock count and stock closing.
• Purchasing Material by Bill of quantity.
• Prepare payment request by weekly.
• Prepare payment vouchers and closing monthly & yearly financial reports.
• Record Account receivable, Account payable and Prepare payment.
• Closing project (Record income and expense by job).
• Identify and record necessary tax payments and vouchers.
• Monitor and review accounting reports for accuracy and completeness.
Job Requirement:
• Experiences in logistics field
• Bachelor’s or master’s degree in accounting, or finance.
• Minimum 3-5 years’ experience in accounting/finance.
• Experience with financial reporting requirements.
• Ability to manage multiple projects at one time and meet deadlines.
• Ability to work well in a team environment.
• Able to work under pressure.
• Good at writing/speaking/listening English (Chinese is optional).
• Good knowledge of MS Office.
• Be able to go on field at provinces.

Job Benefits
• Competitive Salary
• Annual Leave
• Special Leave
• Public Holiday
• Annual Bonus
• Rewarding
• Others.

Job Description:
១.ការងារគ្រប់គ្រង៖
- ជួយសម្រួលការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃជាមួយប្រធានតំបន់។
- តាមដាន និងត្រួតពិនិត្យការអនុវត្តការងារនៅមូលដ្ឋានក្នុងតំបន់ឲ្យដំណើរការដោយរលូន។
- គ្រប់គ្រងបុគ្គលិកក្រោមបង្គាប់ឲ្យមានវិន័យការងារល្អ រួមមានវត្តមានការងារ ការពង្រឹង និងជំរុញការអនុវត្តការងារ ការលើកទឹកចិត្ត ការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហានានា។
- សហការជាមួយផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ទាំងនៅថ្នាក់មូលដ្ឋាន និងការិយាល័យកណ្តាលភ្នំពេញ ដើម្បីអនុវត្តសកម្មភាពការងារនៅមូលដ្ឋានរបស់ខ្លួន ឲ្យសម្រេចបានទៅតាមផែនការដែលបានគ្រោងទុក។
- ការអនុវត្តការងារ និងការប្រឈមមុខការងារផ្សេងៗជាមួយការិយាល័យកណ្តាលភ្នំពេញ។
- គ្រប់គ្រង និងតាមដានការប្រើប្រាស់ទឹក ភ្លើងដោយធ្វើការណែនាំដល់បុគ្គលិកយាមផ្ទះ ដើម្បីឲ្យប្រើប្រាស់ប្រកបដោយការសន្សំសំចៃខ្ពស់បំផុត ត្រួតពិនិត្យបណ្តាញទឹក និងរៀបចំវិកយបត្រចំណាយទឹកភ្លើងប្រចាំខែផ្ញើមកកាន់ការិយាល័យរដ្ឋបាល និងធនធានមនុស្សឲ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។
- ធ្វើការជាមួយបុគ្គលិកយាមផ្ទះនៅក្នុងតំបន់របស់ខ្លួន សិក្សាពីតម្រូវការ រៀបចំសំណើទិញសម្ភារប្រចាំខែ ផ្ញើមកកាន់ការិយាល័យរដ្ឋបាលឲ្យទាន់ពេលវេលាដែលបានកំណត់។

២.ការងារបច្ចេកទេស៖
- ធ្វើការយ៉ាងជិតស្និតជាមួយបុគ្គលិកយាមផ្ទះ ត្រូវប្រាកដថាបរិស្ថាននៅជុំវិញផ្ទះ មានបរិយាកាសល្អស្របតាមការណែនាំរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។
- សម្របសម្រួល និងផ្តល់វិធានការដល់អ្នកយាមផ្ទះនៅតាមតំបន់ដែលកំណត់ដោយកក្រុមហ៊ុន។
- គ្រប់គ្រង និងថែរក្សាទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុននៅក្នុងតំបន់របស់ខ្លួន ព្រមទាំងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែផ្ញើជូនការិយាល័យកណ្តាលភ្នំពេញ។
- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ការសកម្មភាពប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ និងប្រចាំខែជូនប្រធានផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេស និងថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ។
- ប្រមូលព័ត៌មានពីមូលដ្ឋានអំពីភាពរីកចម្រើនរបស់ផ្ទះបញ្ចូលទិន្ន័យក្នុងតារាងតាមដានប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ ឬប្រចាំខែជូនថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ ។
- ត្រូវដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាប្រព័ន្ធសំឡេង និងបច្ចេកទេសនានានៃផ្ទះក្នុងតំបន់ដែលទទួលខុសត្រូវ។
- តាមដានការងារមូលដ្ឋានឬតំបន់ទទួលខុសត្រូវ អោយបានទៀងទាត់ និងត្រួតពិនិត្យលើគុណភាពនៃការថែទាំបរិស្ថានទាំងខាងក្នុង និងខាងក្រៅផ្ទះ ។
- ចូលរួមការពារកុំឯឱ្យសត្វដែលជាសត្រូវ មកវាយលុកលើសត្វ ជាមួយអ្នកយាមផ្ទះ។
- ត្រូវដឹងអំពីបញ្ហាដែលបង្កការរំខានដល់ការរស់នៅរបស់សត្វ ។
- មានឆន្ទះក្នុងការរៀនសូត្របន្ថែម និងស្វែងយល់អំពីស្ថានភាពរស់នៅរបស់សត្វ និងបច្ចេកទេសនានា។
- ផ្តល់ការកសាងសមត្ថភាពដល់អ្នកយាមផ្ទះ ប្រកបដោយស្មារតីសហការល្អ។
- ការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតក្រោយការបង្គាប់ការរបស់ប្រធានផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេស ។

៣.ការងារហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ៖
- ត្រូវមានការកត់ត្រារាល់ការទទួលប្រាក់ពីការិយាល័យកណ្តាលភ្នំពេញ និងការប្រគល់ប្រាក់ឲ្យក្រុមការងារនៅមូលដ្ឋាន។
- គ្រប់គ្រងការចំណាយទូទៅនៅមូលដ្ឋានប្រកបដោយគណនេយ្យភាព និងមានតម្លាភាព។
- រាល់ការចំណាយនានាត្រូវមានវិក្កយបត្រ រាល់វិក្កយបត្រចំណាយត្រូវបំពេញព័ត៌មានឲ្យបានពេញលេញ និងមានសុក្រឹតភាពខ្ពស់។
- រៀបចំឯកសារទូទាត់ចំណាយប្រចាំខែជាមួយផ្នែកគណនេយ្យឲ្យទាន់ពេលវេលាដែលបានកំណត់។
Job Requirement:
តំរូវការចំណេះដឹង និងជំនាញ៖
- បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាទុតិយភូមិ ឬ ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ គ្រប់គ្រងទូទៅ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័របាន។
- អាចធ្វើការជាក្រុម និងដឹកនាំមនុស្ស។
- មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងស្មោះត្រង់។
- មានចំណេះដឹងបន្ថែមផ្នែកកសិកម្មកាន់តែប្រសើរ។

អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ៖
- ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំខែ
- ធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល
- ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ពិសេស
- ប្រាក់រង្វាន់ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- ការវាយតម្លៃប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗជាច្រើនទៀត
- ផ្ដល់បទពិសោធន៍ល្អសម្រាប់អ្នកចូលចិត្តផ្នែកកសិកម្ម។

Job Description:
• Prepare letters, reports and other documents
• Manage diary; understanding the importance of key meetings, building flexibility into the diary and anticipating needs
• To organize external visits, meetings and speaking engagements and coordinate briefing and material, and make travel and accommodation arrangements to ensure budget and time management pressures are met
• Prepare letters, reports and other documents
• Review incoming correspondence, distribute and respond accordingly
• Follow up where necessary 
• Reminding the manager/executive of important tasks and deadlines
• Manage and organize administration 
• Ensure correct briefing notes or papers for meetings
• Note take in meetings as and when required
• Provide support for all other administrative tasks as directed
• Attending to meetings in place of the Chairman if necessary
• Remember deadlines and prompt where necessary
• Be able to go provinces 
• Be prepared for field work, overtime and flexible working hours may be required
• All other works that assign by senior assistant/Chairman
Job Requirement:
• Age 27 – 35 years old
• Master/Bachelor Degree in related field
• At least 3-5 years overall professional experiences in related position
• Ability to manage multiple projects at one time and meet deadlines
• Be able to work under pressure and time constraint 
• Ability to work well in a team environment
• Demonstrated ability to plan, organize and prioritize responsibilities in order to consistently meet deadlines
• Good knowledge of MS Office 
• Good at writing/speaking/listening Chinese (English is a plus)

Job Benefits
• Competitive Salary
• Annual Leave
• Special Leave
• Public Holiday
• Annual Bonus
• Rewarding
• Others.

Job Description:
Monitor company’s advertising and promotion and report to management.
- Carry out planned marketing activities efficiently in timely manner.
- Tracking and analyzing competitors’ advertising and promotion.
- Research and gather relevant market information to analyze latest market trend.
- Developing new initiatives continually to bring products brand to scale further heights.
- Establishing good relationships with media, handling press releases as well as 
  managing web initiatives
- Other tasks assigned by managements.
Job Requirement:
Cambodian nationality
- Bachelor Degree in Sales/Marketing or related field.
-  Minimum 1 year of experience in Sales and Marketing, preferred from automotive 
   industry.
-  Must be able to work well with diverse groups of people from various departments
- Strong interpersonal and communication skill.
- Familiar with MS. Office, Photoshop, Illustrator.

Job Description:
Monitor company’s advertising and promotion and report to management.
- Carry out planned marketing activities efficiently in timely manner.
- Tracking and analyzing competitors’ advertising and promotion.
- Research and gather relevant market information to analyze latest market trend.
- Developing new initiatives continually to bring products brand to scale further heights.
- Establishing good relationships with media, handling press releases as well as 
  managing web initiatives
- Other tasks assigned by managements.
Job Requirement:
Cambodian nationality
- Bachelor Degree in Sales/Marketing or related field.
-  Minimum 1 year of experience in Sales and Marketing, preferred from automotive 
   industry.
-  Must be able to work well with diverse groups of people from various departments
- Strong interpersonal and communication skill.
- Familiar with MS. Office, Photoshop, Illustrator.

jobUrl: https://www.camhr.com/a/job/10583671?title=អ្នកជំនាញខាង បករោម (បឹងកក់)
job title: អ្នកជំនាញខាង បករោម (បឹងកក់)
position: អ្នកជំនាញខាង បករោម (បឹងកក់)
Job Description: Perform hair removal treatments according to client preferences and skin type.Consult with clients to assess their hair removal needs and recommend appropriate treatments.Ensure a clean and sanitary work environment by following proper sanitation and sterilization procedures.Maintain accurate client records and treatment histories.Provide aftercare instructions and recommendations to clients to promote skin health and prevent ingrown hairs or irritation.Stay updated on the latest hair removal techniques, products, and trends.Uphold professional standards of conduct and client confidentiality.Collaborate with other team members to ensure a positive client experience.
Job Requirement: Experience: Prior experience in hair removal or skincare services is often preferred, Knowledge: A strong understanding of different hair removal techniques, skin types, and contraindications is essential. Knowledge of anatomy and physiology related to the skin and hair growth is beneficial.Skills: Excellent interpersonal and communication skills are crucial for consulting with clients and providing exceptional customer service. Attention to detail and the ability to work with precision are also important.Hygiene: Strict adherence to cleanliness and sanitation protocols to maintain a safe and hygienic environment for clients.Professionalism: Demonstrated professionalism, reliability, and integrity are essential traits for interacting with clients and colleagues.Adaptability: Ability to adapt to different client needs and preferences, as well as staying updated on industry trends and best practices.- Location : Boeng Kok- Working 6days per week- Working hours : 8am to 5pm
Contact Info: Contact Information Belly (Mr.)  HR Manager 069222004 hrecruitment88@gmail.com Phnom Penh #4A1, St.22BT, Beoung Tumpun I, Mean Chey, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 069222004

job title: Accountant គណនេយ្យករ ($600-$900) St. H.E. Chea Sophara
position: Accountant គណនេយ្យករ ($600-$900) St. H.E. Chea Sophara
Job Description: 	Ensure that the records of revenues and expenses are in compliance with accounting policies	Ensure the accuracy of payments and maintain accurate records of all bank, cash and petty cash payment.	Work closely with management team to generate budgets forecast and financial planning and report to school director.	Monitor and review the budget allocated to each department.	Present monthly reports, budget and annual reports to the school director.	Complete monthly tax returns and other administrative compliance with the Taxation.	Review revenues and accurate records of the transaction in the accounting system.	Review expenses forms, delivery notes and petty cash forms.	Regularly review internal control to ensure compliance and identify risk and prevention measures.	Manage and ensure accurate payroll processing.	Conduct spot check on suppliers and market prices	Attend management meetings and other professional development sessions	Other tasks assigned by Accounting and Finance Manager.
Job Requirement: •	At least a Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting & Finance, Banking, Business Administration, or related field;•	At least 1-year experience in the related field; •	Experience in school is a plus; •	Hard working and self-motivated person, honest, attention to detail, reliable, loyal, responsible and very good team work;•	Able to work under pressure and work independently;•	Able to communicate in English;•	Good knowledge of Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and QuickBooks; •	Knowledge of other accounting software is a plus.- Working days : Mon to sat - Working hour : 8am to 5pm - Salary rank : $600-$900- industry : International School - location : St. H.E. Chea sophara
Contact Info: Contact Information Belly (Mr.)  HR Manager 069222004 hrecruitment88@gmail.com Phnom Penh #4A1, St.22BT, Beoung Tumpun I, Mean Chey, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 069222004

Job Description: - ទទួលស្វាគមន៏ពេលភ្ញៀវចូលមកដល់- ធ្វើការទូទាត់ចលនាសាច់ប្រាក់ (ចូលនិងចេញ)- ស្កេនផ្លាកតំលៃ និងផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានផ្សេងៗដល់អតិថិជន- ពិនិត្យ និងផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ទំនិញ នឹងការគិតប្រាក់ពីអតិថិជន- ធានាថាមានប្រាក់រាយគ្រប់គ្រាន់សំរាប់ទុកអាប់ទូទាត់អោយអតិថិជន- ត្រួតពិនិត្យសមតុល្យសាច់ប្រាក់អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវមុនពេលចាប់ផ្តើមនិងពេលចប់វេនការងារ- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៏សាច់ប្រាក់លក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ- ស្តាប់ និងចូលរួមដោះស្រាយរាល់បញ្ហាផ្សេងៗដែលកើតមានឡើងនៅហាង- សំអាតតុគិតលុយ និងបរិវេណជុំវិញកន្លែងធ្វើការ- ចូលរួមសហការណ៏ជាមួយក្រុមការងាផ្នែកផ្សេងៗក្នុងការាប់ស្តុកនៅគ្រប់ទូរតាំងលក់- ការងារផ្សេងទៀតដែលដាក់ឲ្យពីថ្នាក់លើ
Job Requirement: - មានភាពស្រស់ស្រាយ ស្មោះត្រង់ និង រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់- មានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងបានល្អ- សិស្សដែលបានបញ្ចប់បាក់ឌុប និងនិស្សិតសិក្សានៅឆ្នាំទី១ ឬទី២ ត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្តឲ្យដាក់ពាក្យ- ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ (Microsoft Word & Excel)- មិនត្រូវការបទពិសោធន៍ (ប្រសិនជាមានកាន់តែប្រសើរ)- មានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការរៀនពីការងារ ឧស្សាហ៏ព្យាយាម និងឱ្យតម្លៃការងារ- ធ្លាប់យល់ដឹងនិងរៀនពីការងារនេះខ្លះៗកាន់តែប្រសើរ- ទីតាំង ៖ ក្រុងដូនកែវ- ប្រាក់ខែគោល ៖ $200 - $300 - ធ្វើការ6ថ្ងៃ/សប្ដាហ៍

Job Description: On the twin islands of Koh Ouen and Koh Bong nestled in the Koh Rong Archipelago an important part of Cambodia’s future is taking shape.   Song Saa Private Island is Cambodia’s first private island resort, setting new benchmarks for luxury and sustainability.Song Saa Private Island is seeking an experienced, dynamic person to fill the role as IT OfficerResponsible for:- All IT infrastructures are working smoothly and effectively.- Troubleshooting IT issues.- Scheduling upgrades and security backups of hardware and software systems.- Managing security access to all networks- Manage all guest related IT issues - Providing users with appropriate support and advice related to IT issues.
Job Requirement: - Degree in IT or equivalent- Great IT skills.- Excellent English language skills.- Good communications skills - written and verbal.- Excellent analytical and problem solving skills.- Experience of working in hospitality preferable.***Interested applicants should submit their CV to talent@songsaa.com Learn more about Song Saa at www.songsaa.com
Company Profile:
Created with sustainability in mind, Song Saa Private Island reflects the beauty of the Cambodian coastline. It’s a place that breathes in time with nature, built from local materials, by local hands, and infused with local art and soul. An evolved tropical getaway with a pristine private beach, spacious wooden villas, heavenly spa sanctuaries and a preserved coral reef, Song Saa Private Island lets you detach from the world and tune into simple luxuries.

Built with reclaimed timber and materials from the mainland, the resort’s design and architecture reiterates our commitment to sustainability. Each villa is a private sanctuary, a refined blend of thatched roofs, linen-draped canopy beds, up-cycled décor and repurposed furniture. Discarded oil drums find new life as lamps. Driftwood serves as a table or bench. Salvaged wood from old fishing boats and factory yards now forms decks and floors and beams.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078330733 Koh Ouen, Khan Mittapheap  078330733

Job Description:
- Preparing the guest personalized itinerary.
- Servicing all guest requirements and be a source of information on guest activities, experiences and food & beverage.
- Liaising with all departments to ensure high standards of service to guests is delivered.
- Overseeing daily guest communication.
- Upholding the company beliefs and Brand DNA at all times.
- Maintaining an excellent reputation in the eyes of the guest, management and staff.
Job Requirement: • Minimum of 2-3 years’ experience in hospitality.• Dynamic personality.• Excellent Communicator.• Excellent English skills.

Job Description: The Song Saa Foundation is a not-for-profit NGO based in the beautiful Koh Rong Archipelago, Preah Sihanouk, Cambodia. We are partnered with Song Saa Private Island (SSPI) and the Song Saa Foundation (SSF) is seeking an enthusiastic and articulate Community and Sustainability Liaison to support SSPI guest engagement and fundraising efforts of SSF alongside delivering the SSF’s environmental and health and hygiene outreach  curriculum to the youth  in the local community.• Daily coordination and delivery of SSF tours with SSPI guests• Fundraising through  SSPI guest donations• Staffing of the SSF Discovery Centre on SSPI and engaging with SSPI guests through the day• Delivering SSF’s outreach  education curriculum to local communities• Communication of SSF work through diverse media channels• Support  implementation of Livelihood Enhancement projects within the local community
Job Requirement: • This position is open to Khmer applicants with strong interpersonal skills• Fluent in English (qualification evidence would be ideal)• Proactive and confident – able to reach out and develop friendly relationships with guests(essential)• Experience in teaching (desired)• Bachelor’s degree in a science related discipline - preferably conservation or environmental focused (desired)• A willingness to learn new information and a dedication to exemplary customer service, withconfidence and  a friendly attitude (essential)• Experience with basic Microsoft Office packages, e.g. Word; Excel (essential)• A passion for sustainability and Cambodian community development (essential)• The ability to swim confidently (highly desired) *** Applicants should send a covering letter and CV to e-mail : claire@songsaafoundation.org. Only short-listed candidates will be contacted.

Job Description: • Establish HR standards and procedures.• Continually evaluates compensation policies and procedures.• Establish the Human Resources Dept. objectives, plans, budget, internal memo and policies.• Continuously maintain, update and develop human resources policy and other regulations on a timely basis to ensure they are reflecting to need and compliance with Cambodian Labor Law.• Manage the HR filings both documents hard and soft to ensure that those documents are filed and entries properly and privately.• Ensure the accuracy of the salary, compensation, and staff’s benefits by reviewing payroll and relevant reports and they are paid promptly.• Properly control staff probation status and issue letter of confirmation, failed, or termination.• Ensure staff profile are safe and up to date.• Prepare compensation and benefit reports analysis.• Follow up to synthesize and appraisal data.• Understand and produce HR department report by week and month.• Other tasks as assigned by management.

Job Description: ** JOB OVERVIEWResponsible for checking loan Proposals sent from a branch and compare to the credit policy, client capacity, and collateral value. ** JOB DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES- To monitor the compliance of credit programs and procedures. - To ensure all credit proposals are in compliance with all requirements in relevant policy/regulation- To work closely with the business department and other related teams to ensure the prompt approval process- Check loan applications from a branch that send to HQ for management approval.- Offer support to the place in credit programs, procedures, credit form using and credit documents with own competent area.- Analyze through the repayment sources, loan purposes, and collaterals- Having site visits on collateral locations and interviewing with customers- Write up an independent and sound credit due diligence report for approver making a decision- Produce a brief analytical sheet for each loan application, including:* Business Plan (BP)* Balance Sheet* Income Statement* Cash Flow* Collateral Evaluation* Repayment Capacity …,and then submit to the manager of the credit department for loan approval.- Manages and monitors credit applications of medium loans before submitting to credit manager or committees’ authorities for approval, including:- Manages, observes, and monitors the qualities of medium loans on an appropriate, precise, sufficient, and timely basis. - Manages and controls the requests of small and medium loan that has sent from branches to find out, analyze and evaluate in possible borrowing and give recommendations.- Prepare Credit Committee Meetings and any duties that may be assigned by the bank from time to time.- Act as a strategic business partner in accomplishing the bank’s business goals by jointly develop and implementing plans for new loan products and expansion of lending programs that is competitive in product design and delivery channel to keep abreast with market trend;- Assist in developing and maintaining procedures and reporting tools to provide timely loans report and information that optimize the performance of loan;- Constantly review and analyze the portfolio concentrations to manage the portfolio risk and make recommendations to improve and mitigate the lending risk;- Assist in developing, implementing and maintaining sound loan and credit policies, procedures and guidelines that is in compliance with the relevant Acts, Laws, and Rules of the National Bank of Cambodia, directives and guidelines issued by the regulatory bodies and the Bank’s internal policies and procedures and to ensure the staff adherence to the policies and procedures;People and Organization- Employ, engage, and retain high-quality people. Identify critical talent and succession gaps in the function and develop appropriate plans/strategies to ensure continuity.- Define an organization structure aligned and scaled to the risk control needs of the Bank, balancing regulatory & local requirements as necessary.- Set and monitor job descriptions and objectives for direct reports and provide feedback and rewards in line with their performance against those responsibilities and objectives.
Job Requirement: ** PERSON SPECIFICATION KNOWLEDGE & EXPERIENCES- Knowledgeable in producing reports in computer systems such as Ms. Word and Ms. Excel or Ms. Access.- Understand Credit Program clearly and manage to find mistakes or errors among the Bank.- Ability to work under pressure.- Self-motivation.- Well coordinating and collaborating with colleagues to find errors.- Well communicating with internal and external people especially our client to review loans clearly.- At least 2 years in experience the Credit Field.SKILLS & ABILITIES- Experience in leading and managing a team.- Excellent interpersonal skills.- A strong communicator with excellent written and presentation skills.- Impeccable integrity.- High PC literacy and Data management skills.- Proven analytical and problem-solving skills combined with the ability to identify risks and impacts as well as possible solutions and corrective actions.
Contact Info: Contact Information Talent Acquisition Unit HR Manager 093768111 recruitment@smebankcambodia.com.kh MEF Business Development Center, # S, OCIC Street, Phum Kien Khleang, Sangkat Chraoy Chongvar, Khan Chraoy Chongvar, Phnom Penh 093768111

Job Description:
JOB SUMMARY
Oversee project documentation such as lease agreement, amendment, letter and attend any dispute occur on site block.

DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES
- Conduct land lease agreement with supporting documents
- Issue MPTC province letters
- Release build permit application
- Issue letter to Khan before construction start 
- Track on project sites information, lease period, landlord information, rental fee, payment term.
- Maintain proper filing of all projects executed documentation, agreements or contracts.
- Deal any issue between landlord and company
- Attend any dispute meeting to settle out the issue
- Conduct any amendment/notification letter to MNO
- Attend and deal on site block if neighbor complaint 
- Attend any site acquisition
Job Requirement:
EDUCATION & TRAINING
- Bachelor Degree of Business Administration/English

EXPERIENCE & KNOWLEDGE
- At least 3 years experience as administration 
- Good at documentation, conduct, review and record
- Strong verbal and written communication skills Khmer & English
- Good at time management 

PERSONAL ATTRIBUTES:
- Fast learning, smart, honest, confident, can work under pressure.

Job Description: •​ សម្អាតគ្រប់បន្ទប់ទាំងអស់ និងប្រាកដថាបន្ទប់ ឧបករណ៍និងសម្ភារផ្សេងៗរួចរាល់មុនអតិថិជនអញ្ជើញមកដល់•​ សម្អាតបរិវេណអាងទឹក និងទីធ្លាសាធារណៈឲ្យបានស្អាតប្រចាំ• សម្អាតបន្ទប់ទឹកសាធារណៈឲ្យបានស្អាតជាប្រចាំ និងមិនមានក្លិន• ត្រួតពិនិត្យសម្ភារ និងឧបករណ៍ផ្សេងៗក្នុងបន្ទប់ បន្ទាប់ពីអតិថិជនបានចាកចេញដើម្បីឲ្យប្រាកដថាមិនមានខូចខាតសម្ភារឡើយ• ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងរាប់ស្តុបនៃផ្នែកបន្ទប់ឲ្យធានាថាមានសម្ភារគ្រប់គ្រាន់ដើម្បីដាក់ជូនអតិថិជន• ទុកដាក់នូវឧបករណណ៍ ឬសម្ភារសម្អាតឲ្យបានរៀបរយ បន្ទាប់ពីប្រើប្រាស់រួច• ដាក់សំណើបញ្ជទិញនូវសម្ភារដែលត្រូវប្រើប្រាស់ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ• ទទួលខុសត្រូវយកភួយ កម្រាលពូក ស្រោមខ្នើយ ឬសម្ភារផ្សេងៗទៀតទៅបោកឲ្យបានទៀងទាន់
Job Requirement: • ចំណេះដឹងអំពីការរៀបបន្ទប់យ៉ាងតិច ០១ ឆ្នាំ• សមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រងពេលវេលាដ៏ល្អប្រសើរក្នុងការរៀបបន្ទប់ • សមត្ថភាពក្នុងការច្នៃរូបភាពនៃការបទកន្សែង និងការដាក់បង្ហាញសម្ភារផ្សេងៗក្នុងបន្ទប់ • បទពិសោធន៍ផ្ទាល់ជាមួយនឹងការប្រើប្រាស់ឧបករណ៍សម្អាត• ជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ • ខិតខំធ្វើការ និងធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម

Job Description:
- Follow SCG Safety Framework policy
- To analyze 4P+1P: Product, Price, Promotion, Place/Channel, and Packaging of each product portfolio
- To set marketing monthly activities &promotions to drive sales growth and brand awareness both online/offline
channel
- To analyze market information, competitor movement, and new product opportunity for gaining more market
share
- Event preparing (Exhibition, Expo, Seminar…)
- Others upon assignments
Job Requirement:
- Degree/Certificate in Marketing or any business degree
- Expertise in marketing knowledge 4Ps and online marketing
- Good in MS-Office (Excel and PowerPoint)
 - English languages speaking, writing, and listening skill is mandatory requirement.
 - Organized, service-minded, and work well under deadlines

** Personal Characteristics
- High level of interpersonal skills and integrity, and a solid team player.
- Strong ethics and a high level of personal and professional integrity.
- Strategic planning, complex problem resolution and general management expertise.

*** We provide the following benefits:
1- Public holiday based on labor law
2- Pension
3- Seniority payment
4- Annual salary increment
5- Annual leave
6- Sick leave
7- Special leave
8- Insurance
9- Annual bonus
10- Annual party
11- Training allowance
12- Others

Job Description:
- Follow SCG Life Saving Rule
- To gather market information, competitors’ movement, and new products opportunity for project channel.
- To switch brand from competitors and lock-in our products in vendor list.
- To be able to assist and advise of piping system design, installation and problem solving.
- To improve the relationship between company and influencers: Plumber, Contractor, Developer and Designer.
- To develop the company offering SCG products and technical solutions to optimize the deal.
- Others upon assignments.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in mechanical/Industrial Engineering/
Civil Engineering.
- Graduated of Mechanical Engineer/Industrial Engineering/ Civil Engineering, for experience is advantages.
- Have knowledge of piping system in construction
- Good computer literacy is essential (Word, Excel, and PowerPoint).
- Good in English language speaking, writing, and listening skills are mandatory required.
- Outstanding communication and presentation skills.

** Personal Characteristics
- High level of interpersonal skills and integrity, and a solid team player.
- Strong ethics and a high level of personal and professional integrity.
- Open mind and challenge with strong commitment.

*** We provide the following benefits:
1- Public holiday based on labor law
2- Pension
3- Seniority payment
4- Annual salary increment
5- Annual leave
6- Sick leave
7- Special leave
8- Insurance
9- Annual bonus
10- Annual party
11- Training allowance

Job Description: 1. ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងគ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធអគ្គសនីដែលមាននៅក្នុងអ៊ីស អូតែស &រីសត2. ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងគ្រប់គ្រងទីកន្លែងទឹកធ្លាក់ នៅក្នុងអ៊ីស អូតែល & រីសត3. សម្អាតម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ រៀងរាល់៤ខែម្ដងដើម្បីធានាថាមិនមានបញ្ហាកើតឡើង4. ជូសជុលម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ ពេលដែលវាមានបញ្ហាកើតឡើង5. ត្រួតពិនិត្យអំពូលភ្លើង ឬពេលដែលអំពូលមិនភ្លឺ ត្រូវផ្លាស់ប្ដូរភ្លាមៗ6. តម្លើងម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ និងប្រព័ន្ធអគ្គសនី 7. ការចែករំលែក ការសហការ និងការជួយគ្នាទៅវិញទៅមក គឺជាកាតព្វកិច្ចរបស់និយោជិតក្នុងការបំពេញការងារទាំងក្នុង និងឆ្លងនាយកដ្ឋាន ឬអគ្គនាយកដ្ឋាន ដើម្បីសម្រេចបាននូវគោលដៅរួមរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន8. ការងារចាត់តាំងដោយប្រធានផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់
Job Requirement: • មានចំណេះដឹង ទាក់ទងជំនាញប្រព័ន្ធអគ្គីសនី• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់• ជំនាញជួសជុល ប្រព័ន្ធអគ្គីសនី និងម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់• ត្រូវមានសញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកអគ្គីសនី • ជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ • ខិតខំធ្វើការ និងធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម

Job Description: 1.សម្អាត និងកាត់ស្មៅជាប្រចាំសប្ដាហ៍ទៅតាមតារាងការងារផ្នែកថែទាំសួន2.ត្រូវស្រោចទឹកផ្កា ស្មៅ នៅក្នុងសួនច្បារ ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ3.កាត់សម្អាត និងតុងតែង ផ្ការ ស្មៅ និងដើមឈឺ អោយបានស្អាតជាប្រចាំ  4.គ្រប់គ្រង និងសន្សំសំចៃក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់សម្ភារ រៀបចំទុកដាក់ និង ថែរក្សាសម្ភារអោយបានល្អបន្ទាប់ពីប្រើប្រាស់រួចជាប្រចំាថ្ងៃ5.ផ្ដល់របាយការណ៍មកកាន់ប្រធានបន្ទាប់ចប់ភារកិច្ច រាយការណ៍ទៅមេក្រុមរាល់ការជួបប្រទះបញ្ហាមិនប្រក្រតីឬមានបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗ7.ការចែករំលែក ការសហការ និងការជួយគ្នាទៅវិញទៅមក គឺជាកាតព្វកិច្ចរបស់និយោជិតក្នុងការបំពេញការងារទាំងក្នុង និងឆ្លងនាយកដ្ឋាន ឬអគ្គនាយកដ្ឋាន ដើម្បីសម្រេចបាននូវគោលដៅរួមរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន8.ការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមការកំណត់របស់ថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ
Job Requirement: • បទពិសោធន៍ការងារសួនចាប់ពី១ឆ្នាំ• យល់ដឹងអំពីរុក្ខជាតិ និងប្រភេទដី និងការប្រើប្រាស់ជី• មានចំណេះដឹងអាចបង្កាត់ពូជផ្កា និងរុក្ខជាតិបាន• មានបច្ចេកទេសក្នុងការមើលប្រភេទដី•​ ដឹងច្បាស់ពីឧបករណ៍សម្ភារសម្អាត•​ ត្រូវមានជំនាញខាងរៀបចំសម្ភារ សន្សំសំចៃ និងគ្រប់គ្រងសម្ភារ•​ ងាយយល់អំពីដំណើរការនៃការសម្អាត កម្ចាត់សត្វល្អិត កម្ចាត់មេរោគ សត្វកណ្តៀរ និងសួន• អាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេស• ធ្វើការជាក្រុមបានល្អ•​ មានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ

Job Description:
Duties & Responsibilities:
Sourcing new suppliers / contractors – 50% 
• Research potential suppliers according to the needs of the organization in divers’ sectors: 
    o	Building contractors
    o	Plumbing items
    o	Consumable (20L bottle, plastics, stickers...)
    o	Electrical items (solar system, cabling, pumping system…),
    o	Water production technology (machinery, treatment, chemicals, media, filtration…),
    o	Laboratory reagents and equipment
    o	Transportation means: motorbike, trolleys, cars 
    o	IEC: printing such as flyer, banner, signboard
• Negotiate the best quality / cost for the organization 
• Visit existing and new suppliers to follow-up and assess their production, capacity and quality 
• Consolidate the information of the suppliers into database
• Occasionally travelling to provinces

Bidding management – 30% 
• Prepare all documents require for bidding and communicate on the appropriate network (collect information from each department, consolidate the information, update the information and post the bidding announcement)  
• Follow-up the potential supplier for bidding 
• Collect the bid answers
• Organize and lead the internal bidding committee 
• Consolidate the information and prepare the benchmark for decision making 
• Prepare the contracts 

Supply and procurement – 20% 
• Support procurement team in responding to Purchase Order (PO) following the process defined by the organization (collect quote, bid analysis preparation, payment request preparation…) 
• Coordinate the orders received dispatching with the support of the Stock controller 
• Communicates with existing suppliers to follow-up orders and requests
• Organizing and entering important data into the database. 
• Any tasks assigned by the supervisor.
Job Requirement:
Professional qualifications
•	Minimum of 3 years of experience in sourcing in water production sector is a plus 
•	Proficient in data analysis and forecasting method with analytical mind
•	Excellent in the use of MS Office (especially MS Excel) 
•	Experience in the private sector is required, knowledge of social business or NGO would be a plus
•	Good communication skills, leadership, ability to work under pressure
•	Native Khmer speaker and fluent in English. 

Required skills
•	Strong traits of accountability, integrity and loyalty
•	Strict with procedures,
•	Belief in personal development for everyone and solidarity
•	Cautious and hard-working
•	Team-player
•	Interesting in social business model and development sector
Company Profile:
Teuk Saat 1001 is a NGO, established in 2007. Our main mission is to develop water kiosks in the rural communities
to improve the access of safe drinking water in a sustainable manner. The role of Teuk Saat 1001, besides developing station, is to support the entrepreneurs by providing a range of services such as technical support, monthly water quality monitoring and personalized coaching. Today, through a network of 900 entrepreneurs, operating 300 stations, in 18 provinces, O-We (brand of Teuk Saat 1001) is serving, on the daily basis, more than 800,000 beneficiaries, including 350,000 children.

Job Description: -Update Bank transaction related to group Telegram-Assist Finance Manager for closing report by project -Check Daily voucher which is submitted by accountant staff  -Monitoring on purchasing report in order to track purchase trend and forecast cash reserve -Tracking BOQ & Actual in both amount & QTY-Check inventory report -Check GL posting to QB system -Tracking BOQ approved as QTY & Amt with actual purchase by project -Handle for petty cash custody-Weekly rolling cash flow and meeting with finance manager -Prepare tracking gasoline consumption report -Prepare tracking material consumption report -Prepare monthly bank reconciliation -Assist finance manager to check  fixed asset listing report & fixed asset movement report -Review inventory report with costing and purpose to adjustment -Review monthly tax return, submit to finance manager before E-filling to tax system -Prepare actual expense vs BOQ after project completed-Other task assign by Finance Manager / CEO

Company Profile:
BBE Group Co., Ltd. is legitimately registered under Cambodian legislation. We have more than ten years of experience in the infrastructure industry. Our areas of expertise include the design and construction of rigid and flexible pavements, drainage systems, bridges, ports, and the installation of sheet piling.

BBE Group Co., Ltd. is confident in its ability to successfully complete all types of complex work because of its educated and qualified local workforce.

After many years of operating in this industry we can see it’s rapidly expanding, hence we decided to open a factory to make high-quality reinforced concrete pipe for internal usage and external sale as well.

Company Profile:
BBE Group Co., Ltd. is legitimately registered under Cambodian legislation. We have more than ten years of experience in the infrastructure industry. Our areas of expertise include the design and construction of rigid and flexible pavements, drainage systems, bridges, ports, and the installation of sheet piling.

BBE Group Co., Ltd. is confident in its ability to successfully complete all types of complex work because of its educated and qualified local workforce.

After many years of operating in this industry we can see it’s rapidly expanding, hence we decided to open a factory to make high-quality reinforced concrete pipe for internal usage and external sale as well.

Job Description:
1. Daily Accounting Operation Supporting
 Daily Accounting Operation Supporting

o Supervising and providing overall guidance to accounting officer as well as junior accounting staff.
o Accomplishes accounting human resource objectives by selecting, orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; communicating job expectations; planning, monitoring, appraising job contributions; recommending compensation actions; adhering to policies and procedures.
o Meets accounting operational standards by contributing financial information to strategic plans and reviews; implementing production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards; resolving problems; identifying system improvements.
o Approves ledger entries by auditing transactions.
o Supports annual audit by providing information and answers to auditors.
o Accomplishes accounting and organization mission by completing related results as needed.
o Analyzing financial statements to ensure accuracy and compliance with generally accepted accounting practices.
o Performing reconciliations of general ledger accounts
o Oversee daily transactions, including accounts payable/receivable, general ledger and fixed asset, revenues and expenses, cash and bank reconciliations.
o Check supported all necessary documents, processed and certified for invoice or receipt of merchandises or services in quality, quantity and prices
o Check invoices or receipt for daily, weekly and monthly that collected from relevant department
o Check invoices or receipt are completed supporting document PR, PO, quote, DO, MR, etc
o To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accurately
o To be responsible for all inter-company accounts 
o Supporting document has been filling for audit purpose
o To be responsible for all financial supporting
o Leading the accounting team to meet with the deadline report that requited by direct supervisor.

 Fixed Assets

o Ensure Fixed assets listing has been recording properly 
o Assets registration (Coding)
o Manage Fixed Asset Movement
o Handling Disposal Process
o Check month-end journal
o Conduct Physical Count

2. Prepare and Review Financial Monthly Report:
o Assist AM to prepare Monthly Financial Report P&L, BS, CF to comply with Cambodia IFRS
o Ensuring the Financial Report have been reconciled
o Prepare monthly Financial Note to support monthly FS Report
o Prepare monthly Sale and Revenues report
o Prepare monthly Sale and AR reconciliation 
o Prepare monthly Aging AP / AR report
o Prepare monthly Inter-company report 
o Monitoring revenue and expenses; cost allocation; consolidation, variance analysis and management reports.

3. Other Financial Supporting Operation: 
o Support Finance Operation 
o Support FD, FM and AM for other management reports
o Assist FD, FM and AM to prepare P & P.

4. Accounting System Monitoring
o Accounting system knowledge
o Leading and support accounting team for using accounting system

5. Employee Handling
o To assists in the training of accounting personnel as part of the effort to build an efficient team
o take action in their individual development and welfare 
o To be familiar with the duties and responsibilities of all the team leaders & accounting staffs
o To be able to train them up to the standards required.
o To ensure that all employee good working relationship with all colleagues throughout the company 
o To assist in the training of the employees ensuring that they have the necessary skills to perform their duties with efficiency.
o To ensure that all employees have a complete understanding of the company’s policies and procedures. 
o To carry out any other reasonable duties and responsibilities as assigned.
o To be supervisor all accounting team leader and accounts clerk for admin task
Job Requirement:
o Bachelor’s Degree in accounting and/or finance required
o At least three years of progressive accounting experience
o Proven working experience in Construction Management or General Contracting or Subcontractor industry 
o Experience in job cost accounting and financial reporting
o Proven working experience as Accounting Manager, Accounting Supervisor, or Finance Manager
o Proven knowledge of book-keeping and accounting principles, practices, standards, laws, and regulations

Job Description: I.	Job SummaryThe Senior Minerals Admin Officer has the main role in managing the administration of mineral resources report, monitoring the process of granting rights, registration and preparing all relevant documents to save and review documents. II.	Duties & Responsibilities1. Monitor daily entry-exit documents-	Monitor daily entry-exit documentations-	Monitor monthly entry-exit document reports2. Compose various letters-	Prepare administrative letters on specific subjects to be sent to relevant institutions-	Prepare Handover Letter of Receipt and Other Administrative Letters-	Make a report or minutes of the meeting4. Legal Document Management-	Scan and organize daily incoming and outgoing files in an orderly manner, both Hard & Soft Copy-	Monitor edited PDF Name after Scan-	Check the preparation of the received documents according to the type of story and in the correct order in both Hard & Soft Copy to make it easy to find in time-	Ensure all legal documents are properly stored and easily accessible for audits and reviews. 5. Rights Management -	Evaluate and process applications for mineral, prospecting, mining and related rights.-	Write official letters and communications related to mineral rights and agreements.-	Make recommendations and write reports regarding the granting of rights.-	Carry out site inspections to ensure that the terms and conditions of granted rights are complied with.-	Monitor the status of granted rights and ensure timely renewals.-	Implement a robust follow-up process to ensure all rights and agreements are up-to-date.-	Manage the expiration process of rights, including notifications, renewals, and terminations.-	Perform various functions related to administrative work assigned by management.6. Accounting-	Tracking all expense that heppened during operation.- Close Expecse Report.- Process purchase request and cash advance.- Ensures all transactions are properly recorded with accurate supporting documentations and timely basis.
Job Requirement: III.	Qualifications, Experience & Skills-	Admin Officer should have a bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Economy, Management, Public Administration, Law, and any other related fields.-	At least 4 years’ experience in related field.-	Language: Khmer and English -	Computer literacy: Microsoft Word, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Excel-	Ability to write reports.-	Ability to write submissions.-	Ability to conduct meetings.-	Ability to communicate (written and oral).-	Strong knowledge of mineral resource regulations and industry best practices.

Job Description: I.	Job SummaryA Mining Engineer is a professional who applies science, technology, and mathematical principles to design and develop safe and effective mining processes and operations. They are involved in every stage of the mining process, from exploration and discovery of the mineral resources, through feasibility studies, mine design, development of plans, production, and operations, to mine closure. II.	Duties & Responsibilities•	Geo-resource Exploration: Conduct geological surveys and use geophysical methods to identify and evaluate the value of underground deposits.•	Data Analysis: Analyze geoscientific data to determine the best methods of reaching valuable resources.•	Resource Estimation: Estimate the size and quality of mineral deposits using data from geophysical surveys, drilling, and geochemical tests.•	Drilling Supervision: Supervise drilling operations to obtain samples and data needed to evaluate the geological and geophysical information of a potential mining site.•	Geological Modeling: Create geological models of the earth’s crust based on geophysical and geological data to aid in the planning and development of mining operations.•	Risk Assessment: Evaluate risks associated with geological structures and patterns to ensure safe and efficient mining operations.•	Collaboration with Geoscientists: Work closely with geologists, geophysicists, and other specialists to understand the geologic formation of the earth where minerals are found.•	Regulatory Compliance: Ensure that exploration activities are in compliance with government regulations and environmental standards.•	Project Development: Conduct feasibility studies to estimate costs and predict the profitability of potential mining projects.•	Reporting: Prepare reports and maps that can be used to predict the viability of new mining sites.•	Research and Development: Stay updated with the latest advancements in mining technology and changing regulations.
Job Requirement: •	Education: A bachelor’s degree in Mining Engineering, Geo-Resource & Geo-Technical Engineer or a related field is typically required. •	Experience: Depending on the level of the position, some amount of relevant work experience in the mining industry may be required. This could include experience in internships, cooperative engineering programs, or entry-level positions.•	Technical Skills: Proficiency in using industry-specific software and technology for mine design and planning, such as AutoCAD, Vulcan, Surpac, or similar.•	Knowledge: Strong understanding of mining operations, geology, mineral processing, and mine safety regulations. Knowledge of environmental regulations and practices is also important.•	Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to solve complex engineering problems using principles of engineering, mathematics, and science.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR & Admin Department HR Manager 093777890 careers@khunseagroup.com Phnom Penh #217, St. 369, Daeum Meakkloea, Sangkat Chhbar Ampov Ti Muoy, Khan Chbar Ampov, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 093777890

Company Profile: TSNR Distribution Co., Ltd. is a leading distribution service provider in Cambodia with nationwide coverage to 18 main provinces. We are focus on FMCG distribution and the sole distributor for SCJohnson, LION, NCP and others products in Cambodia, e.g. market leader brands like Raid, Glades, Shokubutsu, Kodomo, Fitne, Net etc. In order to meet the growing demand and business expansion, we are looking for suitable and qualified candidates to fulfil the following position.
