Job Description:
- Support the Leasing & Marketing Director in retail planning which includes tenant, leasing agreement review and planning
- Handle leasing enquiries, source and secure suitable tenants that fit into the desired tenant mix at the mall
- Monitor all current and future vacancies to proactively react to future occupancy needs
- Evaluate the prospective tenant’s proposal to make recommendation to approving parties for acceptance
- Negotiate and finalize rental and other terms & conditions with potential tenants
- Prepare and complete relevant lease documentation and paperwork for approval of lease
- Liaise with solicitors and tenants to review the terms of lease until the issuance of Tenancy Agreements (TA)
- Check and verify the Draft TA prepared by solicitors
- Ensure tenants adhere to the lease terms. Follow up from the signing of lease term to the opening of the store
- Plan, establish and maintain good landlord-tenant relationships
- Ensure property tax levied is in line with committed rentals
-Other tasks will assign by Leasing & Marketing Director.
Job Requirement:
-Male/Female (Female are encourage to apply)
-Bachelor Degree or above in Marketing, Administration, Estate Management or related field
-Minimum 2 to 3 years of relevant working experience in relate duties is preferred.
-Good command in both spoken and written English and Chinese is an advantage
-Knowledge of local & oversea media
-Sound understanding of the real estate industry
-Must be honest and professional in work ethics
-Knowledge of Hospitality and Operation
-Strong knowledge of computer skills, Microsoft Word, Excel and Outlook and Photoshop.
-Commitment to cultivating a good working relationship with other staff members.
-A positive attitude and willing to learn and administrative affairs.
-Planning/Organizing Skills
-Willing to work independently and under time pressure
Company Profile:
Oxley Worldbridge (Cambodia) Co., Ltd is a joint venture between Singapore-based Oxley International Holdings and Cambodian-based Worldbridge Land (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. The
company has a strong team of skilled professionals based in Cambodia to oversee the development of own properties. This team works closely with their associates from Oxley Holdings Limited and Worldbridge Land (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. to ensure delivery of best results to their investors and customers.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   070 700 170 ao@oxleyworldbridge.com.kh The Bridge SoHo Tower #40-01, Village 14, National Assembly Street, Tonle Bassac Commune, Chamkarmorn District, Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia 070 700 170

Job Description: I. JOB OVERVIEWResponsible for checking loan Proposal sending from branch and compare to the credit policy, client capacity, and collateral value.
Job Requirement: II.JOB DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES- To monitor the compliance of credit programs and procedures. - To ensure all credit proposals are in compliance with all requirements in relevant policy/regulation- To work closely with the business department and other related teams to ensure the prompt approval process- Check loan applications from the branch that are sent to HQ for management approval.- Offer supporting to the place in credit programs, procedures, credit form using, and credit documents with own competent area.- Analyze through the repayment sources, loan purposes, and collaterals- Having site visits on collateral locations and interviewing with customers- Write-up an independent and sound credit due diligence report for approver making decision- Produce brief analytical sheet for each loan application, including:* Business Plan (BP)* Balance Sheet* Income Statement* Cash Flow* Collateral Evaluation* Repayment Capacity …,and then submit to manager of credit department for loan approval.- Manages and monitors credit applications of medium loan before submitting to credit manager or committees authorities for approval, including:- Manages, observes and monitors qualities of medium loan on an appropriate, precise, sufficient and timely basis. - Manages and controls the requests of small and medium loan that has sent from branches to find out, analyze and evaluate in possible borrowing and give recommendation.- Prepare Credit Committee Meeting and any duties that may be assigned by the bank from time to time.III.	PERSON SPECIFICATION KNOWLEDGE & EXPERIENCES- Knowledgeable in producing report in computer system such as Ms. Word and Ms. Excel or Ms. Access.- Understand Credit Program clearly and manage to find mistake or error among the Bank.- Ability to work under pressure.- Self-motivation.- Well coordinating and collaborating with colleague to find errors.- Well communicating with internal and external people especially our client to review loan clearly.- At least 2 years in experience Credit Field.- A strong communicator with excellent written and presentation skills.- Proven analytical and problem-solving skills combined with the ability to identify risks and impacts as well as possible solutions and corrective actions.
Contact Info: Contact Information Talent Acquisition Unit HR Manager 093768111 recruitment@smebankcambodia.com.kh MEF Business Development Center, # S, OCIC Street, Phum Kien Khleang, Sangkat Chraoy Chongvar, Khan Chraoy Chongvar, Phnom Penh 093768111

Job Description: -To develop loan collection and monitoring procedure/guideline.- To create loan collection workflow/overdue report template.- Lead loan quality checking after loan disbursement on loan assessment/ fraud case.- Lead team to reassessment for loan restructuring and solve the problem for bad case.- Credit committee member (Loan approval from 100K up)- Collaborate with branch manager/Deputy branch manager sale/Sale support lead to solve delinquency and overdue customer.- Monitoring the consequence conditions (post loan disbursement) and ensure all those conditions are fulfilled.- Lead Lending Monitoring and Collection team to communicate delinquent borrowers, establish develop effective payment plans delinquent borrowers.- Conduct site visit the business of borrower with collection officer and branches staff.- Joining with collection officer and branch staff for solving the overdue loan.- Find a good solution and strategy for settle the bad loan outside/inside court case process.- Keep a good relationship with local authorities to support the effective resolution process.- Coordinate with relevant departments (Legal, Risk, Credit Analyst and Audit, Operation, and branches) to solve the bad cases.- Advice borrowers of their legal liabilities under contract law (including interpretation their liability under loan agreement).- Follow up and update the court case (Liaise lawyers litigation cases until cases closed).- Direct and indirect coaching to retail banking sale officer on loan collection.- Manage recovery & collection department- Create strategy to prevent the overdue loan accounts- Preparing the impairment report- Monitor the customers repayment- Sit visit the customer to confirm before decide to take any action- Consolidate weekly recovery performance
Job Requirement: -Good at Solving problems-able to deal with SME clients and work under pressure-Good in English which can write memo / guideline-Matured and Patient-Good at interpersonal skill-Good leader which can manage the subordinate well
Contact Info: Contact Information Talent Acquisition Unit HR Manager 093768111 recruitment@smebankcambodia.com.kh Phnom Penh  MEF Business Development Center, # S, OCIC Street, Phum Kien Khleang, Sangkat Chraoy Chongvar, Khan Chraoy Chongvar, Phnom Penh 093768111

Contact Information Talent Acquisition Unit HR Manager 093768111 recruitment@smebankcambodia.com.kh MEF Business Development Center, # S, OCIC Street, Phum Kien Khleang, Sangkat Chraoy Chongvar, Khan Chraoy Chongvar, Phnom Penh 093768111

Job Description: - Announce SME Bank's annual reports to board of directors, shareholders, NBC, embassies, and relevant institutions/ministries.- Follow up each changing and development letters or legal document issued by the CEO, Divisions to ensure proper and update performance.- Public relations required by management with shareholders, board of directors, business partners, and other relevant public institutions with professional ethics.- Prepare decision letters, announcements and other guidelines approved by CEO to announce to divisions, departments, branches for complying.- Stamped official documents of SME Bank properly and bear the responsibility for keeping stamps safely and technically.- Keep different legal files, official documents of SME Bank such as: memorandums and statutes, certificate of commerce register, patent, and other documents properly and technically.- Controlling of letters or other documents from ministries/related institution prior send to CEO.- Controlling and preparation of any documents/response letters signed by CEO prior send to ministries/related institutions.- Prepare any regulatory procedures related to banking operations as well as announce on time to ensure updated and legal performance for SME Bank.- Announce the enforcement of legal documents, laws, declarations and lawful circulars of SME Bank, relevant institutions and government properly and on time.- Reviewing the contracts composition of SME Bank and prepare contracts according to the requirement and other business partners properly and legally in line with the rule of law properly and on time.- Other tasks assigned by the management from time to time.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent qualification.- At least 1 year experience in a Legal or Secretary position. - Working experience in a financial institution is a plus.- Demonstrated strength in keeping well-organized in a multi-tasking environment and detail-oriented.- Motivation to work in multiple capacities. • Ability to converse in English or other foreign language.• Computer & data-entry skills.
Contact Info: Contact Information Talent Acquisition Unit HR Manager 093768111 recruitment@smebankcambodia.com.kh MEF Business Development Center, OCIC Street, Khan Chraoy Chongvar, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.  093768111

Job Description: ** JOB OVERVIEW- Strong focus on business development, relationship building and networking;- Market products and solutions to increase lending, deposit and cross-sell opportunity;- Promote banking products and services to existing and prospective customers- Assists customers for loan application and screens loan applications;- Ensure quality of loan portfolio through sound credit assessment and monitoring;- Collecting, investigating, and analyzing for loan appraisal;- Conducts client sit visit of home, business places, and collateral;- Study credit status and competition in its operating areas;- Deal and coordinate customer complaints or claims as well as loans problem;- Processing registration of title deed at local authorities and land office;- Loan monitor and follows up of the timely repayment;- Build good relationships with customers and local authorities;- Ensure full compliance with all in-place bank policies & procedures;- Achievement of his/her performance targets;- Identify and understand customers’ needs and recommend appropriate financial products/services;- Ensure that the highest quality of service is offered in the VIP premises at all times;- Execute other related duties as assigned by line supervisors or requested.
Job Requirement: ** Skills & AbilitiesKnowledge & Experiences- At least Bachelor’s degree in business administration, economic, or finance and banking is desirable;- At least 1 year working experience in financial institutions, accounting, or related fields;- Fresh graduates are also encouraged to apply;- Understand about vision, mission, core values, regulations, and other principles of SME Bank of Cambodia;Skills & Abilities- Ability to communicate and to maintain good relation with the client- Be able to travel based on location set- Ability to communicate and self-motivated person- Ability to work effectively in a team environment and work in the field- Good computer literate (MS Word, Excel)- Willing to work under pressure and over time- Analysis and reporting skills.Others- Be a Cambodia citizen;- Be high integrity, accountability, hardworking, and commitment;- Be respectful;- Demonstrate sound professional ethic
Contact Info: Contact Information Talent Acquisition Unit HR Manager 093768111 recruitment@smebankcambodia.com.kh MEF Business Development Center, # S, OCIC Street, Phum Kien Khleang, Sangkat Chraoy Chongvar, Khan Chraoy Chongvar, Phnom Penh 093768111

Job Description: ** JOB DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIESJOB DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES- Responsible to field visits branches on regular basis to check compliance of loan approval, disbursement, monitoring and recovery procedure by branch loan officer.- To strengthen quality of loan and mitigate internal fraud and carefully analyze on the borrower business.- Review business structure, financial condition/repayment capacity, collateral of the borrower from the credit file and verify with actual site visit on sampling basis to ensure reported data in credit appraisal is actual.- To provide high responsibility on the check and analyze the borrower financial statement and make comparison to the fact after physical check has been done.- Regularly conduct branch visit for physical counting the original collateral certificates and original legal documents in branches’ fireproof vault.- To take part in investigation of any credit cases in coordination with relevant departments.- Detect fraud of any other non-compliance issues and disseminate the findings to seniormanagement.- Prepare finding and worksheet of review of branch credit cases and require justification of finding from branch.- Conduct post credit reviews of loan accounts and credit facilities to ascertain weaknesses so that timely action can be taken to minimize the bank’s credit loss.- Notify immediately to Head and Top Management upon finding of any serious issue related to respective branch.
Job Requirement: ** PERSON SPECIFICATION Knowledge & Experiences- Knowledgeable in producing report in computer system such as Ms. Word and Ms. Excel or Ms. Access.- Ability to work under pressure.- Self-motivation.- Well coordinating and collaborating with colleague to find errors.- Well communicating with internal and external people especially our client to review loanclearly.- At least 2 years in experience Credit Analyst and Audit.- A strong communicator with excellent written and presentation skills.- Proven analytical and problem solving skills combined with the ability to identify risks andimpacts as well as possible solutions and corrective actions.** Skills & Abilities- Be a good team player with a sense of responsibility and adaptability;- Good computer literate (MS Word, Excel, Power Point, Email and Internet);- High proficiency in English knowledge;- Ability prioritize, multi-task and work well under pressure to meet deadlines;- Skills in managing, communicating, reporting, solving problem, and interpersonal skill.- High committed, confident and talent to work.- Basic understanding of overall banking policy, process, manual, flows.- Expected to work independently with overall guidance by superior.- Ability to develop the banking operations policies and procedures and translate to actions.
Contact Info: Contact Information Talent Acquisition Unit HR Manager 093768111 recruitment@smebankcambodia.com.kh MEF Business Development Center, # S, OCIC Street, Phum Kien Khleang, Sangkat Chraoy Chongvar, Khan Chraoy Chongvar, Phnom Penh 093768111

Job Description: ** JOB OVERVIEWThe occupant will be responsible for direct offer loans to individuals and businesses, to increase loan portfolio, achieve the business plan, mitigate PAR/NPL, ensure team integrity and Lead business prospect promotions.** JOB DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES- Increase loan portfolio to align with the bank’s directions and strategies.- Maximize business pipeline through aggressive sales call plans to acquire large prospective customers.- Achieve the business budget plan.- Ensure the integrity of the business team.- Daily monitor the performances of RM, SRO, and RO, loan overdue, and NPL.- Closely check, review, provide the appropriate training of sales prospects, bank directions,credit management, pipeline management, loan assessment, and credit proposal to low performer.- Take effective action plans to minimize loan overdue by pushing RM, SROs, and ROs to closely follow up on customer repayment.- Report to the management line pertaining to the credit appraisal approval or rejection, loan monitoring, checklist matters, NPL loan ratio, and loan default in principal and interest.- Be responsible for all the steps necessary to process credit appraisal of every loan application, inspecting customers’ business regularly at site, reviewing post conditions, and following up on collateral issues according to the rules and regulations of the Bank.- Build and strengthen relationships with existing priority customers to maximize the loan portfolio and achieve the business target.- Provide professional customer service to achieve a high percentage of customer satisfaction and retention.- Keep proper records and escalate to line management for customer complaints.- Resolve all issues and queries of the customers related to the credit product, credit scheme, credit procedures, and formalities.- Serve as the one-point contact person to the high net worth and existing customers.- Provide support to the customer as much as possible to procure loans and help them with paperwork.- Regularly monitor and check on customers’ concerns regarding the use of the loan, business situation, loan contract terms, the repayment of the loan, the completeness of documentation in a timely manner.- All bank assets and liabilities related to loans, guarantees, confirmation, and other loan products need to be properly documented, recorded, and accounted for.- Offer training or experience sharing on sales prospects, bank strategies and directions, credit management, pipeline management, loan delinquency, loan assessment, and credit proposal to all staff under supervision.- Share the new memo, internal circular, credit policies, and other information of the bank with all staff under supervision.- Execute other related duties as assigned by line managers.
Job Requirement: ** PERSON SPECIFICATION KNOWLEDGE & - Hold Bachelor degree of Management, Accounting,- At least 4-years experiences in banks or MFIs;- Understand about vision, mission, core values, regulations, and other principles of SME Bank of Cambodia;** Skills & Abilities- Be a good team player with a sense of responsibility and adaptability;- Working knowledge of administrative functions in an operational environment e.g. budgets, personnel administration;- Demonstrated experience in managing and motivating a team;- Strong analytical, interpersonal, communication and influencing skills;- Ability to use initiative, prioritize, multi-task, and work well under pressure to meet deadlines;- Ability to delegate effectively amongst teams and show commitment to the long-term development of the management team through coaching and mentoring;- Broad understanding how bank operates and customer service manager work flowOthers- Be a Cambodia citizen with a strong background in Banking and Financial Management;- Be high integrity, accountability, and commitment;- Be respectful;- Demonstrate sound professional ethic.
Contact Info: Contact Information Talent Acquisition Unit HR Manager 093768111 recruitment@smebankcambodia.com.kh MEF Business Development Center, # S, OCIC Street, Phum Kien Khleang, Sangkat Chraoy Chongvar, Khan Chraoy Chongvar, Phnom Penh 093768111

Job Description: ** JOB OVERVIEWThe Unit Manager will supervise and lead the incumbent to support implementing digital channel tech-related projects, FinTech integration, and development and maintenance of back-end/in-house applications.** JOB DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES• Support the implementation of Information Systems and digital technology-related projects, and maintain project plans and documentation.• Manage issues and change, and coordinate with vendors for resolutions.• Analyze business and technical requirements.• Build/Maintain back-end/in-house software/web application.• Support system, development, and service integrations with FinTech/partners with APIs• Ensure compliance with policy, internal/external audit, and regulatory requirements
Job Requirement: • Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Business Information Technology, Management Information Systems or other related fields• At least 2 to 3 years of experience in software development experience with the banking industry is a plus• Strong communication, interpersonal, problem-solving, analytical, and organisation skills• Solid programming skills in your language of choice• Hands-on experience in Java, Python, C#, JavaScript• Experience with back-end technologies: Java Spring Boot, Django, NodeJS• Experience with front-end technologies: HTML/JavaScript/CSS, Angular, Progressive Web App (PWA)• Good API skills • Knowledge of version control tools: GitHub, GitLab, or Subversion
Contact Info: Contact Information Talent Acquisition Unit HR Manager 093768111 recruitment@smebankcambodia.com.kh MEF Business Development Center, OCIC Street, Khan Chraoy Chongvar, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 093768111

Job Description: ** JOB OVERVIEW- Build and deepen relationships with existing Priority Customers to achieve increase in share of wallet and revenues.- Provide professional customer service to achieve a high percentage of customer satisfaction and retention.- Serve as the one-point contact to the High Net Worth customers of the Bank SALES- Generate new business to achieve defined targets in terms of no. of customers, volumes and revenue for the segment- Achieve “best in class” productivity in order to maximize the efficacy of the sales process.- Aggressive Sales call plans to acquire large prospective customers through referrals.- Ensure coverage of customer base in accordance with the approved contact plans.- Update & maintain all Sales MIS (Calls, Prospects, Business done, etc.)- Responsible for the primary duty to increase the customer base by attracting more loan customers.- Responsible for all the steps necessary to process the loan appraisal of every loan application, inspecting customers’ business regularly at site and follow-up on collateral issues according to the rules and regulation of the Bank- Monitoring daily work timely and effectively, loan files have to be up to date and current to ensure its high quality, NPL have to be closely monitored and rehabilitate and NPL ratio kept at an acceptable level. All bank assets and liabilities related to loans, guarantees confirmation and other loan products need to be properly documented, recorded and accounted for.- Report monthly result of work pertaining to the credit appraisal approval or declination, loan monitoring, checklist matters, NPL loan ratio and loan default in principal and interest to the Head of Credit Department and the Credit Committee through SME Banking Head.- Maintain a close relationship with the customers to ensure that the customer banking needs are met. Take steps to increase the products holding of the customers.- Monitoring daily loan late by pushing ROs to closely follow up on time payment.- Monitor and check regularly on customers concerning the use of loan, business situation, loan contract terms, the repayment of loan, the completeness of documentation on time and to process possible extension of the loan before due date within 7 working days.- Resolve every issues and quires of the customers related to the loan procedures andformalities- Provide support to the customer as much as possible to procure loans and by helping themwith paperwork- Provide training/coaching to the new ROs hiring to adapt of the bank implementation/regulation- Sharing the new Memo information of the bank to all staff under my supervision- Lead marketing resources to generate new customers and clients for the Bank as group and team.- Keep proper records and look into customer complaints- Execute other related duties as assigned by line supervisors or requested.
Job Requirement: - Hold Bachelor degree of Management, Accounting,- At least 3-years experiences in banks or MFIs;- Understand about vision, mission, core values, regulations, and other principles of SME Bank of Cambodia;** Skills & Abilities- Be a good team player with a sense of responsibility and adaptability;- Working knowledge of administrative functions in an operational environment e.g. budgets, personnel administration;- Demonstrated experience in managing and motivating a team;- Strong analytical, interpersonal, communication and influencing skills;- Ability to use initiative, prioritize, multi-task, and work well under pressure to meet deadlines;- Ability to delegate effectively amongst teams and show commitment to the long-term development of the management team through coaching and mentoring;- Broad understanding how bank operates and customer service manager work flowOthers- Be a Cambodia citizen with a strong background in Banking and Financial Management;- Be high integrity, accountability, and commitment;- Be respectful;- Demonstrate sound professional ethic.

Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of

Job Description: Summary:The Farm Supervisor is responsible for overseeing the day-to-day operations of a farm to ensure efficient and productive crop or livestock production. This role involves supervising farmworkers, maintaining farm equipment, ensuring compliance with regulations, and contributing to the farm's profitability.Responsibilities:- Lead and supervise a team of farmworkers in planting, cultivating, harvesting, and processing crops or raising livestock.- Develop and implement work schedules and assign tasks to ensure timely completion of farm activities.- Monitor crop and livestock health, identifying and addressing any pest, disease, or nutritional issues.- Maintain and operate farm machinery and equipment, ensuring they are in safe working order.- Conduct routine maintenance on farm buildings and infrastructure.- Oversee inventory control of seeds, fertilizers, feed, and other farm supplies.Maintain accurate records of production, labor, and farm expenses.- Implement and enforce safety regulations to ensure a safe work environment for all farm personnel.- Stay up-to-date on agricultural best practices and new technologies to optimize farm operations.- Communicate effectively with farm management, staff, and external vendors.
Job Requirement: - Proven experience in supervising farmworkers.- Strong knowledge of crop production or livestock management practices (depending on the farm's focus).- Proficiency in operating and maintaining farm machinery and equipment.- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and leadership skills.- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.- Strong work ethic and a commitment to safety.Valid driver's license.

Job Description: •The WISC teacher is expected to engage the learners throughout the lesson time, through note making, discussions, student making presentations and responding to activities in the workbooks. •The teacher shall present the lesson employing the “No Child Left Behind” strategy with the use of multiple pathways of teaching to ensure all the students are able to benefit from the lesson.•The subject teacher is expected to grade the student work on a daily basis, continually compiling evidence of performance to report in monthly booklets. •The teacher shall take responsibility to invest in moral education to develop good behavior among their students. •Accident prevention is the sole responsibility of every teacher during their lesson. Students should be guided appropriately on safety, situations anticipated and measures put in place to prevent accidents at ALL costs.•Performing other functions as necessary or assigned by Heads of Division. •Assisting Line Manager/Supervisor in any projects or tasks in relation to company goals and objectives.•Participating in all School-wide events.
Job Requirement: ●4-year Bachelor’s Degree plus TESOL/TEFL certificate, BA in Education preferred●Master’s degree advantageous●Teaching certification from a recognized institution.●Native English speaker ●More than 3 years of working experience in education institutions Experience in teaching in an international setting is an advantage.●Competent in Information Technology for use in Teaching and Learning, as well as data analysis●Strong knowledge in curriculum, pedagogy and assessments.●Strong passion in education with the ability to inspire students and fellow teachers●Willing to be stationed in Phnom Penh, Cambodia●Willing to work flexibly in dynamic and fast-paced environment●Excellent interpersonal, communication and presentation skills●Strong ability in leadership, networking, teamwork, and problem-solving●Meticulous, analytical and self-driven●Ability to think strategically●Ability to work independently, as well as in collaboration with others●Ability to “think outside the box” in identifying problems and implementing solutions●Works well under pressure, well organized and with strong attention to details●Ability to multitask and manage tight deadlines
Company Profile:
At World International School Cambodia (WISC), our aim is to create an enabling environment for children to maximize their potential in a holistic manner, so that they are an academically, socially and ecologically literate global citizen in our increasingly culturally diverse world.

Your child, as a potential global citizen, will have several educational pathways availed to him or her as a student for WISC to have the opportunity to choose a sought after education pathway to help his or her academic ambitions.

Your child will also be equipped and provided with life skills reflective of the WISC Learner Profile which is developed with the sole purpose of helping your child to be creative, innovative, caring and a responsible young adult, with a fostered inclination to design, innovate, problem solve and communicate effectively.

World International School Cambodia (WISC) in Cambodia offers a comprehensive Singapore Primary Schools Program, combined with the Cambridge’s International General Certificate for Secondary Examination (IGCSE) courses. We look forward to welcoming you to our global community.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  Department HR Manager 015357135 hr@wisc.edu.kh Phnom Penh TUEK L’AK Head Office: Building # 431, Street 230, Sangkat Tuek L’ak III, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh 015357135

Job Description: The school principal supports the president with all the tasks and responsibilities related to the smooth and efficient operation of the educational programs at all Grade levels. The school principal works directly with the president to develop action plans, guidelines, procedures and policies to meet WISC strategic goals. The school principal organizes, plans, and provides direct support to teachers and teaching assistants and curriculum: •Collaborate with the president of the school on overall school-wide programmatic development•Work with the president of the school to develop procedures, policies, and guidelines that enable the school to run efficiently•Ensure smooth day-to-day administration of the school programs•Engage, provide leadership, communicate effectively, and influence teachers, teaching assistants, and Khmer support staff, appreciating differing approaches and personalities•Promote positive leadership and efficient management by promoting high-quality communication across the whole school•Assist in the attraction, selection, and recruitment of appropriately qualified and experienced teaching staff and teaching assistants•Implement student code of conduct/behavior guidelines and act as the first level of support to teachers in student discipline issues by initiating appropriate responses to emerging and/or challenging student needs•Be a member of the school management•Participate in Creating, implementing, and monitoring the timetable usage.•Arrange teacher meeting schedules•Monitor weekly lesson plans from teachers.•Create, coordinate, and disseminate the duty schedule for teachers and teaching assistants during recess and lunch break to ensure student’s safety•Create, implement, and monitor parental drop-off or pick-up routines•Supervise teaching assistants’ performance•Oversee the organization of field trips•Liaise with the Khmer General Education Coordinator to ensure the smooth running of the full-day schedule•Organize two rounds of parent-teacher conferences per school year by coordinating interviews for all WISC students, inviting parents, and providing schedules to teachers•Liaise with the president of the school to plan for an academic progress report•Make necessary arrangements for parent workshops/meetings, curriculum information sessions, open days, etc., and other school events as required•Help identify resources required for teaching and learning•Ensure that teachers are aware of and responsible for shared resources•Monitor resource needs and be responsible for creating/maintaining a resource inventory•Support teachers, supervisor and the president of the school in leading regular student assemblies•Ensure there is a consistent and thorough handover between leaving teachers and new hires, including any teachers hired mid-year•Assist new teachers in all aspects of the curriculum, school routines, and procedures•Oversee teacher absences and arrange substitutes as needed•Cover and teach classes as needed•Draw to the attention of each teacher safety/emergency procedures and inform the president of the school of any areas of concern•Be an active participant in all school activities•Attend and lead meetings as required•Maintain confidentiality•Consult with the president of the school on all important matters•Deputize for the president in her/his absence•Assist the president of the school with other appropriate tasks as require•Handle the Cambridge curriculum efficiently and effectively
Job Requirement: •Bachelor’s degree in management, education  or related field•At least 4-year experience in school principal•Exceptional communication and presentation skills•Proven ability in coaching teacher•Solid computer skills•Willing to work in different place •Strong in Cambridge Curriculum

Job Description: •Ensure school student enrolment is conducted strictly in accordance with the school’s student•recruitment policies and standards.•Assist the Head to develop and implement strategic admission plans designed to achieve the school’s enrolment targets. These plans must be based on solid market analysis and aligned with the marketing and promotion activities.•Be directly responsible for the entire end-to-end admissions process including but not limited to:•Promote the school and enroll students through different channels.•Co-ordinate school tours and visits, demonstration lessons and any other promotional activities.•	Liaise with parents on admission enquiries.•Facilitate parent meetings with school staff - ensuring an enquiry proforma is completed.•Co-ordinate application and placement testing for prospective students.•Field all enquiries that are made to the Admissions Office. Maintain a complete and accurate record of parent/student details and a funnel of all prospective new student intake within the school management system.•Maintain good relations with key recruitment channels both in Cambodia and the overseas market. •Provide regular updates and data analysis on admission status to the Senior Leadership Team (SLT).  •Plan and manage both internal and external admissions events. •Assist and help to organize other school promotional events and provide onsite facilitation.•Visit appropriate potential partners, feeder schools and other potential strategic partners to market and promote school to the broader community.•Plan the annual and termly admissions budget. •Monitor expenditure in relation to the approved budget•Undertake other ad-hoc duties as assigned. Travel maybe required upon request.
Job Requirement: •Bachelor’s degree in business or related field•At least 2-year experience in sales and marketing•At least 2year experience in school admission •Exceptional communication and presentation skills•Proven ability in coaching a sales team•Solid computer skills•Willing to work in different place •Driven, committed to success while maintaining integrity

Job Description: • As to be customer service guest• Maintain daily cashier operation at the counter is smoothly • Maintain friendly behavior at all times during operation hours, especially during interaction with customers• Ensure all cash received from customers is counted before posting into the system and conforms with cash receipts.• Any suspicious note or cheque must be immediately contacted to Cashier Supervisor for verification • Generate daily receipt transaction reports from system• Compile the Internal cash transfer form• Prepare the daily teller cash count sheet• Responsible for any loss of cash or variance from the daily teller cash count sheet and daily receipt transaction report• To be familiar with the duties and responsibilities of all cashier staff
Job Requirement: - Bachelor Degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field.- At least one year experience in commission, Accounting, Finance, or related field- Proven working experience in a construction company is a plus- Good computer skills (Microsoft Office and Accounting Software)- NAV&BE-LAON System is a priority- Good in English (Chinese is plus advantage)- Independently follow up on pending issues, take initiative and solve problems- Willingness to learn and develop new skills

position: ប្រធានផ្នែកលក់ និងទីផ្សារហ្គាស
Job Description: 1-ទទួលខុសត្រូវផែនការលក់របស់អាជីវកម្មហ្គាសប្រភេទស៊ីទែនដែលបានកំណត់។2-ត្រូវរៀបចំយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្ពស់ ដើម្បិសម្រេចតាម គោលដៅហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងទីផ្សារក្រុមហ៊ុន។3-កសាងទំនាក់ទំនងរ៉ឹងមាំជាមួយអតិថិជនដែលមានស្រាប់ ចុះជួបសួរសុខទុក្ខជាប្រចាំ និងទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអតិថិជនថ្មីៗ ដើម្បីកង្កើនការលក់។4-ប្រមូលព័ត៌មានគូប្រជែង និងរៀបចំយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តប្រកួតប្រជែង ដើម្បី នាំមកនូវផលប្រយោជន៍ក្រុមហ៊ុន។5-ត្រូវយល់ដឹងអំពីចំណេះដឹងមូលដ្ឋានហ្គាស សុវត្ថិភាពហ្គាស ប្រព័ន្ធហ្គាស សេវាកម្មបែងចែក និងដឹកជញ្ជូនហ្គាសរួមទាំងបច្ចេកទេសហ្គាស ដើម្បីពន្យល់ជូនអតិថិជន ឲ្យទទួលបានការគាំទ្រ និងការពេញចិត្តខ្ពស់ពីអតិថិជន។6-គ្រប់គ្រងបំណុលហ្គាស ទារបំណុលហ្គាស ឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវតាមគោលការណ៍របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។7-គ្រប់គ្រងទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ប្រកប់ដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្ពស់ និងមានស្មារតីសន្សំសំចៃខ្ពស់។8-ចុះផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់បំណុលហ្គាស ជាប្រចាំរៀងរាល់ខែ។9-សហការយ៉ាងជិតស្និតជាមួយប្រធានការិយាល័យ និងការិយាល័យ ឬអង្គភាពពាក់ព័ន្ធ ដើម្បីបំរើសេវាជូនអតិថិជនឲ្យបានល្អប្រសើបំផុត និងដើម្បីកំនត់ផែនការយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តអាជីវកម្មឲ្យទទួលបានការគាំទ្រ និងការពេញចិត្តខ្ពស់ពីអតិថិជន។
Job Requirement: 1.ជំនាញជាន់ខ្ពស់ផ្នែកម៉ាឃីតធីង និងការលក់។2.ជំនាញជាន់ខ្ពស់ផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រង ចាត់ចែង។3.ជំនាញគ្រប់គ្រង និងដឹកនាំក្រុមការងារ។4.ជំនាញចរចារ និងកសាងទំនាក់ទំនង។5.ជំនាញក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនងផ្ទាល់មាត់ និងក្នុងការសរសេរ។6.មានជំនាញកុំព្យូទ័រ(Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Internet Email)7.មានបទពិសោធន៍ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអតិថិជនក្នុងស្រុក ប្រកបដោយជំនាញ និងប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្ពស់។8-សិក្សាថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រជំនាញ់ផ្នែកលក់ និងទីផ្សារ +អត្ថប្រយោជន៍-ប្រាក់ខែសមរម្យ-ការវាយតម្លៃតម្លើងប្រាក់បៀរវត្សន៍ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ-ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ (Seniority pay)-ធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារនឹងសុខភាព-ឱកាសដំឡើងតំណែង-ឱកាសរៀននឹងបណ្តុះបណ្តាល-បរិយាកាសការងារល្អ-ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ-ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភទូរស័ព្ទ(phone allowance)
Company Profile: Sokimex started from a humble beginning when the country was just waking up from a bleak chapter in her history. In this state, the company has to have two vital characteristic in order to prevail. Confidence and courage. Today we have developed a third trait in the company’s philosophy and that is Vision. We have confidence in our people, our partners and the free market. We have full confidence in the development of the country as long as it will take. Our confidence is shown in our eagerness to invest in long term projects and infrastructures. We do not like to go into short term projects because it will distract us from our long term goals. We invest in our people through education and knowledge. At the same time we have confidence in the Cambodian people to shape a progressive society. Our customers are also our long term business partners for without their continued support we will not grow and prosper. Without courage we will not be where we are today. We are proud we possess the courage to invest in large projects where others may shy away because it’s too risky. It’s not because we love to take risk but we have confidence in the people and country. We manage our risk with detailed analysis. It takes courage to deal in areas outside our core business. But we take it as a learning experience. We will not hesitate to draw in the best of talents both local and foreign to achieve our goals. And we go about it professionally and with honesty. We do not plan our business based on a five year plan, our vision is far longer. We forecast our business by the decades in the future because without doing so we might not be prepared for change. Just like in the glorious Angkorian era, the Angkor Wat was not build in a few years but it took generations of leaders with great vision over centuries to create something that last for ages. We represent the new Cambodian spirit 15 years after inception.

Job Description: ភារកិច្ចទទួលខុសត្រូវ-រៀបរៀង និងចេញប័ណ្ណប្រេងជូនបុគ្គលិកបើកបរ-ចុះបញ្ជីស្តុករបបប្រេង DO ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងប្រចាំខែតាមរថយន្តនីមួយៗ-រៀបចំបូកសរុបរបាយការណ៍ចំណាយ DO ប្រចាំខែ តាមបណ្តាអង្គភាពនានា-រៀបរៀងរបាយការណ៍ចំណាយសាច់ប្រាក់បេឡា និងត្រួតពិនិត្យរបាយការណ៍បេឡាតាមបណ្តាឃ្លាំង-រៀបចំរបាយកាណ៍ទូទាត់របបជើងប្រចាំខែជូនអ្នកបើកបរ-រៀបចំបញ្ជី និងតាមដានបរិមាណប្រេងស្តុកដែលចាក់បំពេញក្នុងរ៉េសឺវ័រ របស់រថយន្តនីមួយៗ-ចំណូលឈ្នួលដឹកតាមបណ្តាអង្គភាពនានា (ព្រែកព្នៅ, កំពង់សោម, បាត់ដំបង)-រៀបចំបញ្ជីវិភាគតាមដានការចំណាយប្រេង DO ដែលរថយន្តនីមួយបានប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃរួចរាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានអង្គភាពជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ/សប្តាហ៍-រៀបចំបញ្ជី វិភាគ និងសរុបរបាយការណ៍ចំណូល-ចំណាយតាមរថយន្តនីមួយៗ-ត្រួតពិនិត្យ លើការស្នើសុំបញ្ចេញ, បញ្ជូល ប្រេងម៉ាស៊ីន សំភារៈ គ្រឿងបន្លាស់ សំបកកង់រថយន្ត -វិភាគការចំណាយប្រេងរបបតាមអង្គភាពនានា-ត្រួតពិនិត្យ លើរបាយការណ៍ទូទាត់ផ្សេងៗប្រចាំខែ-រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែរួចត្រូវរាយការណ៍ និងបញ្ចូនទៅស្នាក់ការកណ្តាល-តាមដានតាមដានវត្តមានចេញចូលរបស់បុគ្គលិកនៃអង្ភភាពដឹកជញ្ជូន-រៀបចំលិខិតស្នើសុំ និងឯកសាររដ្ឋបាលផ្សេងៗ។ល័ក្ខខ័ណ្ឌការងារ1.មានបរិញ្ញាបត្ររង ឬបរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រប្រហាក់ប្រហែល.2.មានចំណេះដឹងទាក់ទងទៅនឹងផ្នែកគណនេយ្យយ៉ាងតិច1ឆ្នាំ3.អាយុចាប់ពី 23ឆ្នាំ - 35ឆ្នាំ4.មានជំនាញផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ និងមានភាពវៃឆ្លាតក្នុងការងារ5.អាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសារខ្មែរ និង អង់គ្លេសបានល្អប្រសើរ (អាចប្រើភាសាវៀតណាមបានកាន់តែប្រសើរ)6.មានជំនាញកុំព្យូទ័រ(Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Internet Email)7.មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការងារ,ធ្វើការការជាក្រុមបានល្អ,រូសរាយ,ស្មោះត្រង់,មានគំនិតឆ្នៃប្រឌិត,នឹងមានសមត្ថភាពដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា។
Job Requirement: +អត្ថប្រយោជន៍-ប្រាក់ខែសមរម្យ-ការវាយតម្លៃតម្លើងប្រាក់បៀរវត្សន៍ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ-ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ (Seniority pay)-ធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារនឹងសុខភាព-ឱកាសដំឡើងតំណែង-ឱកាសរៀននឹងបណ្តុះបណ្តាល-បរិយាកាសការងារល្អ-ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ-ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភទូរស័ព្ទ(phone allowance)
Company Profile: Sokimex started from a humble beginning when the country was just waking up from a bleak chapter in her history. In this state, the company has to have two vital characteristic in order to prevail. Confidence and courage. Today we have developed a third trait in the company’s philosophy and that is Vision. We have confidence in our people, our partners and the free market. We have full confidence in the development of the country as long as it will take. Our confidence is shown in our eagerness to invest in long term projects and infrastructures. We do not like to go into short term projects because it will distract us from our long term goals. We invest in our people through education and knowledge. At the same time we have confidence in the Cambodian people to shape a progressive society. Our customers are also our long term business partners for without their continued support we will not grow and prosper. Without courage we will not be where we are today. We are proud we possess the courage to invest in large projects where others may shy away because it’s too risky. It’s not because we love to take risk but we have confidence in the people and country. We manage our risk with detailed analysis. It takes courage to deal in areas outside our core business. But we take it as a learning experience. We will not hesitate to draw in the best of talents both local and foreign to achieve our goals. And we go about it professionally and with honesty. We do not plan our business based on a five year plan, our vision is far longer. We forecast our business by the decades in the future because without doing so we might not be prepared for change. Just like in the glorious Angkorian era, the Angkor Wat was not build in a few years but it took generations of leaders with great vision over centuries to create something that last for ages. We represent the new Cambodian spirit 15 years after inception.

Job Description: • Manage the contracts from date of issue to termination.• Follow up and review the weekly and monthly report.• Take meeting minute and be as interpreter for CEO in weekly meeting with key contractor/related department.• Review and double check all the related document before submit to CEO.• Prepare the letter as instruction from CEO and send it to the site.• Keep checking and review the material price list in the Market and find out more supplier.Requirement•Bachelor Degree in Management or related field.•Fluent in Khmer, and Vietnamese is a must.•Results driven, with excellent planning and organizational skills.•Highly motivated, strategic, detail-oriented individual with the ability to pro-actively organize a heavy workload and demonstrate excellent analytical abilities•Able to work under pressure with minimal supervision.•Ability to work independently
Job Requirement: Compensation &Benefits-  Competitive salary -  Red Pocket (Chinese New Year) -  Annual Staff Party -  5.5 working days-  SIM card + Credit allowance -  NSSF -  Policy complied by MoL-  Public Holidays based on MoL -  Holidays on Chinese New Year -  Promotion Opportunity-  Training & Development -  Good working environment -  Opportunity to grow within business unit in Sokimex Investment Group

Job Description: •	Prepare project specifications and detailed drawings of architectural works.•	To develop accurate construction drawings and extract data from the BIM platform•	To prepare production of shop drawings and as-built drawings, including BIM models if required.•	Attend appointed meetings, ensuring that relevant information is captured.•	Basic understanding of the detailed design process and coordinate design information•	Assist in the preparation of tender documentation and construction drawings•	Follow the model to align with the standards and goals set in the BIM Execution Plan and BIM project workflow criteria•	Conduct site visits to check on progress•	Develop accurate construction drawings and extract data from the BIM platform•	Performs other tasks as assigned by the direct supervisor.
Job Requirement: •	A recognized bachelor’s degree in the Architecture Engineering or equivalent •	A minimum of 1 year of experience in the role•	Good command of English communication both spoken and written•	Basic understanding of technical writing and discipline-specific design software (i.e., AutoCAD, REVIT, SketchUp)•	Proficient in Microsoft Office applications•	Experience in a Construction Company will be an advantage📨 Interested applicants, please submit your CV and Portfolio at https://www.cmedcc.com/en/employment-applicationMore information!!🌐 www.cmedcc.com📲 061 777 875 (Telegram)💬 https://t.me/CMEDCCCareers📨 careers@cmedcc.com
Company Profile: CMEDCC is a Cambodian construction company launched in Phnom Penh in 2015. After two years of successful operations in the Kingdom, we have become one of the leading construction companies in the country.Taking pride in being Cambodian and in the Kingdom’s history, great heritage, and rich culture, CMEDCC expects to be a main player in the construction industry in designing and building a better future for this country.With a current diverse professional team of approximately 300, with international management teams, all working hand in hand to deliver our commitment to: “Build for the Best”.We are currently looking for new talents to join our team. If you want to work for a fast-growing company offering wonderful professional career opportunities to its employees and a happy working environment, don’t miss out on what could be your future dream job.

Job Description: • Report to Property Management Supervisor with the day to day operations and tenant relations through the coordination of tenant requests and administration of maintenance services. • Answer and route phone calls from tenants and vendors to the appropriate contact within Property Management and/or dispatch personnel based on immediate needs. • Provide tenants and vendors with assistance in all aspects of scheduling building maintenance, communicating building procedures and supplying general building information. • Provide high quality of customer service, update and maintain current daily and emergency tenant contact lists and tenant information manuals. • Process correspondence for tenants, contractors and other third parties for Property Management staff. • Handle miscellaneous assignments as requested by management • Assist property manager as needed on special projects • Assist with the coordination of house handover preparation ADMINISTRATION• Process the handover contract both soft and hard copy.GENERAL• Assist and administer handover agreements • Dispatch tenant work orders; Maintain tenant work order e-mail • Handle tenant, vendor and prospective tenant walk-ins • Assist with tenant and vendor related interface as needed • Assist Property Manager with tenant relations as required Relationships• Internal: Customer Service supervisor, property management supervisor• External: Contract office, Sale office, Construction office.
Job Requirement:
	Bachelor Degree in Architect or engineering,   
	At least 1 years experience in customer service (Handover is preferable)
	Positive attitude, Good Behavior and Critical thinking 
	English language proficiency
	Computer skills (MS, Office)
	Be honest, courtesy and highly responsible and initiative person
	Good communication skills and relationship skills.
	Good time management.
	Commitment to learn and expand responsibility to move up to next level.

Job Description:
JOB RESPONSE & DUTY

1.	Facility Management
•	Property Handover and follow project to handover private unit and house to house owner
•	Work with facility management operations; support life safety and security protocols; maintain facilities to be highly functional, clean, and comfortable.
•	Oversee maintenance, repair, construction and renovation work; coordinate work from start to finish.

2.	Leasing Management 
•	Plan and implement the tenancy mix 
•	Conduct regular inspection of properties (vacant units and tenanted units)
•	Network and gather market information on competition and market trends Report on areas that requires attention, repairs, enhancements, etc
•	Lead in negotiation of tenancy agreements, manage lease renewals and arrears

3.	Operation 
•	Preparing operating reports and budgets
•	Ensuring all processes and compliance programs are met Ensuring the efficiency of all building systems
•	Managing facilities planning and space allocation Ensuring all processes and compliance programs are met
•	Preparing cost estimates for moves and equipment

4.	Property Controlling
•	Planning building maintenance and operational programs
•	Maintain complete and accurate property files and records, according to CEC systems, with an emphasis on documentation for future reference. Coordinate with Executive Education and Initiatives Director procedures for processing and distributing information. Provide prompt, detailed and accurate general status reports on all properties assigned.
•	Establish and maintain collaborative working relationships with all tenants and CEC Executive Leadership Team. Keep abreast of new technologies, systems and procedures related to property management.
•	Ensure the security of the building by researching and implementing various security measures, such as surveillance cameras or security staff members

5.	Utility Controlling 
•	Performs routine and preventative maintenance and repairs on booster pumps and equipment, lift stations and equipment, and treatment plant system components.
•	Set up plan and arrange technician to installs new and/or replaces motors, transformers, breakers, controllers, control valves, PLC's, and other electrical equipment as well as conduit, junction boxes, pulling cables and wires.
•	Record and Collect the utility fee

6.	Administrative work 
•	Handle certain administrative tasks, such as preparing reports for facility owners
•	Interview and hire certain facility employees and contractors, such as maintenance staff and janitorial services
•	Prepare reports for facility owners and attend regular meetings where the upkeep of the building is on the agenda

Job Description:
- Plan activities and allocate responsibilities as well as develop standard operation procedures for all departments to achieve the most efficient operating model;
- Develop proposals to initiate work and capital projects and oversee the timely construction of these projects;
- Manage and develop the Property Operations team and staffs with regard to performance appraisal, staff development, and team development, engagement and communication. 
- Conducts periodic on-site inspections, including quarterly inspection reports, and work with vendors and construction companies to handle warranty, various maintenance and repair items.
- Ensure all emergency repairs are completed in a timely required.
- Maintains property by investigating and resolving resident’s complaint; enforcing rules of occupancy; inspecting vacant units and completing repairs; planning renovations; contracting with landscaping.
- Maintain Property Management Databases;
- Solve accounts receivable problems which include late fees, defaults, and disputes;
- Review of monthly, quarterly and annual financial reports;
- Key role to interacts, communicates and answers incoming questions from prospective customers
- Plan & supervise the day-to-day handover activities to customers.
- Provide innovate solutions to ongoing challenges and ensure customer satisfaction and positive customer experience.
- Monitor the effectiveness of pre-handover inspections, ensure feedback is followed up and escalated where necessary. 
- Continuously improve, streamline and enforce the Handover policies & processes.
- Monitor current working practices, and effect changes in policies as and when required to enhance quality, achieve customer satisfaction and welfare.
- Supervise cost control, and ensure adherence to the budget.
- Plan and mange operational costs and budget forecast.

Job Description:
JOB RESPONSE & DUTY
1.	Daily Costing Operation Supporting
•	Daily posting stock issue for warehouse from project to project
•	Daily operation supporting with document attached and follow up
•	Update posting job journal , transfer order both manual and system
•	Cost Pricing / Invoicing of Inventory to related parties
•	Inventory Costing, including Construction Materials and Tool.
•	Comply with Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP) for financial statements
•	Supporting developing and maintain the cost accounting system, documents, and records of the organization
2.	Closed Weekly and Monthly Cost Report
•	Posting cost report in system timely basic
•	Spot check document attached and record to make sure it corrected
•	Supporting closed cost allocate and updated job both system and manual .
•	Support in Monthly physical stock count, input and reconcile with warehouse.
•	Assist cost supervisor to ensure monthly cost of goods sold by project accurate .
•	Assist cost supervisor for closed cost allocation by project and reconcile job posting.
•	Supporting supervisor/manager to ensure costing report are closed by timely and reconciliation .
3.	Other Cost Report Supporting
•	Support management for other reporting 
•	Regularly follow up with all project to obtain any revised BOM & BOQ before project started.
•	Other tasks assigned by Cost Account Manager
4.	Costing System Knowledge
•	Must able knowledge costing system and other related .
•	Understanding costing procedure and SOP
5.	Coordinate auditing and BOQ-BOM spot check
•	Supporting audit work for spot check site with warehouse issued
•	Assist Cost supervisor for site spot check with BOQ & BOM concern with site and material issued from warehouse by project.
•	Record concern and report to management
•	Supporting BOM & BOQ control 
•	Prepare and complete document internal cost audits
Job Requirement:
JOB REQUIREMENT

1.	កំរិតនៃការអប់រំ /Education Qualification
•	University Degree (Accounting Field)

2.	បទពិសោធន៍ការងារនិងចំណេះដឹង /Work Experience & Knowledge
•	At least 1 years of work experience in QS/QC ,Accounting /Cost control or related field
•	Experience in retail, wholesale, warehousing, or logistics, construction field
•	Good in English Language
•	SAP , ERP System

3.	ជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស /Technical Skills

•	Strong Proficient with computers and other standard office technology 
•	Knowledge how to reconcile report
•	Audit skill and problems solve 
•	Advance knowledge of Microsoft office, MS Excel and reporting tools

4.	ជំនាញទន់ /Soft Skills

•	Good in communication and interpersonal skills
•	Effective team and relationship building
•	Good knowledge in consultation, coaching and advisory
•	Work under pressure and flexible 
•	Strong commitment

Company Profile:
Footprints International School is an educational institution licensed with the Ministry of Education and registered under Eduinvest International Co. Ltd. The school currently operates in central Phnom Penh with one campus in Tuol Kork and another Tuol Tom Poung. Both campuses serve students from nursery to year twelve, covering the Cambridge International Curriculum and the Khmer National Program.

Accredited by the Western Association of Schools and Colleges (WASC), our community considers innovative approaches to teaching and learning the centric method to gear students’ towards our school wide learner outcomes. We support students in developing a growth mindset leading to lifelong habits in learning and a global mindset through which students adopt 21st century skills and sustainable living practices. Creativity is fostered through an integrative and experiential learning approach to Sciences, Technology, Engineering, the Arts and Mathematics (STEAM).

Our school highly values community engaged learning and experiences, with a special emphasis on Khmer Language and Culture. Through this program we aim to ensure that our learning is local, authentic and relevant. The holistic approach of these educational anchors is embedded in our vision, mission and values – and help guide the daily teaching and learning practices of Footprints.

Our core values are Responsibility, Compassion and Determination.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   011 555 407 hr@footprintsschool.edu.kh St. 135, No 84, Tuol Tompung, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 011 555 407

Job Description:
a.	Services to the Schools - Campuses and Departments 
i.	Support the ISP teachers to facilitate students’ learning whenever the subject teachers are not around including behavioral management, classroom organization, and preparation of materials as discussed with the subject teacher.
ii.	Support and manage the students daily activities in the classroom, during lunch time, during entrance and/or exit, during recess or extra curricular activities based on the schedule and hours provided by Administration.
iii.	Track student attendance and class schedules, set up necessary material for classes (e.g. projectors, zoom meetings etc.), in consultation and collaboration with the teachers and ISP management. 
iv.	Escort and supervise students during field trips and special school activities, under the direct supervision of the principal or ISP management.
v.	Be available to speak with parents before or after classes, or when called upon by the school management.
vi.	Maintain facilities, resources, and materials in the secondary classroom and the school.
vii.	Attend all school sponsored functions that occur during regular school hours, such as opening ceremony, graduation ceremony, staff meeting and professional development sessions.
viii.	Perform other reasonable administrative tasks as requested by the school management, aiming at supporting student learning and continuing to develop professionally.

b.	Services to the parents and students 
i.	 Be available for Parent-Teacher conferences at the end of each semester to discuss the semester’s progress which generally occur outside of working hours on a weekend.
ii.	 Respond to parents or initiate any contact deemed necessary throughout the school year which includes keeping records and informing staff of outcomes.
iii.	Provide care and ensure the safety and well-being of every child in the school with adequate supervision of a safe recreation and play period for the students during class break times.
iv.	Speak and behave in a professional manner towards all parents, students and staff of Footprints School.

c.	Health, Safety and Child Protection
i.	Conduct regular “risk assessments” in consultation and collaboration with the ISP management, faculties and staff.
Job Requirement:
●	Cambodian national
●	Bachelor Degree in Education with high-level English proficiency.  
●	Solid experience in Teaching and Learning Support 
●	At least 2-year experience in working in the education sector or international schools
●	Skillful in the use of Computer and ICT appliances and their features, particularly Google and G-Suite features.  
●	roof of reputable personal and professional integrity and records.

Job Description:
1.	Core Responsibilities
Core responsibilities for the position are inclusive of curriculum planning, research informed subject appropriate instruction and assessment.
Planning:
●	Design grade level, termly long-term plans that are used to guide time allocated to covering the Cambridge Computing Program curriculum content. 
●	Design medium term plans that will engage students in learning and secure their understanding of the Cambridge Primary Computing framework of objectives.     
●	Create daily, short-term plans that guide instruction and foster student led learning.
●	Integrate, where appropriate, student application of the schools ‘Schoolwide Learner Outcomes’ (SLOs).  

Instruction:
●	Apply research informed instructional techniques designed to secure student learning of the Cambridge Primary Computing framework of objectives.
●	Actively participate in the ‘Trust Based Observation’ process applied at Footprints for the purpose of continuing your instructional professional growth. 
●	Create a positive, nurturing learning environment that is conducive to academic, social and emotional growth for primary aged children.
●	Apply restorative practices that foster student lead regulation and restoration of their behavior.    

Assessment:
●	Design assessment activities that maximize the opportunity for Footprints students to demonstrate their achievement of the Cambridge Primary Computing framework of objectives that underpin their grade level and their application of the Footprints Schoolwide Learner Outcomes. 
●	Administer assessment activities, mark, upload and analyze students’ assessment results. 
●	Facilitate student application of formative assessments during lessons and use data collected to measure learning and inform instruction.
●	Report on student progress termly in Footprints primary report cards.  

Responsibilities in addition to planning, instruction and assessment:
●	Embody and facilitate student embodiment of the school’s mission and vision. 
●	Communicate student learning and reminders to the primary parent cohort weekly, through our Class Dojo digital communication platform.   
●	Apply the Footprints child protection policy by ensuring adequate supervision and well-being of our student cohort and reporting potential breaches of child protection to the school’s child protection lead. 
●	Meet with parents during scheduled Parent-Teacher conferences at the end of term and engage in schoolwide and programme-specific initiatives and events.
●	Attend all school functions and professional development sessions.
●	Maintain campus facilities, IT resources and materials provided to teach lessons and support student learning.
●	Any other reasonable task requested by the school leadership team. 

2.	Ethical Responsibilities:
●	Treat everyone with respect, show a positive attitude and follow the school’s policies and regulations. 
●	Demonstrate a willingness to grow professionally by being open to constructive discourse with the instructional coach, faculty and the leadership team.
●	Respect and protect the confidentiality of student records and information.
Job Requirement:
Qualification Requirements:
●	Bachelor Degree in Education or a relevant field
●	Experience in teaching in an international school environment. 
●	Experience in teaching the Cambridge Assessment International Examinations (CAIE) primary computing curriculum (or equivalent) is desired.
●	Experience in creating a written curriculum, inclusive of long and medium term planning, is desired.  
●	English as a first language or proof of professional English proficiency. 
●	A passion for teaching and working with primary aged children. 
●	Exemplary record of professional and personal integrity. 

Other qualification:
●	Have a teaching license.

Job Description:
- Plan activities and allocate responsibilities as well as develop standard operation procedures for all departments to achieve the most efficient operating model;
- Develop proposals to initiate work and capital projects and oversee the timely construction of these projects;
- Manage and develop the Property Operations team and staffs with regard to performance appraisal, staff development, and team development, engagement and communication. 
- Conducts periodic on-site inspections, including quarterly inspection reports, and work with vendors and construction companies to handle warranty, various maintenance and repair items.
- Ensure all emergency repairs are completed in a timely required.
- Maintains property by investigating and resolving resident’s complaint; enforcing rules of occupancy; inspecting vacant units and completing repairs; planning renovations; contracting with landscaping.
- Maintain Property Management Databases;
- Solve accounts receivable problems which include late fees, defaults, and disputes;
- Review of monthly, quarterly and annual financial reports;
- Key role to interacts, communicates and answers incoming questions from prospective customers
- Plan & supervise the day-to-day handover activities to customers.
- Provide innovate solutions to ongoing challenges and ensure customer satisfaction and positive customer experience.
- Monitor the effectiveness of pre-handover inspections, ensure feedback is followed up and escalated where necessary. 
- Continuously improve, streamline and enforce the Handover policies & processes.
- Monitor current working practices, and effect changes in policies as and when required to enhance quality, achieve customer satisfaction and welfare.
- Supervise cost control, and ensure adherence to the budget.
- Plan and mange operational costs and budget forecast.

Job Description: ១. ប្រតិបត្តិការផ្ទះបាយ (Kitchen Operations)•	ការត្រួតពិនិត្យសារពើភ័ណ្ឌនៅក្នុងផ្ទះបាយត្រូវប្រាកដថាត្រឹមត្រូវ។ - បញ្ជីលំដាប់អាហារ - ការចំណាយសន្សំសំចៃ •	ចម្អិនម្ហូបឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា •	រក្សារសជាតិ និងសោភ័ណភាពឲ្យបានល្អ•	ជួយពិនិត្យមើលការខុសត្រូវរាប់គ្រឿងទេសទាំងអស់ក្នុងផ្ទះបាយ•	ជួយពិនិត្យមើលភាពស្រស់របស់អាហារ និងបោះចោលរបស់ដែលហួសអាយុកាល•	សហការណ៍រវាងផ្នែកដែលពាក់ពន្ធ និងការគោរពរវាងមិត្តរួមការងារ២. ម្ហូបបុគ្គលិក  (Staffs Canteen)•	ចម្អិនម្ហូបបុគ្គលិកទៅតាមកាលវិភាគដែលមានស្រាប់•	ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងមើលអំពីស្តុបអាហារជាប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍៣. ធ្វើភេសជ្ជៈ (Beverages)•	ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការធ្វើភេសជ្ជៈសម្រាប់ភ្ញៀវ•	រក្សារសជាតិ និងអនាម័យទៅតាមស្តង់ដារដែលបានកំណត់៤. សេវាកម្ម និងទទួលការកម្ម៉ង់ (Service and Order)•	បម្រើ និងបំពេញនូវសេវាកម្មផ្នែកអាហារ និងភេសជ្ជៈ•	ទទួលស្វាគមន៍ និងរាក់ទាក់ទៅកាន់អតិថិជន•	ទទួលការកម្ម៉ង់ពីអតិថិជន•	ផ្តល់នូវសេវាកម្មជូនអតិថិជនដោយគោរពទៅតាមស្តង់ដារដែលបានកំណត់៥. ការងារផ្សេងៗ (Other Tasks)•	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗរបស់ភ្ញៀវ•	សម្អាតបរិវេណផ្ទះបាយ និងកន្លែងធ្វើភេសជ្ជៈឲ្យបានស្អាតជាប្រចាំ•	រៀបចំទុកដាក់នូវគ្រឿងទេស សម្ភារផ្ទះបាយឲ្យបានរៀបរយបន្ទាប់ពីប្រើប្រាស់រួច•	ការចែករំលែក និងការជួយគ្នាទៅវិញទៅមក គឺជាកាតព្វកិច្ចរបស់និយោជិតក្នុងការបំពេញការងារទាំងនៅក្នុងផ្នែក និងឆ្លងផ្នែក ដើម្បីសម្រេចបាននូវគោលដៅរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។ •	ការងារផ្សេងទៀតត្រូវបានចាត់ចែងតាមរយៈប្រធានផ្នែក នាយកផ្នែក ឬអគ្គនាយក ឬអគ្គនាយករងក្រុមហ៊ុន
Job Requirement: •	សមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រងពេលវេលាដ៏ល្អប្រសើរក្នុងការចម្អិនអាហារ •	សមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រងពេលវេលាដ៏ល្អប្រសើរក្នុងការធ្វើភេសជ្ជៈ

Job Description: ១. ប្រតិបត្តិការផ្ទះបាយ (Kitchen Operations)•	ការត្រួតពិនិត្យសារពើភ័ណ្ឌនៅក្នុងផ្ទះបាយត្រូវប្រាកដថាត្រឹមត្រូវ។ - បញ្ជីលំដាប់អាហារ - ការចំណាយសន្សំសំចៃ •	ចម្អិនម្ហូបឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា •	រក្សារសជាតិ និងសោភ័ណភាពឲ្យបានល្អ•	ជួយពិនិត្យមើលការខុសត្រូវរាប់គ្រឿងទេសទាំងអស់ក្នុងផ្ទះបាយ•	ជួយពិនិត្យមើលភាពស្រស់របស់អាហារ និងបោះចោលរបស់ដែលហួសអាយុកាល•	សហការណ៍រវាងផ្នែកដែលពាក់ពន្ធ និងការគោរពរវាងមិត្តរួមការងារ២. ម្ហូបបុគ្គលិក  (Staffs Canteen)•	ចម្អិនម្ហូបបុគ្គលិកទៅតាមកាលវិភាគដែលមានស្រាប់•	ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងមើលអំពីស្តុបអាហារជាប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍៣. ធ្វើភេសជ្ជៈ (Beverages)•	ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការធ្វើភេសជ្ជៈសម្រាប់ភ្ញៀវ•	រក្សារសជាតិ និងអនាម័យទៅតាមស្តង់ដារដែលបានកំណត់៤. សេវាកម្ម និងទទួលការកម្ម៉ង់ (Service and Order)•	បម្រើ និងបំពេញនូវសេវាកម្មផ្នែកអាហារ និងភេសជ្ជៈ•	ទទួលស្វាគមន៍ និងរាក់ទាក់ទៅកាន់អតិថិជន•	ទទួលការកម្ម៉ង់ពីអតិថិជន•	ផ្តល់នូវសេវាកម្មជូនអតិថិជនដោយគោរពទៅតាមស្តង់ដារដែលបានកំណត់៥. ការងារផ្សេងៗ (Other Tasks)•	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗរបស់ភ្ញៀវ•	សម្អាតបរិវេណផ្ទះបាយ និងកន្លែងធ្វើភេសជ្ជៈឲ្យបានស្អាតជាប្រចាំ•	រៀបចំទុកដាក់នូវគ្រឿងទេស សម្ភារផ្ទះបាយឲ្យបានរៀបរយបន្ទាប់ពីប្រើប្រាស់រួច•	ការចែករំលែក និងការជួយគ្នាទៅវិញទៅមក គឺជាកាតព្វកិច្ចរបស់និយោជិតក្នុងការបំពេញការងារទាំងនៅក្នុងផ្នែក និងឆ្លងផ្នែក ដើម្បីសម្រេចបាននូវគោលដៅរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។ •	ការងារផ្សេងទៀតត្រូវបានចាត់ចែងតាមរយៈប្រធានផ្នែក នាយកផ្នែក ឬអគ្គនាយក ឬអគ្គនាយករងក្រុមហ៊ុន
Job Requirement: •	សមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រងពេលវេលាដ៏ល្អប្រសើរក្នុងការចម្អិនអាហារ •	សមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រងពេលវេលាដ៏ល្អប្រសើរក្នុងការធ្វើភេសជ្ជៈ

Job Description: 1.	Recruitment – 20%	Continue implement as Recruitment JD & Scope2.	Central Point as HR Consultant – 20%	Conducts weekly meetings with respective business units/ divisions	Consults with line management, providing HR guidance and HR matter except pay calculation	Provides HR policy guidance and interpretation.	Assists international employees with expatriate assignments and related HR matters.	Provide guidance on the creation and implementation of HR processes and policies	Implementing reward and recognition interventions to increase bottom-line results and employee engagement 3.	Performance Management – 20%	Provide a consultant on KPI setting, evaluation, and training. 	Provides day-to-day performance management guidance to line management (e.g., coaching, counseling, career development, disciplinary actions).	Works closely with management and employees to improve work relationships, build morale, and increase productivity and retention.	Participates in evaluation and monitoring of training programs to ensure success.	Develops contract terms for new hires, promotions and transfers.	Identifies training needs for business units and individual executive coaching needs.	Follows up to ensure training objectives are met.4.	Employee Relations – 20%	Manages and resolves complex employee relations issues. Conducts effective, thorough and objective investigations.	Implementing reward and recognition interventions to increase bottom-line results and employee engagement 	Provide advice and suggestions for culture-related initiatives, such as cultural transformation 	Implement HRM interventions on employee wellness, diversity and inclusion, or talent management 	Working together with management and personnel to solve conflicts and help facilitate positive employee relations, maintain a good working environment, build morale, and decrease unwanted turnover5.	Employer Branding – 20%	Proposal initiative for HR activities to build company branding and connect to candidate pool	Prepare yearly calendar for activities and tracking the result
Job Requirement: Requirement:	Bachelor degree in Human Resource Management or any relevant fields.	3 years of experience in candidate recruiting.	Experience in HR is desirable.	Proficient in MS Office (Word, Excel, Outlook).	Recruiting experience within construction & real estate are plus	Strong verbal and written communication skills.	Strong interpersonal, negotiation, and communication skills.	Be able to work under tight timeline.	Ability to interface and communicate with all levels of the organization.	Ability to be discreet and handle confidential, sensitive information.	Must be a self-starter, problem-solver, and one who is able to work in a fast-paced environment.	Good in Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook.
