- This role will also be responsible for other RMAC projects that are determined by Group CEO and Country Manager Cambodia, as required.
- Internal and External Interactions.
Country Manager, Division General Managers, CFO, GMHR, Bangkok Group Office (CEO, COO, CFO).
- Business Councils / Forums (AMCHAM, BRITCHAM, etc), OEM's, relevant government departments, and Media.
Job Requirement:
- Relevant Degree qualifications (Business, Law, Commerce, Finance etc) and additional educational qualifications are a plus (MBA).
- Minimum of 5 years of experience in business development, sales, or a related role.
- Strategic thinker with the ability to identify and capitalize on market opportunities.
- Results-driven with a focus on achieving targets and driving business growth.
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  070790890 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net Phnom Penh #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 070790890

- Follow 10 steps showroom walk around

- Cost saving (related to business operations) have to save cost in every using of electric, telephone, aircon, water, LCD, Demo car in an important case, brochure, leaflets, any material sales and marketing tools, taking care of computer, stationary, keep workplace tidy and clean…,etc
- Document Process: Have to complete all document process required

- Fresh Graduate also can apply depend on communication
- Have experience in sales also good

Job Description:

• Closer relationship with dealership divisions of RMA Cambodia and other dealers and assets suppliers
• Planning and Daily visits new customers\

Problem solving

jobUrl: https://www.camhr.com/a/job/10584586?title=រដ្ខបាល និងធនធានមនុស្ស
job title: រដ្ខបាល និងធនធានមនុស្ស
position: រដ្ខបាល និងធនធានមនុស្ស
Job Description:
ម៉ោងធ្វើការ៖ ម៉ោង៨ព្រឹក ដល់ម៉ោង៥ល្ងាច 
ទីតាំងធ្វើការ៖ ភូមិអូរពោហ៏ ឃុំរមណី ស្រុករវៀង ខេត្តព្រះវិហារ 

*** ផ្នែកធនធានមនុស្ស៖ 
- ពីនិត្យនិងរៀបចំលើការគ្រប់គ្រងនិទិន្នន័យបុគ្គលិករួមទាំងរបាយការណ៏បម្រែបម្រួលបុគ្គលិក
- គ្រប់គ្រងលើការបញ្ជូលបុគ្គលិកថ្មីក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធ និងព្រីនកាតសម្គាល់បុគ្គលិក 
- ការប្រើប្រាស់និងធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពសំណើរតាមប្រព័ន្ធ
- ចូលរួមអនុវត្ត និងសម្របសម្រួលនីតិវិធីជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៏បម្រែបម្រួលបុគ្គលិក និងប្រាប់បៀវត្សប្រចាំខែ
- សម្របសម្រួលការតម្រង់ទិសបុគ្គលិកដែលមានតម្រូវការការខ្វះខាត
- រៀបចំទិន្នន័យចំណាយសម្រាប់កម្មករចៀរជ័កៅស៊ូ
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៏កម្មករចៀរជ័កៅស៊ូតាមភូមិដែលទទួលប្រាក់ទិន្នផល 
- គ្របគ្រងនិងរៀបចំភាគទាន ប.ស.ស ប្រចាំខែ។ 

*** ផ្នែករដ្ឋបាល៖ 
- គ្រប់គ្រងការទិញសម្ភារៈប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងការិយាល័យ
- គ្រប់គ្រង និងរៀបចំលិខិតរដ្ធបាលពេលចេញចូល
- រៀបចំសំណើរស្នើរសុំផ្សេងៗមកទីស្នាក់ការកណ្តាល
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៏រដ្ធបាលប្រចាំខែ
- រៀបចំកំណត់ហេតុប្រជុំ
- គ្រប់គ្រងឯកសារចុះបញ្ជីរ និងឯកសារផ្លូវច្បាប់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន 
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៏និងចូលរួមកិច្ចប្រជុំការងារប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- ការងារផ្សេងទៀតដែលបានចាត់តាំងពីប្រធានផ្នែក​។​
Job Requirement:
- ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៏ការងារប្រហាក់ប្រហែលយ៉ាងតិច ៣ឆ្នាំ
- ត្រូវបញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាំប័ត្រជំនាញគ្រប់គ្រង ឬជំនាញដែឡពាក់ព័ន្ធ
- មានជំនាញក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនង
- ចេះអាន និងសរសេរភាសាអង់គ្លេសបានល្អ
- ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ (Microsoft Office, Internet and Email) 
- មានចរឹតស្លូតបូត ស្មោះត្រង់ និងអត់អ្មត់នឹងការងារ
Company Profile: Try Pheap Group Co., Ltd was established in 2013 and based in Phnom Penh. Try Pheap Group Co., Ltd has multi-business such as Agro-Industry, Construction, Hotel, Casino and Restaurant and those businesses are located in many provinces in Cambodia.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   Tel & Telegram: 096 915 0046 recruitment.ho@tpgroup.com.kh #3, Phreah Norordom Blvd, Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. Tel & Telegram: 096 915 0046

jobUrl: https://www.camhr.com/a/job/10584640?title=រដ្ឋបាល និងគណនេយ្យ
job title: រដ្ឋបាល និងគណនេយ្យ
position: រដ្ឋបាល និងគណនេយ្យ
Job Description:
** ភារកិច្ច និង ការទទួលខុសត្រូវ
- គ្រប់គ្រងចំណូលចំណាយ និងរបាយការគណនេយ្យទូទៅ
- គ្រប់គ្រងបញ្ជីប្រាក់បៀវត្ស និង ទិន្នន័យបុគ្គលិក-កម្មករទូទាំងក្រុមហ៊ុន
- ប្រកាសពន្ធលើប្រាក់បៀវត្ស និង បេឡាជាតិសន្តិសុខសង្គម (បសស)
- គ្រប់គ្រង អនុវត្ត និង សម្របសម្រួលលើនីតិវិធីជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក
- រៀបចំការបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាល និង តម្រង់ទិសដល់បុគ្គលិក
- ជួយប្រធានក្នុងការពិនិត្យ កែសម្រួលគោលការណ៍ និង បទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងសម្រាប់ក្រុមហ៊ុន (សាខា)

Company Profile:
BBE Group Co., Ltd. is legitimately registered under Cambodian legislation. We have more than ten years of experience in the infrastructure industry. Our areas of expertise include the design and construction of rigid and flexible pavements, drainage systems, bridges, ports, and the installation of sheet piling.

BBE Group Co., Ltd. is confident in its ability to successfully complete all types of complex work because of its educated and qualified local workforce.

After many years of operating in this industry we can see it’s rapidly expanding, hence we decided to open a factory to make high-quality reinforced concrete pipe for internal usage and external sale as well.

Job Description: •	Performing a wide range of engineering tasks by operating computer-assisted design or engineering software and equipment.•	Conferring with teamwork, customers, and others to discuss existing or potential engineering products or projects.•	Ensuring that installation and operations conform to standards and customer requirements by preparing electrical systems specifications, technical drawings, or topographical maps.•	Establishing construction, manufacturing, or installation standards or specifications by performing a wide range of detailed calculations.•	Ensuring compliance with specifications, codes, or customer requirements by directing or coordinating installation, manufacturing, construction, maintenance, documentation, support, or testing activities.•	Writing reports and compiling data regarding existing and potential electrical engineering projects and studies.•	Preparing specifications for purchases of electrical equipment and materials.•	Supervising or training project team members.•	Estimating material, labor, or construction costs for budget preparation.•	Maintaining electrical equipment.•	Working with a variety of technicians.•	Perform other tasks assign by manager

Company Profile:
BBE Group Co., Ltd. is legitimately registered under Cambodian legislation. We have more than ten years of experience in the infrastructure industry. Our areas of expertise include the design and construction of rigid and flexible pavements, drainage systems, bridges, ports, and the installation of sheet piling.

BBE Group Co., Ltd. is confident in its ability to successfully complete all types of complex work because of its educated and qualified local workforce.

After many years of operating in this industry we can see it’s rapidly expanding, hence we decided to open a factory to make high-quality reinforced concrete pipe for internal usage and external sale as well.

Only short-listed candidates will be contacted for interview.
Company Profile:
About Smiling Gecko Cambodia:
In 2014, Smiling Gecko Cambodia (SGC) was officially registered as a local NGO in Cambodia. SGC is legally independent of Smiling Gecko Switzerland. Following its mission of «Cambodians help Cambodians», the organization provides direct aid to disadvantaged people in the country, supporting local job initiatives and promoting self-help among the rural population. Apart from providing direct aid and supporting other NGOs, Smiling Gecko, thus, focuses on fighting the causes of poverty and helping people to help themselves. To this end, SGC launched a project on a previously acquired site to the North of Phnom Penh whose objective is to provide several thousand Cambodians with future job training and a regular income in the sectors of agriculture, tourism, industry, and trade. In future, the proceeds are intended to cover the operating costs of the innovative pilot school, which is also part of the cluster and provides education to nearly 1,000 children (from preschool to senior high school).
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department    recruitment@smilinggecko-cambodia.org Kampong Chhnang  Srae Sar village, Tbaeng Khpos commune, Samakki Meanchey district, Kompong Chhnang province, Cambodia.

Job Description:
• Achieve and exceed sales targets by promoting and selling products to new and existing customers, generating leads, and closing sales deals.
• Process customer orders accurately and efficiently, liaising with the MLPs/WS delivery service and CDE teams to ensure timely delivery of products and other services needed.
• Execute sales plans for assigned territories and sales routes, identifying, and prioritizing key customers and prospects as defined plan.
• Merchandise the control outlets to ensure that all the look of success by the channel are executed as per the trade marketing program’s standards and guidelines such as cooler location, shelf display, floor display, POSM, and FEFO.  
• Conduct engaging product presentations and demonstrations to showcase the features and benefits of the company's products and persuade customers to make purchases.
• Build and maintain strong, long-lasting relationships with customers, including retailers, wholesalers, and distributors, by understanding their needs and providing exceptional customer service.
• Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and customer feedback to identify opportunities & challenges and report back to relevant stakeholders.
• Provide regular sales reports and forecasts to ASM/RSM, highlighting successes, challenges, and opportunities for improvement.
Job Requirement:
• High school diploma or equivalent. 
• At least 1 year experience in sales, preferably in the FMCG sector.
• Strong interpersonal, communication, and negotiating skills effectively.
• Strong organizational and time management skills.
• Excellent presentation and demonstration skills.
• Self-motivated and results-driven, with a proven track record of achieving sales targets.
• Willingness to travel within the assigned sales territory and occasionally beyond.
• Ability to work independently as well as part of a team.
• A valid motorbike or car driver’s license.
• Familiarity with digital sales tools.
Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.
Contact Info: Contact Information TALENT ACQUISITION TEAM  096 48 99 677 / 012 916 444 hrd@coca-cola.com.kh No.287, National Road 5, Mittapheap Village, Russey Keo District, Phnom Penh,  Kingdom of Cambodia. 096 48 99 677 / 012 916 444

Job Description:
1.	Achieve assigned area’s secondary sales target volumes by brand
	Plan, develop, manage, control, implement and evaluate sales activities to ensure achievement of secondary sales target volumes by brand
	Provide effective leadership to a team of Field Sales and conduct field accompaniments
	Ensure effective execution of the FIT strategies to maximise sell-out/sales opportunities
	Ensure proper execution of national and localised promotions
	Provide feedback on market information to gain competitive advantage by pre-empting competitor’s moves and work with the relevant parties for counter measures
	Conduct and review business performance periodically with sales team, distributors and customers
2.	Achieve assigned distributors’ secondary sales target volumes by brand and distributor stock level
	Ensure distributors adhere to the planning cycle for placement for orders and payment on time in full to achieve the secondary sales target volumes
	Assess distributors’ implementation of the Distributors’ Management/Development Framework including periodic reviews.
	Alert Regional Sales Manager in the event of violation of fundamental principles on territory demarcation and logical route scheduling
3.	Increase distribution network via DMS entry of any Cambrew brands to meet agreed standards
	Effectively manage Cambrew and distributor sales teams according to outlet coverage plan
	Enforcement of the Distributor Demarcation plan to ensure optimal route coverage
	Periodic monitoring and assessment of distributor performance based on agreed set of objectives and targets
4.	Achieve effective spend of allocated Regional Tactical Spend (RTS) in compliance with approved guidelines and compliance
	Plan, budget and utilise the allocated RTS to ensure optimal returns based on agreed set of objectives and targets
5.	Achieve the desired image of Cambrew products in areas of Placement and Promotions
	Execute merchandising plans by ensuring adequate, selective and strategic placement of all merchandising and point-of-sales materials (POSMs)
	Ensure effective utilisation of amenities to create and increase brand awareness and visibility
6.	Achieve 100% strike rates for Perfect Serve (Freshness) targets for Cambrew products
	Ensure distributors’ aged stocks claims are within the company’s % standard against volume
	Effective implementation of stock rotation policies and first-in-first-out (FIFO) practice
7.	Develop and grow Cambrew and Distributor sales team’s efficiency and effectiveness, including brand promoters
	Coach and train using the appropriate agreed training modules
	Conduct field accompaniments, on-the-job training and leadership
8.	Develop local business and enhance corporate relation with Cambrew’s customers and trade (inclusive of trade association and common complaints)
	Increase networking by participation and supporting of trade related activities.
	Evaluate and manage any product and trade complaints and to ensure that these complaints are effectively handled and to refer to HQ for further action, if necessary
9.	Distributor conformance to Cambrew’s Commercial Policy and Legislation, and Distributorship Agreement
	Ensure periodic auditing practices are carried out properly to distributors
Job Requirement:
1.	University degree, preferably in Business Administration
2.	Preferably 3-5 years of experience in the area of Sales in FMCG industry
3.Keen analytical mind
4. Entrepreneurship skills
5. Computer knowledge (Ms. Office Applications)
6. Good command of English, written and spoken

Job Description:
Purpose of the position:

Assisting the Head of Department in providing consumers insight to relevant departments by observing market developments, by collecting information on market, and by working with the research agencies in setting up, implementing regular and ad-hoc Carlsberg Cambodia research programs. 


Core Responsibilities

Market Insights and Analytics: 
- Evaluate the market situation and performance of the company across all dimensions (products, selling price, services, customer satisfaction rating etc.).
- Manage the partnerships with research agencies that provide regular and ad hoc research services to the company
- Gather relevant industry information, analyze and prepare reports based on Primary Market Data, Competitors Movements & Trend Analyses based on the 4P’s principles of marketing.
- Handle the agencies research briefs, contracting, project set up and financial documents of the research projects along with the other relevant offices in the company (i.e finance, legal, procurement etc.)
- Support the Head of Department in projects and requests from regional and global offices.
- Participate with the Head of Department in developing and implementing the yearly research plan.
- Oversee the data collection and reporting of the market activities in the industry
- Work with relevant departments to provide analysis of product and promotion performance, price points, service quality, POSM deployment, and activations.
- Assist Head of Department by providing fact-based learnings from the field on consumer behaviors and customer preferences (trade promos, key dealer incentives, ring pull promotions).
- Compile all competitors’ activity and key success then translating to proposal plan.
Job Requirement:
Competency Requirements 

- Preferably a minimum of 2 years in a FMCG environment with at least 2 years’ experience in Market research, Sales, or related files.
- Strong knowledge of the consumer research methods and analytical tools 
- Strategic thinking, planning, control, and execution skills
- Analytical and numerical skills
- Assertive, self-confident, and matured with good problem-solving skills
- Good, presentation and computer skills (Knowledge of SPSS is a plus)
- Working knowledge of finance (invoicing, PO generation etc.)
- Good at interpersonal and communication skills
- Be able to travel long distance

Education & Other requirements

- Degree in statistics, Economic, Business, or another related field
- At least Upper-intermediate level of English proficiency
- Be familiar with Statistics, MS Word or Excel and PowerPoint.

Job Description:
People Management:

• Brings in the awareness and develops the understanding of 
Carlsberg Excellence across all levels of the organization, makes sure everyone knows their role within the team and contributes accordingly.
• Effectively communicates changes to brewery team and all stakeholders to reduce potential risks, threats or resistance to changes. 
• Builds people capability throughout the organization 
fully utilizing the community to gather momentum and grows individuals.
• Collaborates with other functions and within supply 
chain to hold people accountable for delivering improvement. 
• Maintains awareness on a regular basis and improves continuously.
• Recognizes good work within the area.
• Rigorously following up HSE, food safety and hygiene and standards within the area.
• Responsible for coordinating technological, material, way of working related change initiatives in the packaging department including training and development.

Process Management:

• Uses concepts of cost loss tree and root cause analysis to diagnose issues and quantifies/evaluates improvement opportunities. 
• Identifies appropriate internal and external KPI’s to track performance for the area of responsibility. 
• Ensures KPIs meet the agreed definitions and used to
measure results in timely and consistent manner. 
• Develops plans to take corrective action.
• Initiates improvements on the workplace organization in order to improve labor productivity, safety and hygiene.
• Participates in developing of process sheets and changeover matrixes if any.
• Defines and maintains the optimum process parameters 
to ensure the maximum efficiency of the equipment and production in accordance with the standards set in the COM and technical specifications.
• Calibrates line measuring systems and establishes process capability parameters. 
• Analyzing the root causes of process failures, loss 
of raw & packaging materials as well as finished goods and other quality issues. Takes part in the development of measures to prevent and eliminate them in the production process. 
• Understands the manpower, utilities and consumables loss value within start-ups.
• Understands food hygiene and safety standards and the impact on machinery and material requirements.
• Identifies the root causes of equipment malfunctions 
or defects. If necessary, can take part in the repair, installation, testing and adjustment of particularly complex parts of the equipment (units and machines) in cooperation with maintenance.
• Develops and support lines team to create and update 
Carlsberg Excellence activity boards.
• Conducting internal meetings aimed at developing 
measures to prevent and eliminate non-conformities and reduce losses.
• Continuously demonstrates and promotes root causes analysis, defines countermeasures and validates their effectiveness within the team.
• Responsible for ensuring utility standards related 
to the area are complied with COM, drives SOP development and process confirmation included PepsiCo standard. 
• Ensures collaboration and integration among the Carlsberg Excellence pillars.

Performance Management:

• Actively supports utility agenda and drive performance.
• Actively works on Carlsberg Excellence targets leading the development of the implementation approach in alignment with Site KPI/KAI.
• Supports and in some specific cases owns the targets 
delivery of efficiency and effectiveness by bringing in “New ways of working”.
• Verifies if actual savings are meeting expectations and delivering expected business benefits for production cost reduction.
Job Requirement:
• University degree in Engineering (chemical or food 
technologies).
• 1-3 years’ experience from relative position in Production environment would be an advantage.
• Demonstrates commitment and personal ownership and sticks to decisions taken.
• Sets clear and stretch objectives and rigorously tracks their delivery.
• Personally, ensures the team has capability to deliver.
• Involves and inspires others and gives people responsibility.
• Detects and encourages talent and coaches towards for 
company targets.
• Takes and executes decisions with quality and speed.
• Plans effectively, sets priorities and puts ideas into 
practice.

Job Description:
Purpose of the position:
Responsible for effective and efficient implementation of FIT, overall and specified promotions in individual designated outlets by ensuring all activities are properly carried out according to the Quality, Availability, Affordability and Perfect Execution (QAAP) standards 

Core Responsibilities:
- Proactively implement the 6 steps call 
- Effectively and efficiently implementing the Picture of Success (PicOS)  
- Regularly visiting customers according to Journey Route Plan generated from current available support system - SFA and provide excellent sales and customer service, and report any change of customers 
- Continuously and gradually achieving monthly sales target set 
- Ensure healthy of all product range in all outlets of designated area 
- Establish, maintain and develop positive relationships with all outlets 
- Expand new business opportunities through: 
  1. Opening of new outlets within the designated area of coverage 
  2. Identifying, initiating and selling-in of consumer promotions  
  3. Ensuring selling-out of Cambrew’s products/brands from the outlets 
  4. Creating exclusive outlets
- Share best practice and key success/failure learning to the team
Job Requirement:
- Minimum Secondary School/Certificate holders 
- Minimum 1 to 2 years of experience in selling FMCG products 
- Passionate and commitment in achieving results 
- Enthusiastic, energetic and willing to work under pressure and long hours with minimum supervision 
- Integrity, Trustworthy and reliable 
- Good communication skills
Basic knowledge and understanding of the industry, market, competitors, and customers 
- Basic knowledge in assigned territories 
- Good communication and negotiation skills 
- Basic research and analytical skills 
- Proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint)

Job Description:
1.	Achieve assigned area’s secondary sales target volumes by brand
	Plan, develop, manage, control, implement and evaluate sales activities to ensure achievement of secondary sales target volumes by brand
	Provide effective leadership to a team of Field Sales and conduct field accompaniments
	Ensure effective execution of the FIT strategies to maximise sell-out/sales opportunities
	Ensure proper execution of national and localised promotions
	Provide feedback on market information to gain competitive advantage by pre-empting competitor’s moves and work with the relevant parties for counter measures
	Conduct and review business performance periodically with sales team, distributors and customers
2.	Achieve assigned distributors’ secondary sales target volumes by brand and distributor stock level
	Ensure distributors adhere to the planning cycle for placement for orders and payment on time in full to achieve the secondary sales target volumes
	Assess distributors’ implementation of the Distributors’ Management/Development Framework including periodic reviews.
	Alert Regional Sales Manager in the event of violation of fundamental principles on territory demarcation and logical route scheduling
3.	Increase distribution network via DMS entry of any Cambrew brands to meet agreed standards
	Effectively manage Cambrew and distributor sales teams according to outlet coverage plan
	Enforcement of the Distributor Demarcation plan to ensure optimal route coverage
	Periodic monitoring and assessment of distributor performance based on agreed set of objectives and targets
4.	Achieve effective spend of allocated Regional Tactical Spend (RTS) in compliance with approved guidelines and compliance
	Plan, budget and utilise the allocated RTS to ensure optimal returns based on agreed set of objectives and targets
5.	Achieve the desired image of Cambrew products in areas of Placement and Promotions
	Execute merchandising plans by ensuring adequate, selective and strategic placement of all merchandising and point-of-sales materials (POSMs)
	Ensure effective utilisation of amenities to create and increase brand awareness and visibility
6.	Achieve 100% strike rates for Perfect Serve (Freshness) targets for Cambrew products
	Ensure distributors’ aged stocks claims are within the company’s % standard against volume
	Effective implementation of stock rotation policies and first-in-first-out (FIFO) practice
7.	Develop and grow Cambrew and Distributor sales team’s efficiency and effectiveness, including brand promoters
	Coach and train using the appropriate agreed training modules
	Conduct field accompaniments, on-the-job training and leadership
8.	Develop local business and enhance corporate relation with Cambrew’s customers and trade (inclusive of trade association and common complaints)
	Increase networking by participation and supporting of trade related activities.
	Evaluate and manage any product and trade complaints and to ensure that these complaints are effectively handled and to refer to HQ for further action, if necessary
9.	Distributor conformance to Cambrew’s Commercial Policy and Legislation, and Distributorship Agreement
	Ensure periodic auditing practices are carried out properly to distributors
Job Requirement:
1.	University degree, preferably in Business Administration
2.	Preferably 3-5 years of experience in the area of Sales in FMCG industry
3.Keen analytical mind
4. Entrepreneurship skills
5. Computer knowledge (Ms. Office Applications)
6. Good command of English, written and spoken

Company Profile: MVL is a blockchain-based mobility company that started in 2018 that aims to build a reliable mobility ecosystem by recording data through innovative blockchain technology. Starting as a vehicle ride-hailing platform company under the name TADA, we have a business model that increases the application of blockchain technology through each new service we build.ONiON Mobility, a subsidiary of MVL, provides electric vehicles and related infrastructure mainly in Cambodia. TADA, another subsidiary, provides ride-hailing services mainly in Singapore, Cambodia and Vietnam and is building a mobility ecosystem by improving the profit structure of drivers through a new model that is completely different from existing companies.ONiON Mobility is actively conducting business in Cambodia by launching the T1, an eco-friendly version of the three-wheeled passenger vehicle “Tuk-Tuk”. We have established an EV factory to mass-produce our T1’s, and are operating electric vehicle charging stations all over the city of Phnom Penh. In addition to expanding our business throughout Cambodia, we are expanding our business to overseas regions by diversifying our product lineup, including the T1c for eco-friendly cargo transportation and eco-friendly bikes. In particular, the T1 provides a mileage of more than 100km and is an eco-friendly vehicle that does not have the inconvenience of long charging times by adopting a battery exchange method instead. ONiON has gained popularity in the local market by reducing maintenance costs of our E Tuk-Tuk’s by about 40% of the normal internal combustion vehicles because there is no need of frequent replacement of parts and high oil price. In addition, ONiON Mobility plans to collect and utilize all data generated from vehicles and stations for efficient operation and management at the MVL group level as well as to share the benefits to all the participants in the ecosystem created by MVL.

Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
2- HLHI (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
3- Royal Hong Lai Haut One Company Limited.
4- Jewel A Development Co., Ltd.
5- Agri-Oral Joint Cooperate Co., Ltd.

Company Profile: Our vision as a school is to prepare and equip our young people with the knowledge, skills, understanding, and attitude to thrive and then take on the world.Our mission is to provide exceptional care and education to children while fostering each child’s intellectual, social, physical, emotional, and moral development in an academic-rich environment.The curriculum at BISPP has derived from Vision and Mission statements, along with our definition of teaching and learning adapted from the International Early Year Curriculum (IEYC) and Cambridge Curriculum. These curriculums are to ensure great learning, great teaching, and great fun and to prepare our young children to take on the world. Teaching and learning: BISPP is seeking to develop self-esteem and pleasure in learning through a stimulating, supportive and happy environment that provides all students and staff with opportunities to achieve their full potential in knowledge, skills, understanding, and behavior to be globally competitive. Personal development: BISPP values punctuation, honesty, creativity, kindness, independence, and interdependence, communication, exploring, healthy living, trust, and tolerance. Respect: BISPP is requiring our staff and students to show respect for ourselves, other people, our environment, school property, and individual property.

Job Description:
The Role: We are seeking a dedicated and results-driven Student Support Teacher to join our dynamic
Student Support Services team. This role is pivotal in enhancing our students' phonics and reading
abilities, ensuring they achieve their full potential through personalized support and intervention.
• Implement targeted phonics and reading programmes to improve students' literacy skills.
• Monitor and assess student progress, adapting teaching strategies to meet individual needs.
• Employ differentiation and scaffolding techniques to support a diverse range of learners.
• Collaborate with colleagues to develop and refine curriculum materials that meet the needs of
all students.
• Engage with students, parents, and other educators to promote a holistic approach to student
success.
• Participate in professional development opportunities to stay abreast of best practices in
student support and literacy education.
• Engage with students in small groups or one-on-one sessions and offer support in the classroom.
• Utilise a variety of assessment tools, including formative assessments, observations, quizzes,
and projects, to gather comprehensive data on each student's learning journey.
• Employ digital platforms and learning management systems (LMS) for real-time tracking and
analytics, providing insights into student engagement, comprehension, and skill acquisition.
• Schedule regular intervals for assessments to ensure continuous monitoring of student progress.
• Encourage self-assessment and peer feedback to foster a reflective learning environment.
• Analyse the collected data to identify strengths, areas for improvement, and specific interests of
each child.
• Engage with students, and possibly parents, to set achievable, personalised learning objectives
that align with the curriculum standards and the child's aspirations.
• Design ILPs that incorporate differentiated instruction methods, catering to various learning
styles and abilities. This might include visual aids, hands-on activities, or technology-enhanced
learning tools.
• Plan for regular review and adjustments to the ILP, ensuring it remains relevant and challenging
as the child progresses.
• Incorporate both qualitative observations and quantitative data to provide a holistic view of the
child's progress.
• Use clear, positive language, and ensure all reports are accessible to parents and guardians,
demystifying educational jargon.
• Offer constructive feedback and specific examples of work or behaviours that exemplify the
student's achievements and areas for improvement.
• Schedule parent-teacher meetings to discuss the report, providing an opportunity for dialogue,
feedback, and collaboration on supporting the child's learning.
Job Requirement:
• Qualification in Education, Special Education, or a related field.
• Demonstrated success in improving student outcomes in phonics and reading.
• Experience with differentiation and scaffolding strategies.
• Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
• Ability to work collaboratively within a team environment.
• For non-native English speakers, a minimum IELTS score of 6.5 is required.
Preferred:
• SSP Phonics training, such as Jolly Phonics or Read, Write Inc. and literacy programme or
previous SSS experience.
How to Apply: Please submit your CV and a cover letter outlining your suitability for the role and your
approach to student support.
Brightstar is committed to equality and diversity in employment and welcomes applications from all
sections of the community.

Job Description:
• Strategic Culinary Leadership: Create and execute group-centric culinary initiatives. Manage group menu creation and innovation to ensure variety and local cuisines.
• Operational Excellence: Manage culinary staff to ensure high-quality meal preparation. Streamline kitchen process to boost productivity and food quality.
• Financial Management: Control food costs, procurement, and inventories for the culinary budget. Cost-effective operations and intelligent menu pricing boost financial success.
• Team Management and Development: Lead, coach, and develop the hotel culinary teams to promote quality, innovation, and professional progress. Perform frequent performance reviews and provide comments.
• Quality Control and Compliance: Ensure all culinary services fulfill regulatory health, safety, and hygiene standards. Use and monitor quality control in all kitchens.
• Vendor and Stakeholder Relations: Maintain supplier ties to get high-quality ingredients. Work with hotel management and marketing to improve guest dining and culinary events.
• Innovation and Trends: Follow culinary trends and use cutting-edge kitchen technology to improve productivity and client pleasure.
Job Requirement:
• A bachelor's degree in culinary arts, hotel and restaurant management, or comparable discipline.
• 10 years of culinary management experience, including 5 years as a senior leader of various hotel or hospitality kitchens.
• Advanced understanding of culinary methods, cuisines, and kitchen equipment.
• Successful menu development and culinary excellence.
• Mentoring and motivating a diverse workforce requires strong leadership abilities.
• Good organization, budgeting, and problem-solving.
• Multitasking, pressure management, and adaptability.
• Successful collaboration with team members, management, and external partners requires strong communication and interpersonal skills.
• Passion for cooking and a desire to learn about new trends and techniques.

Job Description:
• Maintain good contacts with farmers, distributors, and other fresh food providers.
• Find dependable and affordable fruit and vegetable suppliers via market research.
• Negotiate supplier rates, contracts, and delivery conditions to get the greatest bargains while preserving quality.
• Check product quality and safety regularly and work with suppliers to meet our requirements.
• Plan and manage the logistics of moving fresh goods from purchase to our facilities to maintain quality.
• Track inventory and predict buying requirements using seasonal patterns and sales data.
• Coordinate buying strategies with sales and marketing to meet client demand and promotions.
• Keep up with industry changes, new goods, and technology to enhance buying.
• Follow food safety and environmental sustainability laws and corporate requirements.
Job Requirement:
• Food sector or fresh produce buying expertise.
• Supply chain management expertise, especially in agriculture and food.
• Strong negotiating and relationship-building abilities.
• Market trend analysis and data-driven buying.
• Know fruit and vegetable quality standards and certifications.
• Understanding best practices for delivering hazardous goods via logistics and transportation.
• Detail-oriented organizing and planning.
• Good writing and verbal communication skills to work with suppliers and teammates.
• Willingness to visit farms, markets, and suppliers as needed.

Job Description:
- Attendance Management: Oversee daily employee attendance, ensure the integrity
of timekeeping data, and promptly resolve any discrepancies. - Payroll Administration: Execute bi-weekly/monthly payroll operations, adhere to
payroll regulations and tax compliance, and provide payroll analysis upon request. 
- Employee Separation: Conduct exit interviews, document separation agreements, process final payroll and benefits, and maintain precise records of employee exits. 
- Leave Administration: Monitor and manage employee leave entitlements, process
leave requests in line with company policy and legal standards, and compile leave
analytics for management. 
- Compensation and Benefits: Calculate and facilitate additional compensation, bonuses, and other incentives as defined by company criteria, ensuring timely and
accurate disbursement. 
- Onboarding and Offboarding: Coordinate new hire integration, including
documentation and orientation, and manage exit procedures for departing staff to
ensure a seamless transition. 
- Roster Maintenance: Regularly update and maintain the company's employee roster, ensuring all personnel changes are accurately reflected in the system. 
- Salary Analysis: Generate salary estimates for various job roles based on market
research and company guidelines, and contribute to salary structure development
and adjustments. 
- Social Insurance Compliance: Manage social security declarations, ensure
adherence to legal requirements, and address employee inquiries related to social
insurance. 
- Procurement: Oversee the procurement of necessary materials and supplies, negotiate with vendors for optimal pricing and quality, and manage inventory levels.  Facility and Utility Management: Handle payments for utilities and facilities, ensuring timely and accurate financial transactions.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field. 
- Minimum of 2 years of professional experience in HR and administrative roles. 
- Comprehensive understanding of payroll processes, employee benefits, and labor
laws. 
- Proficiency in HR and payroll software systems. 
- Exceptional ability to organize and manage time effectively. - Proven capacity to handle multiple tasks and prioritize work efficiently. 
- Strong written and verbal communication skills and the ability to interact effectively
with all levels of staff.

Company Profile:
Tilleke & Gibbins is a leading Southeast Asian regional professional services firm with over 150 lawyers, advisors, and consultants practicing in Bangkok, Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City, Jakarta, Phnom Penh, Vientiane, and Yangon. Our firm represents the top investors and the high-growth companies that drive economic expansion in Asia in the key areas of commercial transactions and M&A, dispute resolution and litigation, and intellectual property. Established in 1890, we have grown into the largest independent law firm in Thailand due to our client focus, regional expertise, and international vision.

Company Profile: Kampongsom Language Academy (KLA) is one of the leading language schools in providing language education in Preah Sihanouk Province. Our vision is to ensure that pupils are holistically developed in order to assist them in contributing and playing a fulfilling role in their own community. We see the development of their language skills as being central to this process. We believe that the ability of our pupils to communicate fluently, confidently and effectively will contribute greatly to the development of their self-esteem and their personal growth. We also believe that children leaving our school should have a competency in all aspects of the English language. We also see the teaching of English as something which underpins all other subjects across all educational levels. We believe that language learning is a tool for lifelong learning. We are now looking for qualified candidate to fulfill the position below:
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Vanthai Kranh  093 605 550 kampongsomacademy@gmail.com Preah Sihanouk 093 605 550

Job Description: Position Description: As the Deputy Country Manager for ONiON Mobility Cambodia, you will be responsible for spearheading our operations and growth strategy in the country. You will play a pivotal role in establishing and maintaining key partnerships, driving business development initiatives, and ensuring operation excellence to enhance our market presence and continue our exciting journey as the leading EV palay in the country. Job Responsibilities: . Own and deliver ONiON Mobility's P&L target for the country. Oversee day-to-day operations, including sales, battery swapping station management, after service and customer support , to ensure best in class service for our drivers. Build and nurture relationships with government agencies, local authorities, industry stakeholders, and potential partners to drive regulatory compliance and foster strategic collaborations. Drive business development activities, including negotiating partnerships, securing contracts, and expanding ONiON Mobility's network of clients and suppliers. Recruit, manage and mentor a high-performing team, fostering a culture of innovation, collaboration, and accountability.
Job Requirement: . Bachelor's degree in business administration, management or a related field (preferably a master's degree). Postgraduate degree in sales, finance or similar is also acceptable. Several years of experience in leading the business in the country. Excellent budgeting and forecasting skills. A good knowledge base of the country/region, and a willingness to learn. The ability to provide excellent customer service. Good people-management skills. Sensitivity to different cultural norms.
Company Profile: MVL is a blockchain-based mobility company that started in 2018 that aims to build a reliable mobility ecosystem by recording data through innovative blockchain technology. Starting as a vehicle ride-hailing platform company under the name TADA, we have a business model that increases the application of blockchain technology through each new service we build.ONiON Mobility, a subsidiary of MVL, provides electric vehicles and related infrastructure mainly in Cambodia. TADA, another subsidiary, provides ride-hailing services mainly in Singapore, Cambodia and Vietnam and is building a mobility ecosystem by improving the profit structure of drivers through a new model that is completely different from existing companies.ONiON Mobility is actively conducting business in Cambodia by launching the T1, an eco-friendly version of the three-wheeled passenger vehicle “Tuk-Tuk”. We have established an EV factory to mass-produce our T1’s, and are operating electric vehicle charging stations all over the city of Phnom Penh. In addition to expanding our business throughout Cambodia, we are expanding our business to overseas regions by diversifying our product lineup, including the T1c for eco-friendly cargo transportation and eco-friendly bikes. In particular, the T1 provides a mileage of more than 100km and is an eco-friendly vehicle that does not have the inconvenience of long charging times by adopting a battery exchange method instead. ONiON has gained popularity in the local market by reducing maintenance costs of our E Tuk-Tuk’s by about 40% of the normal internal combustion vehicles because there is no need of frequent replacement of parts and high oil price. In addition, ONiON Mobility plans to collect and utilize all data generated from vehicles and stations for efficient operation and management at the MVL group level as well as to share the benefits to all the participants in the ecosystem created by MVL.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  010 656 242 sokhim.pek@onionev.com Phnom Penh Amass Central Tower, Level 18th, St63, Sangkat Boeng Kengkorng1, Khan Boeng Kengkorng, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 010 656 242

Job Description: Able to repair & fix Heat Transfer Machine as refer to manual/instruction from manufacturing.• Perform general electrical work.• Install, maintain, and repair wiring, outlets, fixtures, and appliances.• Establish and maintain a safe work environment.• Interpret blueprints, sketches, diagrams, or schematics.• Estimate material, equipment, or labor costs.• Establish and maintain schedules.• Perform electrical troubleshooting.• Perform calculations and measurements.• Maintain records.• Supervise or train other workers.• Other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: • Fresh graduated in Electrical Associate/Bachelor.• 1+ years’ proven experience in electrical repair and installation.• Knowledge of electrical code requirements.• Knowledge of voltage and amperage requirements, electrical testing and troubleshooting skills.• Knowledge of job site safety practices required.• Can Speak, Read, and Write English

Job Description: Are you a recent graduate or an aspiring young professional eager to make your mark in the corporate field? ONE MORE GROUP invites you to join our dynamic and talented Young Professional Program (YPP). This six-month journey is not just a program; it's a launchpad for your future!About Our ProgramONE MORE GROUP’s Young Professional Program (YPP) is a 6-months program designed to fast-track talented, dynamic fresh graduates and young professionals to grow rapidly and become specialists in sales and distribution, food and beverage manufacturing, and hospitality industries.Program Type:  Full-timeProgram Length: 6 months
Job Requirement: Requirements    1. Education:•	Bachelor or Master's Degree or any higher qualification•	Strong academic record (GPA of 3.0 and above, or equivalent)    2. Experience:•	Fresh graduates or year-4 students who will graduate in 2024 or professionals with 1-2 years’ experience•	Extra-curricular, volunteer, or internship experiences are a plus    3. Skills and Knowledge:•	Analytical, problem-solving, and effective communication skills•	Proficient in English and Microsoft Office    4. Mindset and Attitude:•	Growth mindset with a passion for learning and self-improvement•	Self-motivated, positive, resilient, and team-oriented•	Interest in FMCG industry or related is favorable Program Benefits1. Monthly Remuneration: Monthly remuneration with an opportunity for a long-term employment2. Learning & Growth: Tailored skills development for your personal and professional growth3. Coaching & Mentoring: Personalized coaching and mentoring from our leaders and mangers 4. Entrepreneurial Exposure: Exposure to different perspectives, acquiring the insights and know-how that are essential for businesses5. Network with Seniors: Learn from your peers, managers and senior leaders in functional and business level6. National Pride: Join a national company with a strong “Build It Yourself” culture and contribute to your nation’s growthApplication Process1.	Online Application2.	Assessment Test3.	Business Case Presentation4.	InterviewTake the First Step!Application Deadline: Hurry, the journey begins soon! Apply by 31st December 2023.Stay Connected: Have questions? We're here to help! Lead grocery sales team to achieve sales targets, outlets coverage, and promote branding visibility. 2. Develop and implement strategic plan in line with brand strategy to expand trade marketing outlets and grocery channels.3. Initiate tactical sales promotions to acquire sales and branding opportunity and block the opportunity against competitors. 4. Provide evaluation and market analysis on trade and key account and provide recommendations to enhance grocery performance.5. Build close relationship with business partners from grocery to ensure high level of supports while involving promotional activities/campaigns. 6. Conduct competitor analysis and provide suggestions. 7. Develop capacity among grocery sales team to ensure best practices grocery and trade marketing outlets executions not limited to knowledge in identifying perfect outlets, stock rules, products shelf life and planogram.8. Other tasks assigned by line managerSuccess Factors:1. Managing grocery channel requires broad understanding in branding concept, consumer programs and market analytics.2. Implementing branding activities within limited budget allocations requires considered high level of creativity and negotiation skills.

Skills and knowledge: - Demonstrate good communication skills.- Demonstrate broad knowledge in trade marketing, retailer planning and creativity- Demonstrate good command of English and Khmer (Chinese is a plus)- Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Power Point) and other design applications

Job Description: Job SummaryThe role of Supervisor, Fleet Management, is to establish and implement fleet operation procedures to ensure that all vehicles under the control of FMA is well managed, maintained and effectively utilized at optimal cost.Key Responsibilities 1. Conduct regular safety inspections of vehicles and schedule maintenance on vehicles to ensure that all vehicles are in good working order and prevented from expanded breakdown.2. Provide training to relevant users of the company vehicles to ensure proper operations and efficient use of the vehicles.3. Monitor use of fuel/lubricant card, fuel consumption and repair vehicles for minor breakdown to ensure that vehicles are properly repaired.4. Keep track of vehicle repairing and fuel consumption for an analysis to take corrective actions for efficient use of company vehicles.5. Monitor GPS of the vehicles to ensure that GPS is functional and necessary data is retrievable from GPS when needed be.6. Maintain a checklist for legal documents required for vehicles to ensure that all vehicles have documents in response to legal requirements.  7. Conduct a regular inspection on vehicles to ensure that the vehicles are properly cared of by users and no incidents occurred to the vehicles without notices.8. Register and license all vehicles under FMA management on a timely manner to ensure that there is no penalty.9. Administer online vehicle booking system so that the system is fully functional in line with operations.10. Manage vehicles assigned to be based in provinces so that the vehicles are used for the intended purposes, properly maintained and repaired.11. Coordinate and provide support to vehicle users when incident occurred including vehicle breakdown, road accident and other emergency to ensure safety and minimize operation disruptions with timely assistance and resolution of incidents.12. Perform other tasks as required.
Job Requirement: 1. Education: - Bachelor’s Degree in any discipline or certificate or relevant skills. Degree in mechanics is a plus.2. Experiences: - 2-3 years of working experience administering fleet services3. Skills and knowledge: - Have relevant technical or mechanic skills (auto mechanics, vehicle maintenance/repairs)- Computer literacy (Microsoft office) - Language: Good command of Khmer and English

Company Profile:
Established since 2015, SingBuild laids its roots in Phnom Penh, Cambodia with a focus on providing design and build services for our clients. Our dedicated team of Architects and Designers fulfill our clients’ dreams by challenging norms to reimagine spaces whilst managing functionality. It is our commitment to create exciting spaces that resonate with our clients’ needs. Our in-house Civil Engineers and M&E consultants seeks to push boundaries to deliver innovative and sustainable design solutions that uphold the integrity of all projects, where technical aspects are in compliance with internationally acclaimed standards. With project management being one of our many key strengths, we go the distance to bring our clients’ imagination to life.

Our Mission is to Design enriching spaces and continuously build our company with our clients’ Trust to deliver Quality designs with ultimate Precision

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. Job Description: 1. Identify and participate in local and international education-tech conferences to showcase MMentor App and attract potential investors:a. Research and identify relevant conferences, trade shows, and events in the education technology sector.b. Coordinate logistics for participation, including registration, booth setup, and promotional materials.c. Prepare presentations and demonstrations to showcase the features and benefits of MMentor App to conference attendees.d. Engage with conference attendees, including potential investors, educators, and industry professionals, to promote MMentor App and establish connections.2. Establish and maintain partnerships with schools and universities through MOUs to promote MMentor App and recruit Mentors and Mentees:a. Identify potential schools and universities for partnership based on relevance, reach, and alignment with MMentor's goals.b. Initiate discussions with school administrators or relevant stakeholders to propose partnerships and establish Memorandums of Understanding (MOUs).c. Collaborate with legal and administrative teams to draft, review, and finalize partnership agreements.d. Develop promotional materials and resources to support the recruitment of Mentors and Mentees within partner institutions.3. Collaborate with the IT and Marketing teams to manage the release of new program features, document usage processes, and coordinate marketing efforts for promotion:a. Serve as a liaison between the IT and Marketing teams to facilitate communication and alignment on program development and promotion.b. Gather requirements and feedback from stakeholders to inform the development of new program features.c. Work with the IT team to prioritize feature development based on user needs and market trends.d. Document usage processes and create user guides or tutorials for new features to support seamless adoption.4. Develop and manage student brand ambassador programs in schools and universities to drive app adoption and growth:a. Recruit and select student ambassadors from partner schools and universities based on criteria such as leadership skills, enthusiasm, and familiarity with MMentor App.b. Provide training and resources to student ambassadors to educate them about MMentor App features, benefits, and promotional strategies.c. Collaborate with student ambassadors to develop and implement campus outreach initiatives, including events, workshops, and promotional campaigns.5. Oversee timelines for feature development and promotional campaigns, ensuring alignment between IT and Marketing teams:a. Develop project timelines and milestones for feature development and promotional campaigns in collaboration with IT and Marketing teams.b. Conduct regular meetings and check-ins to review progress, address any issues or obstacles, and ensure alignment with overall project goals.c. Adjust timelines and priorities as needed to accommodate changes in project scope, resources, or external factors.6. Onboard new Mentors and provide them with orientation on app usage and features:a. Develop an onboarding process for new Mentors to familiarize them with MMentor App functionality, policies, and best practices.b. Create training materials, videos, or tutorials to guide Mentors through the registration process and usage of app features.c. Provide personalized support and assistance to Mentors during the onboarding process to address any questions or concerns.7.	Monitor and analyze app performance metrics, providing insights and recommendations for improvement:a. Utilize analytics tools to track key performance indicators (KPIs) such as user engagement, retention, and conversion rates.b. Generate reports and dashboards to visualize app performance metrics and trends over time.c. Analyze data to identify patterns, insights, and opportunities for optimization or enhancement.8.Perform any related task assigned by the Marketing Director.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Business Administration, or IT related Field.• Experience in managing App or Tech-Start-up• Strong analytical skills with proficiency in data analysis tools and techniques.• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.• Experience with project management methodologies and tools is a plus, preferably in the education or technology sector.• Knowledge of business process modeling and requirements elicitation techniques.• Familiarity with Agile development methodologies and principles.• Knowledge of continuous quality improvement methodologies (e.g., Six Sigma, Lean Manufacturing, ISO QMS, TQM) is a plus.• Comprehensive knowledge in all MS Office programs (Excel, Powerpoint, Word,) • Strong networking skills with the ability to establish and maintain partnerships with educational institutions, investors, and industry stakeholders.• Demonstrated project management experience, with the ability to prioritize tasks and manage timelines effectively.• Knowledge of education technology trends and familiarity with app development processes.• Ability to analyze data and metrics to drive decision-making and measure program success.• Proactive attitude with a strong sense of initiative and problem-solving skills.• Flexibility to travel for conferences and meetings as required.• Experience in mentoring or education-related roles is a plus.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh No. 11A, Street 402, Phum 2, Sangkat Tumnup Toek, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description: 1. Market Research and Analysis:• Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and market developments relevant to the company's products and services.• Conduct comprehensive market research and competitive analysis to identify opportunities for innovation and growth.• Utilize data-driven insights to inform strategic decision-making and product development initiatives.2. Idea Generation and Conceptualization:• Facilitate idea-generation sessions and brainstorming workshops across various departments to foster a culture of innovation and creativity.• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to generate new product concepts, service offerings, and process improvements aligned with business objectives.• Evaluate and prioritize ideas based on feasibility, market demand, and strategic alignment.3. Project Management and Execution:• Lead the development and implementation of R&D projects from concept to commercialization, ensuring adherence to timelines, budgets, and quality standards.• Coordinate with internal stakeholders, including engineering, marketing, and manufacturing teams, to drive project execution and achieve project goals.• Monitor project progress, identify potential risks, and implement mitigation strategies as needed to ensure successful project outcomes.4. Technology Assessment and Integration:• Assess emerging technologies and evaluate their potential applicability to the company's products, processes, and business models.• Collaborate with technology partners, vendors, and research institutions to explore opportunities for technology integration and collaboration.• Champion the adoption of new technologies and best practices to enhance competitiveness and drive innovation within the organization.5. Continuous Improvement and Optimization:• Identify opportunities for process optimization, cost reduction, and efficiency improvement across all areas of the business.• Implement continuous improvement methodologies and initiatives to streamline workflows, enhance productivity, and drive operational excellence.• Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics to track the impact of R&D efforts and drive continuous improvement initiatives.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Business Administration, or related field; Master's degree preferred.• At least 3 years’ experience in research and development, product management, or innovation management roles.• Strong analytical skills with the ability to gather, analyze, and interpret market data and trends.• Excellent project management skills, with a demonstrated ability to lead cross-functional teams and drive project execution.• Strategic thinker with the ability to translate market insights into actionable business strategies.• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to influence and collaborate effectively across all levels of the organization.• Knowledge of continuous quality improvement methodologies (e.g., Six Sigma, Lean Manufacturing, ISO QMS, TQM) is a plus.• Familiarity with industrial engineering principles and practices is highly desirable.• Comprehensive knowledge in all MS Office programs (Excel, Powerpoint, Word,) • Comprehensive knowledge in data analysis tools such as PowerBI, Microsoft excel, Airtable or tableau, statistical software such as SPSS or R for advance data analysis• Knowledge in product design software such as AutoCAD or SolidWorks or any PLM software• Knowledge in Project management Software like Asana, Trello or Jira.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

Job Description: • Establish marketing process flow, objectives, and plans to increase market share and profitability of products and/or services• Develop and execute marketing plans and programs, both short and long-range, to ensure the profit growth and expansion of MJQ products/services• Research, analyze, and monitor financial, technological, and demographic factors so that market opportunities may be capitalized on and the effects of competitive activity may be minimized• Plan and oversee the organization's all MJQ marketing activities for both offline and online campaigns. • Communicate and manage outside advertising agencies on outsourced campaigns• Work with copywriters and designers and oversee copywriting, design, layout, paste-up, and production of promotional materials• Analyze and recommend pricing strategy for the organization which results in increased market share per business unit. • Achieve above-average share of market performance in relation to pre-set standards and to general and specific trends within the industry and the economy• Ensure effective control of marketing results and that corrective action takes place to be certain that the achievement of marketing objectives is within designated budgets• Evaluate market reactions to advertising programs, education policy, and product knowledge in conjunction with the R&D team to ensure the timely adjustment of marketing strategy and plans to meet changing market and competitive conditions• Proposed changes (if needed) in the current structure and organization of the marketing group to ensure the effective fulfillment of objectives assigned to it and provide the flexibility to move swiftly in relation to marketing problems and opportunities• Conduct marketing surveys on current and new product concepts• Prepare marketing activity and performance reports on a monthly, quarterly, and yearly basis.

job title: Secretary for Office of the President
position: Secretary for Office of the President
Job Description: • Track on To do lists and task lists.• Schedule appointments and set meeting schedules.• Cooperate with the heads of departments. • Follow up on the assigned tasks from President.• To organize documents.• To arrange agenda for meetings.• Prepare correspondence, reports, and materials for publications and presentations.• Arrange Campus visit, site visit and meeting internal and external.• Maintaining records and files.• Provide administrative and clerical support to departments or individuals.• Alert manager about cancelations or new meetings.• Handle information requests.• Prepare statistical reports.• Prepare confidential and sensitive documents.• Coordinates with office arrangement• Determine matters of top priority and handle accordingly.• Maintain office procedures.• Coordinate committees and task forces.• Relay directives, instructions and assignment to executives.• To make operations run smoothly.• Other duties are as assigned.• Other tasks are assigned by President.
Job Requirement: • A bachelor degree in Education or equivalent.• Computer Knowledge.• Excellent problem-solving skills, and able to use initiative. • Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views.• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks.• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude.• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with social media.• Ability to understand and keep within a budget.• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English.• Strong administrative and organizational skills.• Presentation Skills.• Self-Confidence.• Skill in client relationships.• Skill in written Communication.• Has strong decision making.• Has administrative writing skills.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: 012 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

jobUrl: https://www.camhr.com/a/job/10582149?title=គ្រូគណិតវិទ្យា (មធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ និងទុតិយភូមិ)
job title: គ្រូគណិតវិទ្យា (មធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ និងទុតិយភូមិ)
position: គ្រូគណិតវិទ្យា (មធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ និងទុតិយភូមិ)
Job Description: . ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងកែកិច្ចការសិស្សដោយគោរពតាមគោលការណ៍សាលា. ធ្វើរដ្ឋបាលថ្នាក់ឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់. អាននូវកំណត់ចំណាំ សេចក្តីជូនដំណឹង ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ជាប្រចាំ និងអនុវត្តន៍ឱ្យបាន១០០%. ចូលរួមរាល់សកម្មភាពរបស់សាលាដូចជាទិវាវប្បធម៌​ កម្មវិធីតាំងពិព៌រណ៍.... គោរពបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងសាលាឱ្យបាន១០០%. បង្រៀនមុខវិជ្ជាជំនាញថ្នាក់មធ្យមសិក្សា. ពិនិត្យអវត្តមាន និងសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ថ្នាក់រៀន. ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងកែកិច្ចការសិស្សដោយគោរពតាមគោលការណ៍សាលា. ធ្វើរដ្ឋបាលថ្នាក់ឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់. សរសេររកិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀន និងផែនការបង្រៀនប្រចាំថ្ងៃ. ផលិតនិងកែច្នៃសម្ភារៈឧបទ្ទេសសម្រាប់បង្រៀនមុខវិជ្ជជំនាញ. មើលសិស្សពេលចេញលេង និងពេលចេញទៅផ្ទះ. រៀបចំកិច្ចការផ្ទះ វិញ្ញាសាប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ប្រឡងពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស និងឆមាស និងកែឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ. ចូលរួមថែរក្សាទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិសាលា. សិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវរកវិធីសាស្រ្តបង្រៀនល្អៗ និងថ្មីៗ. អប់រំសិស្សអោយក្លាយជាកូនល្អ​ សិស្សល្អ​ មិត្តល្អ ពលរដ្ឋល្អ. ត្រូវបង្កើតបទបញ្ញត្តិថ្នាក់រៀននីមួយៗ. ផ្តល់ចំណេះដឹងពិតប្រាកដមួយដល់សិស្ស. គោរពបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងសាលាឱ្យបាន១០០%. បង្រៀនសិស្សតាមគោលការណ៍ដែលសាលាដាក់ជូន. រៀបចំផែនការការងារបង្រៀនបានល្អ. បង្រៀនអោយទាន់កម្មវិធីសិក្សាសាលាប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធិភាព​​. ប្រគល់កិច្ចការឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលាដែលសាលាបានកំណត់ជូន. សហការគ្នាឱ្យបានល្អរវាងក្រុមការងារ. ចូលរួមរាល់សកម្មភាពរបស់សាលាដូចជាទិវាវប្បធម៌​ កម្មវិធីតាំងពិព៌រណ៍.... អាននូវកំណត់ចំណាំ សេចក្តីជូនដំណឹង ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ជាប្រចាំ និងអនុវត្តន៍ឱ្យបាន១០០%. ដឹងច្បាស់នូវរចនាសម្ព័ន្ធសាលា. ធ្វើជាទូតដ៏ល្អរបស់ស្ថាប័ន. មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយមិត្តរួមការងារ. បំផុសទឹកចិត្តសិស្សឱ្យចូលរួមកម្មវិធីរបស់សាលាឱ្យបានផុសផុល. ផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ដល់ចាងហ្វាង ឬក្រុមការងារពេលឃើញមានបញ្ហា. គោរពមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈគ្រូបង្រៀនឱ្យបាន១០០%៕
Job Requirement: . មានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញវិជ្ជាជីវៈ. ចេះប្រើប្រាស់ Computer ​(Word Excel Power Point and email…). ជាអ្នកប្រឹក្សាសិក្សាដ៏ល្អជាមួយសិស្ស និងអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល. គោរពម៉ោងការងារ. មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ. ព្យាយាម និងអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារជាមួយសិស្សានុសិស្ស. យកចិត្តទុកដាក់ជាមួយសិស្ស និងមានមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈខ្ពស់. មានសុខភាពល្អ កាយសម្បទាមាំមួន. មានភាពម៉ត់ចត់ និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ . មានភាពជឿជាក់លើមុខវិជ្ជាជំនាញដែលខ្លួនបង្រៀន. មានបទពិសោធបង្រៀនច្រើនឆ្នាំទៅលើមុខវិជ្ជាបង្រៀនផ្នែកជំនាញ៕បៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនង៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564* ប្រវត្តិរូបដែលគ្មានរូបថត នឹងមិនត្រូវបានដាក់បញ្ចូលក្នុងវគ្គសម្រាំងនោះទេ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities

- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description: • Post news and feature articles on TIR website and social media.• Monitor the online content and keep track of the website traffic.• Co-create and execute digital strategies to boost audience and readership.• Maintain and update the websites and social media accounts.• Work with the editorial team to update the stories and correct errors in articles.• Reply to messages from social media users.• Analyze site traffic and demography.

Job Description: Academics• Be responsible for collecting, compiling and maintaining documents, continuing to ------- communicate and collaborate well with all generations of alumni.• Work directly with President and Principals in charge by campus.• Prepare, implement plan, monitor the implementation plan, correct the shortcomings and re-implement.• Find sponsorship and request budget for the events.• Coordinate and arranging processes with alumni.• Be a good ambassador between school and alumni.• Submit monthly report to vice president and president.• Find sponsorship partner for all AIS alumni member.• Promote alumni program on Social Media, Face book, Instagram, Tik Tok, Telegram Chanel, Link In and so on.• Develop Short-Term and Long- term strategic plans.• Collaborate with Head Principals to collect all alumni data for conducting a sharing session about benefit for alumni.• Keep contact with all alumni and collaborate with them to share their experiences to next generations.• As an advisor of AIS Student Council (AISSC), advice, give comment, and coordinate with AISSC to make the event running smoothly.Management• Empower and ensure that the school committee meets the desired standards.• Maintain accurate staff records.• Assist the school committee in the set-up of the center and ensure all resources are kept properly.• Organize meetings, trainings and workshops on request. These might include an overview to the AIS academic program, current teaching methodology refreshers and develop the new program.
