Job Description: Academics:• Assist in the organization of student testing and placement.• Support in guiding newly qualified teachers in preparing lessons.• Implement and maintain academic procedures and records such as observations, teacher opinion survey, buddy system and others.• Effectively manage and organize the materials, resources, examinations and assessments as provided by AIS.• Design and ensure the supervision and discipline of students in ESL program.• Carry out lesson observations and provide oral and written feedback to teachers; forward feedback documentation to the Head ESL and Head Principal.• Provide support to teachers in their teaching, classroom management, and assessments to students• Work to ensure the academic and recreational aspects of the program are integrated• Dress appropriately at all times, in line with the AIS dress code• Submit reports, follow-up, and information regarding any academic related tasks• Create and develop ESL curriculum become more varieties and modern.• Communicate with outside communities such as new program or universities, local and international and coordinate with event planer to conduct events, workshops, training and so on.Management:• Maintain accurate staff records• Ensure that the school committee meets the desired standards• Assist the school committee in the set-up of the center and ensure all resources are kept properly• Organize meetings, trainings and workshops on request. These might include an overview to the AIS academic program, current teaching methodology refreshers or language classes.Regular/daily tasks:The following regular tasks will be divided and assigned by the Director of Studies.• ESL program, Preschool program • Elementary program • Junior High and High school program• New Teacher and Observation• Teacher Observation• Teacher Observation Feedback• Teacher Opinion Survey• Peer to peer assessment• Sponsorship Program• Online Continuous Assessment- the current forms, tracking system and procedures• Professional Development• Curriculum updates and development• Teacher Website• Teacher Handbook• Annual Excellence in Teaching Award- The current process is with Johnny• Checking and maintaining one CSR especially in terms of academics• Coordinate in and out extra-curricular activities for students and teachers• Verbal and Written reports• Create and monitor school policies• Other assigned tasks or projects that are relevant to academics.
Job Requirement: • Degree in Education or related field• Management experience in education or any related fields• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite, Google Apps and proficient with Social Media• Excellent problem-solving skills, initiative and ability to multi-task• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude• Ability to understand and keep within a budget• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English• Strong administrative, organizational, interpersonal, communication and collaboration skills• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English• Strong administrative and organizational skills.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

Job Description: • Oversee and manage daily operations of student health center (SHC) of all Campuses and ensure the operations are maintained with high effectiveness. • Develop and execute the business strategy plan in order to promote service and products of student health center as well as to expand the existing businesses.•​ Review daily and monthly sales, profit and loss statement and come up with strategic plans for recommendation. •​​​ Develop and update standard operating procedures (SOP) for the SHC and reinforce the implementation. •​ Ensure each staff follows standard operating procedures of SHC and the Company.•​ Prepare and manage budget of SHC for all campuses. • Manage and lead SHC department to align with the business’ objective. • Manage and provide training to Nurses, Physicians, and all SHC staff to ensure productivities are maximized. • Manage medicine and laboratory’s inventory to ensure with high effectiveness. • Perform routine examinations of patients and suggest treatments based on findings.• Perform other related tasks the required from time to time.
Job Requirement: • Doctorate degree in Medicine. • At least 5 years working experience as a medical doctor.• Knowledge in financial management and business management. • Proficient at patient charting and knowledgeable in relevant charting computer programs.• Ability to multi-task efficiently and effectively.• Ability to establish and maintain effective working relationships with patients, medical staff, management and peers.• Excellent management skills.• Adept computer skills• Strong written and verbal communication skills• ​Impeccable presentation skills as a way of enhancing the success of the facility.• Interpersonal and conflict-resolution skills•​ A profound understanding of mathematics, biology, and anatomy• Ability to manage the healthcare facility’s budget.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

Job Description: Academics • Develop and implement Khmer language curriculum and instructional materials.• Planning and organize Khmer language classes, workshops, and events.• Assess the proficiency levels of students and designing appropriate learning plans.• Provide guidance and support to Khmer language instructors.• Monitoring and evaluating the effectiveness of the Khmer language program.• Collaborate with other departments or organizations to promote Khmer language learning and cultural activities.• Keep up-to-date with developments in Khmer language teaching methodologies and resources.• Provide support for student testing, assessment, placement, and induction as directed by the Director of Studies.• Address student and group leader inquiries on academic matters, and handle student issues and emergencies as they arise.• Offer regular support to teachers, providing assistance in implementing and maintaining academic procedures and records such as observations, teacher opinion surveys, and the buddy system.• Organize and contribute to teacher development sessions when required to enhance their professional growth.• Carry out lesson observations and provide oral and written feedback to teachers, forwarding feedback documentation to the deputy campus director.• Offer regular support to teachers, providing assistance in implementing and maintaining academic procedures and records such as observations, teacher opinion surveys, and the buddy system.• Organize and contribute to teacher development sessions when required to enhance their professional growth.• Carry out lesson observations and provide oral and written feedback to teachers, forwarding feedback documentation to the deputy campus director.• Provide support for exam preparation classes to all teachers.• Teach classes as required to meet operational demands, such as teacher absences or changes in student numbers.• Organize and conduct group leader meetings and workshops upon request, covering topics such as an overview of the Khmer academic program, refreshing teaching methodologies, or language classes.• Adhere to the Aii dress code, maintaining a professional appearance at all times.Regular/Daily Tasks:• Khmer Language Curriculum  - New syllabus design  - Progress test design and implementation  - New final examination design and implementation  - Monitoring and developing Khmer Language Curriculum• Interview applicants  - Check curriculum vitae of applicants for teaching posts  - Check the written test of the applicants• New Teacher and Observation  - New teachers will be oriented about the basic rules and regulations of the school by the Head of Khmer Language  - Head of Khmer Language has to explain the observation criteria to the new teachers before observing them  - New teachers will be observed by the Head within the first 2 weeks of the term  - The Head have to meet the new teacher for the feedback• Sponsorship Program  - Spot check if the teachers of the CAs are updated regularly  - Find ways on how to make the program effective• Professional Development  - Teaching  - Counseling• Coordinate in & out extra-curricular activities for students and teachers​  - Verbal and Written reports  - Create an exact timeline to maintain the consistency of the reports• School policy    - Familiarize with all school policies  - Help develop and strengthen school policies  - Create policies on Khmer Language Program
Job Requirement: • Bachelor’s Degree in Khmer Language or Khmer Literature or Education, or a related field • Preferably Master’s Degree in Khmer Language, French Studies or a related field• At least 2 years of management experience in education or related fields• Excellent problem-solving skills, and ability to use initiative • Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile, and a can-do attitude• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficiency with social media• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in Khmer• Strong administrative and organizational skills.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: HR MJQjobs (https://t.me/HRMJQE)Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

job title: ប្រធានគ្រូកីឡា និងគ្រូវិន័យ_សាខាខេត្តតាកែវ

Job Description: • មើលសិស្សឱ្យមានវិន័យ ចេះគោរពចាស់ទុំ និងលោកគ្រូ-អ្នកគ្រូ• តម្រង់ទិសសិស្សឱ្យដើរផ្លូវល្អ• កែតម្រូវរាល់ចំណុចខ្វះខាតរបស់សិស្ស• សិស្សដែលមានបញ្ហាខ្វះកិច្ចការផ្ទះ ខ្វះមេរៀន ឬអវត្តមានច្រើន និងចុះកិច្ចសន្យាជាមួយសិស្ស។ល។ តែងតែ ហៅគាត់មកណែនាំ និងប្រាប់គាត់ពីចំណុចល្អ និងអាក្រក់• បង្ហាត់សិស្សហាត់ប្រាណ( PE) រៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃចន្ទ និងថ្ងៃពុធសម្រាប់សិស្សខ្មែរ ។• បង្ហាត់សិស្សមត្តេយ្យសិក្សាហែលទឹករៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃព្រហស្បតិ៍ និងបង្ហាត់សិស្សរៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ម៉ោង7:00-9:00AM , 9:00-11:00AM, 15:00-17:00PM ចាប់ពីថ្នាក់ទី២ ដល់ថ្នាក់ទី១២។• ជួបជាមួយអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្សដែលមានបញ្ហា• ចូលរួមសិក្ខាសាលាជាមួយផ្នែកផ្សេងៗដើម្បីយល់ដឹងពីបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗ ដែលអាចកើតមានឡើងជាយថាហេតុ ចំពោះសិស្ស។• សម្ភាសន៍គ្រូថ្មី• ចុះហត្ថលេខាលើសៀវភៅតាមដានសិស្ស• ត្រួតពិនិត្យអវត្តមានគ្រូរៀងរាល់ខែ• បញ្ចូលពិន្ទុសិស្សប្រចាំខែ ឆមាស និងពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស• ចូលរួមរៀបចំដំណើរកម្សាន្តលោកគ្រូ-អ្នកគ្រូប្រចាំឆ្នាំ• ចូលរួមរៀបចំកម្មវិធីផ្សេងៗ• ប្រជុំរង្វាយតម្លៃលោកគ្រូ-អ្នកគ្រូឆ្នើមប្រចាំឆ្នាំ• រៀបចំកម្មវិធី Sport Day ពីថ្នាក់ក្រោមមត្តេយ្យ ដល់ថ្នាក់ទី១(ឆមាសទី១ និងឆមាសទី២)• ពេលគ្រូអវត្តមានតែងតែទៅជំនួស• នាំសិស្សចូលរួមកម្មវិធីប្រកួតក្រៅសាលា • ធ្វើជាទូតដ៏ល្អរបស់ស្ថាប័ន• បំផុសទឹកចិត្តដល់សិស្សឱ្យចូលរួមកម្មវិធីរបស់សាលា• ពេលសិស្សចេញលេងក្រៅម៉ោងសិក្សាតែងតែនាំសិស្សលេងល្បែងកម្សាន្ត• រៀបចំល្បែងប្រជាប្រិយលេងកម្សាន្តក្នុងកម្មវិធីទិវាវប្បធម៌• ដើរតាមថ្នាក់សិស្សប្រាប់ពីកម្មវិធីរបស់សាលា• មានកម្មវិធីសាលាម្តងៗរៀបចំសិស្សពីការសម្តែង និងការ Sort List ជាដើម• ចូលរួមកម្មវិធីដំណើរកម្សាន្តរបស់សិស្សានុសិស្សថ្នាក់បឋមសិក្សា• ជួបអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្ស និងឱ្យសិស្សចុះកិច្ចសន្យា• ជួបសិស្សដែលមានបញ្ហាយឺតច្រើនដង• ពិនិត្យពិន្ទុរបស់គ្រូរៀងរាល់ខែ• ពិនិត្យរបាយការណ៍របស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូគ្រប់មុខវិជ្ជា និងគ្រូជំនាញរៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍• Update ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស និងលោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូចូលរួមប្រជុំជាមួយផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ• ចូលរួមប្រជុំជាមួយចាងហ្វាង និងចាងហ្វាងរង• ចូលរួមប្រជុំជាមួយក្រុមប្រឹក្សាវិន័យ• ទទួលស្វាគមន៍ក្រុមប្រឹក្សាវិន័យចល័ត និងណែនាំពីទីតាំងនីមួយៗ• សិស្សទទួលបានជ័យលាភីចេញ Poster បិទតាមអគារសិក្សា និងបណ្ឌសសើរដល់សិស្ស• ជាគណៈកម្មការកណ្តាល ឬជាអនុរក្សពេលសិស្សានុសិស្សប្រឡងរៀបចំអត្រាកំណែជូនលោកគ្រូ-អ្នកគ្រូ• ជាអ្នកកត់ត្រាប្រវត្តិសាស្រ្តប្រជុំគ្រប់ផ្នែករបស់សាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង សម្រាប់សាខាចាក់អង្រែ• ត្រួតពិនិត្យពិន្ទុប្រឡងរបស់សិស្សានុសិស្ស(ជំនាញថ្ងៃសៅរ៍)• ត្រួតពិនិត្យ Timesheet របស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ• រៀបចំឯកសារទំលាក់ទៅ Procurement រៀងរាល់ចុងខែ សម្រាប់ការជួលទីលានហ្វឹកហាត់ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍។• រៀបចំឯកសារស្មើសុំជួលទីលានហ្វឹកហាត់រៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ ទៅខាង Procurement ។
Job Requirement: • មានសញ្ញាបត្របរិញ្ញាបត្រ• មានសញ្ញាបត្រគរុកោសល្យ (គ្រូអប់រំកាយ និងកីឡា២ឆ្នាំ)• មានបទពិសោធន៍បង្រៀន៧ឆ្នាំ (សាលារដ្ឋ)• អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ ( Word, Excel, Power point, Photoshop……)• មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ• ស្រលាញ់កុមារ• មានកាយសម្បទារឹងមាំ• មានភាពម៉ត់ចត់ និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ• ចូលរួមសិក្ខាសាលាវគ្គខ្លីៗជាច្រើន• ចូលរួមសិក្ខាសាលាហែលទឹកជាច្រើន• ចេះប្រើប្រាស់ Computer(Word Excel Power Point Photoshop and Email)• ជាអ្នកប្រឹក្សា និងដើរតួជាគ្រូវិន័យដ៏ល្អជាមួយសិស្ស និងអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្ស• គោរពម៉ោងការងារ• គោរពសិទ្ធិ អ្នកធ្វើការជាមួយគ្នា• មិនមើលបំណាំគ្នា• ចេះមើលថែកុមារតូចៗ• ចេះជួយការងាររបស់ចាងហ្វាង និងប្រធានផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ• ចេះជួយសម្អាតបរិស្ថានក្នុងអគារ និងការិយាល័យ• មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិតច្រើន• ត្រួតពិនិត្យឯកសណ្ឋានសិស្ស និងវិន័យសិស្ស មុនពេលចូលរៀន និងពេលត្រលប់ទៅផ្ទះ• ចុះអង្គេតការបង្ហាត់សិស្សរបស់លោកគ្រូ-អ្នកគ្រូនៅក្រៅសាលា• Do round មើលតាមថ្នាក់ពេលម៉ោងសិក្សា ម៉ោងសិស្សប្រលង និងពេលសិស្សចេញលេង • រៀបចំកាលវិភាគក្នុងការបង្ហាត់ហែលទឹក• ជួយរៀបចំ និងពិភាក្សាគ្នាពីការប្រកួតកីឡាសិស្ស កីឡាបុគ្គលិក និងកម្មវិធីបិទការប្រកួត• រៀបចំ និងថែរក្សាសម្ភារគ្រូ និងសម្ភារហ្វឹកហាត់កីឡាផ្សេងៗទៀត• រៀបចំអវត្តមានគ្រូសម្រាប់ការប្រកួតកីឡាសិស្ស• ការចេញលទ្ធផលប្រកួតកីឡាសិស្សរៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃអាទិត្យ• ដាក់ការប្រជុំគ្រូជំនាញ• ដើរតួជាប្រធានអង្គប្រជុំក្នុងការប្រជុំគ្រូជំនាញថ្ងៃសៅរ៍• ប្រជុំការចាប់ឆ្នោតប្រកួតកីឡាសិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិក៕
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh No. 11A, Street 402, Phum 2, Sangkat Tumnup Toek, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description: • ពិនិត្យកិច្ចការសិស្ស បញ្ជីវត្តមានសិស្សមើលសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ និងវិន័យសិស្សពេល គ្រូបង្គោលបង្រៀន។• រាល់កិច្ចការសូមគោរពតាមកាលបរិច្ឆេទដែលបានកំណត់។• ជួយមើលសិស្សមុនពេលចូលរៀន ពេលចេញលេង និងពេលចេញទៅផ្ទះ។• សហការជាមួយគ្រូបង្គោលក្នុងការផលិតសម្ភារឧបទេស និងតុបតែងថ្នាក់រៀន។• ចូលរួមរាល់សកម្មរបស់សាលា។• គោរពបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងសាលាឱ្យបាន១០០%។• ធ្វើជាទូតដ៏ល្អរបស់ស្ថាប័ន។• អាននូវកំណត់ចំណាំ សេចក្តីជូនដំណឹង ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ជាប្រចាំ និងអនុវត្តន៍ឱ្យបាន ១០០%។• ជូនសិស្សមកពេទ្យពេលសិស្សមានបញ្ហាសុខភាព។• ពិនិត្យមើលComment អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលក្នុងសៀវភៅតាមដាន រួចផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានទៅគ្រូបន្ទុកថ្នាក់។	• ចូលរួមថែរក្សាទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។• បង្រៀនជំនួសនៅពេលគ្រូបង្គោល ឬគ្រូជំនាញអវត្តមាន។• ពិនិត្យមើល Comment អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលក្នុងសៀវភៅតាមដានរួច ផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានទៅគ្រូបន្ទុកថ្នាក់ ឬអាចឆ្លើយតបជាមួយអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល។• រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំឆមាសនីមួយ និងផ្ញើជូនគណៈកម្មការតាមកាលបរិច្ឆេទដែលបានកំណត់។• ពិនិត្យមើលកិច្ចការរបស់សិស្សដូចជា កិច្ចការផ្ទះ កិច្ចការក្នុងថ្នាក់ ការសរសេរមេរៀនរបស់សិស្ស។• ជួយការងារគ្រូបង្គោល (ពិនិត្យកិច្ចការសិស្ស បញ្ជីវត្តមានសិស្ស មើលសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់សិស្សពេលគ្រូបង្គោលបង្រៀន)។• បំផុសទឹកចិត្តសិស្សឱ្យចូលរួមកម្មវិធីប្រកួតប្រជែងរបស់សាលាឱ្យបានផុសផុល។• សហការជាមួយគ្រូបង្គោលក្នុងការជួយតាមដានការសិក្សាសិស្ស។• ពិនិត្យសម្ភារសិក្សាសិស្សមុនពេលចេញទៅផ្ទះ។
Job Requirement: • មានសញ្ញាបត្រគរុកោសល្យ ឬបរិញ្ញាបត្រ។• មានបទពិសោធច្រើនឆ្នាំក្នុងការមើលកុមារ។• មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ។• ព្យាយាម និងអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារជាមួយកុមារ។• ស្រឡាញ់កុមារ និងមានមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈខ្ពស់។• មានកាយសម្បទាមាំមួន។• មានភាពម៉ត់ចត់ និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ។បៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនង៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564* ប្រវត្តិរូបដែលគ្មានរូបថត នឹងមិនត្រូវបានដាក់បញ្ចូលក្នុងវគ្គសម្រាំងនោះទេ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh No. 11A, Street 402, Phum 2, Sangkat Tumnup Toek, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description: - ​ស្វែងរកដៃគូសហការដើម្បីរកអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ជូនសមាជិកអតីតសិស្ស- ផ្សព្វផ្សាយ និងជំរុញលើបណ្តាញសង្គម តាមរយៈការបង្កើតVideo និងបទយកការណ៍- រៀបចំផែនការយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តរយៈពេលខ្លី និងរយៈពេលវែង- បង្កើតកម្មវិធីផ្សេងៗដើម្បីរកដៃគូសហការ រៀបចំគម្រោងផែនការ និងអនុវត្តផែនការ- ធ្វើសមាសហរណកម្ម ស្រាវជ្រាវ អភិវឌ្ឍ វិភាគ និងយល់ពីតម្រូវការរបស់អតីតសិស្ស- សហការជាមួយនាយក/ នាយិកាតាមសាខាក្នុងការប្រមូលទិន្នន័យសិស្សដើម្បីរៀបចំផែនការ និងផ្សព្វផ្សាយ ពីអត្ថប្រយោជន៍របស់អតីតសិស្សជូនដល់សិស្សានុសិស្សដែលកំពុងសិក្សានៅសាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង និងស្វែងរកអតីតសិស្សដែលជោគជ័យក្នុងអាជីពមកធ្វើបទបង្ហាញ
Job Requirement: - មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រង ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ ផ្នែកទំនាក់ទំនង ឬសញ្ញាបត្រសមមូល- មានចំណេះដឹងលើភាសាបរទេស​ (ភាសាអង់គ្លេស...) KNOWLEDGE,  SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE / ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធន៍- មានចំណេះដឹងខាងផ្នែកព័ត៌មានវិទ្យាប្រើប្រាស់បានលើកម្មវិធី៖​ Ms. Words, Ms. Excels, Internet, Email- មានសមត្ថភាពប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា និងមានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនង- ស្គាល់អំពីតម្រូវការទីផ្សារការងារ និងបរិស្ថានជុំវិញ- ឆ្លងកាត់បទពិសោធន៍លើការងារយ៉ាងតិច២ឆ្នាំ- មានលទ្ធភាព/សមត្ថភាពក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងលើការងារប្រតិបត្តិដោយឯករាជ្យ ម្ចាស់​ការ ទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ និង​ទាមទារការគ្រប់គ្រងតិចតូចពីគណៈគ្រប់គ្រង៕របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនង៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564* ប្រវត្តិរូបដែលគ្មានរូបថត នឹងមិនត្រូវបានដាក់បញ្ចូលក្នុងវគ្គសម្រាំងនោះទេ។

Job Description: • Develop and implement French language curriculum and instructional materials.• Planning and organize French language classes, workshops, and events.• Assess the proficiency levels of students and designing appropriate learning plans.• Provide guidance and support to French language instructors.• Monitoring and evaluating the effectiveness of the French language program.• Collaborate with other departments or organizations to promote French language learning and cultural activities.• Keep up-to-date with developments in French language teaching methodologies and resources.• Provide support for student testing, assessment, placement, and induction as directed by the Director of Studies.• Address student and group leader inquiries on academic matters, and handle student issues and emergencies as they arise.• Offer regular support to teachers, providing assistance in implementing and maintaining academic procedures and records such as observations, teacher opinion surveys, and the buddy system.• Organize and contribute to teacher development sessions when required to enhance their professional growth.• Carry out lesson observations and provide oral and written feedback to teachers, forwarding feedback documentation to the deputy campus director.• Offer regular support to teachers, providing assistance in implementing and maintaining academic procedures and records such as observations, teacher opinion surveys, and the buddy system.• Organize and contribute to teacher development sessions when required to enhance their professional growth.• Carry out lesson observations and provide oral and written feedback to teachers, forwarding feedback documentation to the deputy campus director.• Provide support for exam preparation classes to all teachers.• Teach classes as required to meet operational demands, such as teacher absences or changes in student numbers.• Organize and conduct group leader meetings and workshops upon request, covering topics such as an overview of the French academic program, refreshing teaching methodologies, or language classes.• Adhere to the Aii dress code, maintaining a professional appearance at all times.Regular/daily tasks:• French Language Curriculum - New syllabus design - Progress test design and implementation - New final examination design and implementation - Monitoring and developing French Language Curriculum• Interview applicants - CV checking - Written test checking• New Teacher and Observation - New teachers will be oriented about the basic rules and regulations of the school by the Head of French Language - Head of French Language has to explain the observation criteria to the new teachers before observing them - New teachers will be observed by the Head within the first 2 weeks of the term - The Head have to meet the new teacher for the feedback• Sponsorship Program - Spot check if the teachers of the CAs are updated regularly - Find ways on how to make the program effective• Professional Development - Teaching - Counseling• Coordinate in & out extra-curricular activities for students and teachers - Verbal and Written reports - Create an exact timeline to maintain the consistency of the reports• School policy   - Familiarize with all school policies - Help develop and strengthen school policies - Create policies on French Language Program.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor’s Degree in French Language or French Literature or Education, or a related field • Preferably Master’s Degree in French Language, French Studies or a related field• At least 2 years of management experience in education or related fields.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

Job Description: - Provide inspiring and purposeful leadership for the staff, teachers and students.- Work in partnership with the Aii, staff and parents generating the beliefs and values that will underpin the school.- Continue to implement a Development Plan that will secure continuous school improvement.- Monitor and evaluate the performance of the school and respond and report to the management as required.- Ensure that management, finances, organization and administration of the school supports its vision and aims.- Ensure that school policies and practices take account of national, local and school requirements.- Monitor, evaluate and review the impact of policies, priorities and targets of the school in practice, and take action if necessary.- Ensure that all those involved in the school are committed to its aims, motivated to achieve them, and involved in meeting long, medium and short term objectives and targets which secure the educational success of the school.- Secure delivery of the highest possible standards of teaching and learning throughout the school.- Develop and maintain a focus on achievement, maximizing the potential and academic performance of all students against national and individual targets and aspirations.- Maintain effective assessment, recording and reporting systems of student progress and ensure these are used to challenge underperformance and drive improvement.- Build and maintain effective partnerships between school, students and parents to support learning.- Involve students, as appropriate, in the decision-making processes in the school by developing policies and practice that treat students as partners in the learning process.- Monitor, evaluate and review classroom practice and promote improvement strategies leading to raised standards.- Develop and implement a broad and relevant curriculum, which embraces the school’s specialisms, innovative approaches to teaching and learning, national initiatives and is at the forefront of best practice, to meet the needs of all students.- Ensure that educational provision and achievement for pupils with special needs are maximized through an appropriate mix of integrated and specialist needs provision.- Monitor and evaluate the curriculum for both quality and value for money.- Ensure that suitably challenging targets are set, including those for student attainment, progress, behavior and attendance.- Develop an ethos and structure for managing behavior, which enables each student to achieve their potential, including the management of pastoral care, student welfare and effective anti-bullying procedures.- Be outward facing, taking a strategic role in the development of new and emerging technologies to enhance and extend the learning experience of students and the pedagogical skills of staff, deploying technological resources effectively and efficiently in order to realize the aims of the school.- Create a culture of challenge, high expectations and support where all students can achieve success and be engaged in personalized learning, supported by a curriculum offer appropriate to their individual needs, aspirations and abilities.- Ensure a wide range of community-based, off-site and outdoor learning experiences are available.- To promote extracurricular activities in accordance with the educational aims of the school.- Supervise ESL Teachers and other staff.- Plan, allocate, support and evaluate work undertaken by groups, teams and individuals, ensuring clear delegation of tasks and devolution of responsibilities in a manner consistent with conditions of employment.- Implement and sustain effective systems for the management of staff performance, incorporating performance management and target setting.- Promote and monitor the continuing professional development of staff, conduct a workshop or sharing sessions to the teachers under supervision.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor/Master degree in Education or related field- Management experiences in education and related fields- Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative- Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views- Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks- An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude- Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media- Ability to understand and keep within a budget- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English- Strong administrative and organizational skills.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: 012 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description: • ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើសិស្សានុសិស្សដែលខ្លួនដឹក និងរថយន្តដែលខ្លួនកាន់• ទទួល និងអនុវត្តផែនការដឹកជញ្ជូនសម្ភារ ឬបុគ្គលិកតាមផ្នែក• ថែរក្សា និងគ្រប់គ្រងរថយន្ត និងសម្ភារក្នុងរថយន្តដែលខ្លួនកាន់ឳ្យគង់វង្សបានល្អ• អនុវត្តគោលការណ៍ និងនីតិវិធីប្រតិបត្តិការរបស់ផ្នែកប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវ• គោរព និងអនុវត្តច្បាប់ចរាចរណ៍ក្នុងការបើកតាមដងផ្លូវជាប្រចាំ• ត្រូវស្លៀកពាក់ឯកសណ្ឋានអ្នកបើកបរឱ្យមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ និងត្រឹមត្រូវក្នុងពេលបំពេញការងារ• ត្រួតពិនិត្យសុវត្ថិភាពរថយន្តជាប្រចាំមុនពេលចេញដំណើរ• ត្រួតពិនិត្យរថយន្ត សិស្សក្នុងរថយន្ត និងសម្ភារក្នុងរថយន្តក្រោយពេលដឹកសិស្សរួចដើម្បីប្រាកដថាមិនមានភ្លេចសិស្ស ឬសម្ភារនានាក្នុងឡាន• ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងសម្អាតខាងក្នុងរថយន្តជាប្រចាំក្រោយពេលដាក់សិស្សអស់• ដឹកសិស្សចូលរៀនឱ្យទៀងទាត់ពេលវេលាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ• ត្រូវមានបញ្ជីអវត្តមានសិស្សជិះឡានគ្រប់ម៉ោង តាមវេន និងបំពេញឱ្យបានគ្រប់ចន្លោះ• ត្រូវរាយការណ៍មកប្រធានតំបន់ជាប្រចាំនៅពេលយកឡានទៅចាក់ប្រេង ឬជួសជុលផ្សេងៗ• ថែរក្សាសម្ភារៈដែលមានក្នុងរថយន្ត ដូចជា អំបោសស្លាបមាន់ ឆ័ត្រ ដូយ តាកេ ធុងសម្រាម បំពង់ពន្លត់អគ្គីភ័យ ។ល។ដោយមានការរៀបចំទុកដាក់ សម្អាត ឱ្យមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ត្រឹមត្រូវជានិច្ច• សំអាតរថយន្តពីរដងក្នុងមួយថ្ងៃ• សំអាតបរិវេនដាក់រថយន្តឱ្យមានអនាម័យ និងសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់• ត្រូវចូលតាមគោលដៅរៀងៗខ្លួនតាមការកំណត់របស់ផ្នែកដោយការទទួលខុសត្រូវ• ចតរថយន្តឱ្យមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ល្អ និងមានសុវត្ថិភាព• ជួយមើលការខុសត្រូវសិស្សរៀងរាល់ពេលចេញលេងម្តងៗ• រៀងរាល់ចុងខែ សរសេរបញ្ជីឈ្មោះសិស្ស និងឆែកវិក្កយបត្រសិស្សឳ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ• ត្រូវជួយផ្នែកផ្សេង តាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ប្រធានតំបន់• រក្សាអនាម័យខ្លួនប្រាណ និងកិ្លនខ្លួនឳ្យបានល្អប្រសើរជានិច្ច• គោរពវិន័យ និងច្បាប់ទំលាប់ការងារប្រកបដោយសេចក្តីថ្លៃថ្នូរ និងសីលធម៌ល្អជានិច្ច• រក្សា និងលើកកម្ពស់សេវាកម្មរថយន្តសាលាឳ្យមានគុណភាព និងទំនុកចិត្ត• ចួលរួមវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាល បំពាក់បំប៉ន តម្រង់ទិស និងគោលការណ៍ណែនាំផ្សេងៗ• ឆ្លើយឆ្លងជាមួយប្រធានក្រុម និងក្រុមការងារឳ្យទៀងទាត់ និងច្បាស់លាស់ក្នុងគ្រុបតេឡេក្រាម• គោរព និងអនុវត្តពិពណ៌នាការងារ (JD) របស់ខ្លួនដោយការទទួលខុសត្រូវ និងយកចិត្តទុកដាក់ខ្ពស់• ចូលរួមគោរពច្បាប់ចរាចរណ៍ឳ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ• ផ្តល់ការយកចិត្តទុកដាក់ស្មើៗគ្នាជាមួយសិស្ស ហើយត្រូវធ្វើជាគម្រូល្អផងដែរ• ត្រូវចូលរួមថែរក្សា និងការពារតម្លៃ ព្រមទាំងកេរ្តិ៍ឈ្មោះរបស់ផ្នែក និងស្ថាប័ន• គ្មានបក្សពួក អំពើពុករលួយ គំនិតកេងប្រវ័ញ្ញផ្សេងៗដូចជាប្រេងសាំង កង់ និងអាគុយ ក៏ដូចជាសម្ភារឡាន នានាជាពិសេសទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិរបស់ស្ថាប័ន• គ្រប់គ្រង ថែរក្សា និងប្រើប្រាស់អាយកូមក្នុងទំនាក់ទំនងការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃឳ្យមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព• ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ជាប្រចាំដោយយកចិត្តទុកដាក់រៀងរាល់ពេលដាក់សិស្សដល់ផ្ទះ ដោយប្រាកដថាសិស្សបានចូលទៅក្នុងផ្ទះដោយសុខសុវត្ថិភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ• ត្រូវគ្រប់គ្រង និងប្រើប្រាស់លេខទូរសព្ទឳ្យច្បាស់លាស់ និងទៀងទាត់ ហើយករណីផ្លាស់ប្តូរ ត្រូវរាយការណ៍ប្រធានក្រុមភ្លាម• អនុវត្តការងារផ្សេងៗតាមការស្នើរបស់ប្រធានក្រុម។
Job Requirement: • ធ្លាក់ ឬជាប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២• មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២២ ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ• មានបណ្ណបើកបរដែលមានសុពលភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ• មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងការបើកបរ យ៉ាងហោចណាស់ ១ឆ្នាំ• អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់• មានការព្យាយាម ភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ  និងការលះបង់ខ្ពស់• មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ • មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ• ចេះនិយាយ ចេះសរសេរអក្សរខ្មែរបានសមរម្យ• មានសុជីវកម្មល្អ និងឥរិយាបទវិជ្ជមានក្នុងការងារ• មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ និងការចូលរួមល្អក្នុងការងារ• មិនពាក់ព័ន្ធគ្រឿងញៀន• មានទំលាប់ល្អក្នុងការងារបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនង៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564* ប្រវត្តិរូបដែលគ្មានរូបថត នឹងមិនត្រូវបានដាក់បញ្ចូលក្នុងវគ្គសម្រាំងនោះទេ។

jobUrl: https://www.camhr.com/a/job/10583031?title=ចាងហ្វាងរងមធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ និងទុតិយភូមិ
job title: ចាងហ្វាងរងមធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ និងទុតិយភូមិ
position: ចាងហ្វាងរងមធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ និងទុតិយភូមិ
Job Description: គោលបំណងរួមនៃតួនាទី :សហការ គ្រប់គ្រង និងដឹកនាំកម្មវិធីសិក្សា និងគុណភាពអប់រំផ្នែកមធ្យមសិក្សាដែលខ្លួនទទួលបន្ទុក និងកម្មវិធីសិក្សាផ្នែកជំនាញមធ្យមសិក្សា(ក្នុងករណីខ្លួនទទួលបន្ទុក)ឱ្យមានដំណើរការល្អប្រសើរដោយផ្តោតលើ គុណភាព វិន័យ និងសេវាកម្មជូនសិស្សានុសិស្សដោយឈរលើស្មារតីវិជ្ជាជីវៈខ្ពស់បំផុត។• ការងារគរុកោសល្យ• ការងាររដ្ឋបាល• ការងារគ្រប់គ្រង• ការងារទំនាក់ទំនង• ភាពជាអ្នកដឹកនាំ• លទ្ធផលដែលសម្រេចបាន• ការគិតវិភាគ• ភាពបត់បែន• ភាពអត់ធ្មត់• ការងារជាក្រុម• ការអភិវឌ្ឍ• ការចូលរួម
Job Requirement: • មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬបរិញ្ញាបត្រជាន់ខ្ពស់ លើមុខជំនាញអប់រំ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។  • មានសញ្ញាបត្រគរុកោសល្យ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។• ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធ:• មានបទពិសោធគ្រប់គ្រងលើផ្នែកអប់រំយ៉ាងតិច៥ឆ្នាំ។  • មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងលើការងារប្រតិបត្តិដោយភាពឯករាជ្យ ម្ចាស់ការ និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់។ • មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យ ឬសមត្ថភាពផ្សេងៗទៀតលើផ្នែកអប់រំ។ • មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ ឬចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេសដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធលើកម្មវិធីដូចជា Ms. Offices, Internet, E-mail។ល។ • មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកភាសាបរទេសជាពិសេសភាសាអង់គ្លេស។  • មានសមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រង និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្ស ឬបញ្ហាគ្រូ។ • មានសមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រង និងធ្វើឯកសាររដ្ឋបាលដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធនៃផ្នែកអប់រំ។ • មានសមត្ថភាពធ្វើការទំនាក់ទំនងប្រកបដោយវិជ្ជាជីវៈ។ • មានសមត្ថភាពស្រាវជ្រាវក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគ្រូ ឬបុគ្គលិក។  បៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនង៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564* ប្រវត្តិរូបដែលគ្មានរូបថត នឹងមិនត្រូវបានដាក់បញ្ចូលក្នុងវគ្គសម្រាំងនោះទេ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh No. 11A, Street 402, Phum 2, Sangkat Tumnup Toek, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description: • Process the new student placement test, invigilate, mark the test and contact the interviewer to conduct the interview.• Record and process meeting minutes and other documents for all departments when required.• Input students’ results into database system and commit to human-error-free work.• Maintaining student’s file and properly keep all documents including application forms, receipts and other necessary documents are kept safely, yet easily accessible when needed. • Move Aii students who have paid school fee for semester or year to the next term.• Ensure the staff and student ID cards are issued on time and record and report of ID card issuance including broken ID card for Administration Supervisor (AS). Frequently check with warehouse about ID card and ensure it must not run out of stock.• Be in charge of organizing events either inside or outside the organization/school. Make sure proper checklist of items used in each event are recorded and return back to stock when the event’s finished.• Conduct the student’s opinion survey of American Intercon School.• Conduct the student’s opinion survey of Aii Language Center. • Record and process meeting minutes and other documents for all departments when required.• Make sure new term preparation checklist is done at least one week for the term starts.• Make sure new term preparation checklist is done at least one week for the term starts. Drinking water, coffee, tea and other materials must be checked and report to Administration Supervisor.• Design for internal use.• And other assigned tasks.** Sub-Responsibilities:1. Maintain and record In-and-Out documents, and process In & Out documents to the relevant departments.2. Give reception and make of the Student Certification Letter such as; reference, transcripts, recommendation letter and other official letters.3. Create and update Aii class schedule by term.4. Check and update Office’s stationary and inventory to make sure that they are able to use or replace or lose or buy new.5. Check and update Office’s Fixed Asset to make sure that they have stayed at the same place or moved out.6. Maintaining student’s file and properly keep all documents including application forms, receipts and other necessary documents are kept safely, yet easily accessible when needed. 7. Ensuring the memo, poster, and announcement are posted on the bulletin board regularly.8. Stamping on documents, letter to parents, certificates and other official documents.9. Printing monthly attendance sheet for Aii at the end of the month.10. Design for internal use.11. And other assigned tasks.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor Degree in Management, Education or other related fields.• Administrative and Organizational Skills• Experienced in dealing with administrative affairs in school or education field• Be able to use office applications including Word, Excel, Power Point, and E-mail.• Be able to communicate with team and can complete work with tight timelines and multiple deadlines.Benefits:• Competitive salary• Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse• NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance• Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits• Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of • Labor and Vocational Training• Career advancement opportunities• Training opportunities for professional development• Annual salary increment based on performance review• Seniority Pay.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

Job Description: • Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).• Assist a teacher and reinforce the instruction taught in the classroom to students.• Supervise the students outside of the classroom at the playground, during bathroom breaks, and on field trips or study tours.• When class is not in session, a teacher aide might assist other tasks assigned by the school.• Organize the classroom and put supplies in order.• Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).• Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.• Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English study and focus on a specific aspect of language use.• Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.• Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.• Contribute productively to the school as a whole.• And other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor degree in Education• Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media• Ability to understand and keep within a budget• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English• Strong administrative and organizational skillsHow to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: 012 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

job title: ប្រធានក្រុមអ្នកបើកបរ_Driver Team Leader
position: ប្រធានក្រុមអ្នកបើកបរ_Driver Team Leader
Job Description: - ទទួលខុសត្រូវដឹកនាំក្រុមបុគ្គលិកបើកបរតាមក្រុមនីមួយៗ- គ្រប់តំបន់ឡានរត់របស់ខ្លួន និងពង្រឹងក្រុមរបស់ខ្លួនឱ្យមានដំណើរការដោយរលូន- ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា និងរបាយការណ៍បញ្ហាបុគ្គលិកបើកបរមកប្រធានផ្នែកជាប្រចាំ- គ្រប់គ្រងបុគ្គលិកបើកបរឱ្យមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព- គ្រប់គ្រងឡានរបស់ក្រុមឱ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់ (ការចត ការជុសជុល ការលាងសម្អាត ការថែរក្សាអនាម័យ)- ជួបពន្យល់ណែនាំបុគ្គលិកបើកបរដែលមានបញ្ហា និងលើកទឹកចិត្ត-បុគ្គលិកបើកបរដែលបំពេញការងារបានល្អ- គ្រប់គ្រង់បញ្ជីវត្តមានជិះឡានសាលា- រៀបចំឯកសារលិខិតផ្សេងៗដល់កូនក្រុមដើម្បីដាក់តាមរថយន្ត- គ្រប់គ្រងវិក្កយបត្រសិស្សបង់ថ្លៃរថយន្តសាលា - ប្រជុំបែងចែងសិស្សជិះឡានប្រចាំខែ- ស្រង់ឈ្មោះសិស្សមិនទាន់បង់ថ្លៃឡាន និងស្រង់ឈ្មោះសិស្សដែលត្រូវបង់សង- ប្រមូលរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែ ស្តីពីសកម្មភាព និងបញ្ហាជួបប្រទះ- គ្រប់គ្រងការចាក់ប្រេងរបស់បុគ្គលិកបើកបរតាមស្ថានីយ៍តូតាល់- តាមដាន និងពង្រឹងការអនុវត្តច្បាប់ទម្លាប់របស់តៃកុងឡាន- តាមដាន និងត្រួតពិនិត្យសម្ភារៈតាមរថយន្តរបស់កូនក្រុម- តាមដាន និងត្រួតពិនិត្យការកត់ត្រូវចូលសៀវភៅប្រវត្តិរថយន្ត- ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាការប៉ះពារ បញ្ហាសិស្សជិះរថយន្តសាលា- ត្រួតពិនិត្យរថយន្តកូនក្រុមមុន និងក្រោយថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យធំៗ- រៀបចំឡានដឹកសិស្សកីឡារាល់ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍សំរាប់សិស្ស A​IS- រៀបចំឡានដឹកសិស្សញាំអាហារ និងសិស្សផ្ញើខ្លួនឆ្លងអគារ- រៀបចំសិស្សមត្តេយ្យក្នុងកំឡុងពេលសិស្សអង់គ្លេសចប់វគ្គសិក្សា- រៀបចំទីតាំងឡានពេលយប់ និងពេលថ្ងៃតាមអគារ- រៀបចំវេនសំអាតហ្គារ៉ាស់ សោភណ្ឌភាព អនាម័យ និងគោលដៅសំខាន់ៗទៅតាមតំបន់- រៀបចំឡានសម្រាប់ដឹកសិស្សទស្សនកិច្ចសិក្សារបស់ - រៀបអ្នកជំនួសជើងដឹកសិស្ស ពេលកូនក្រុមសុំច្បាប់- រៀបចំវេនដឹកសិស្ស និងប្រចាំការពេលយប់- រៀបចំឡាន និងកម្លាំងតាមការស្នើសុំរបស់ផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ៕
Job Requirement: - ធ្លាក់ ឬជាប់ថ្នាក់ទី ១២- មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២៥ ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ- មានចំណះដឹងខាងច្បាប់ចរាចរណ៍ និងការបើកបរ- មានចំណេះដឹងការគ្រប់គ្រង និងដឹកនាំ- អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់- មានការព្យាយាម ភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ  និងការលះបង់ខ្ពស់- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ - មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ៕បៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនង៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564* ប្រវត្តិរូបដែលគ្មានរូបថត នឹងមិនត្រូវបានដាក់បញ្ចូលក្នុងវគ្គសម្រាំងនោះទេ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh No. 11A, Street 402, Phum 2, Sangkat Tumnup Toek, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

jobUrl: https://www.camhr.com/a/job/10583026?title=អ្នកបច្ចេកទេសម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់_AC Technician
job title: អ្នកបច្ចេកទេសម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់_AC Technician
position: អ្នកបច្ចេកទេសម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់_AC Technician
Job Description: • ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការថែទំា ជួសជុល និងដំឡើងថ្មី ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ តាមអគារនីមួយៗ ឱ្យស្របតាមតម្រូវការ និងមានដំណើរការល្អ។• ទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗសិក្សា និងដោះស្រាយការងារគម្រោងនីមួយៗ ឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។• រៀបចំផែនការណ៍ការងារក្នុងក្រុមធ្វើប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។• រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារ នៅពេលចាប់ផ្តើមការងារ និងបន្ទាប់ពីបញ្ចប់ការងារត្រូវថតរបាយការណ៍ផ្ញើមកប្រធានផ្នែកផ្ទាល់ នៅក្នុងក្រុមតេលេក្រាម ( Maintenance Unit) ។• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើកាសិក្សាគម្រោងការងារឱ្យមាន គុណភាព តម្លៃសមរម្យ សោភ័ណ្ឌភាព។• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការសហការ ការងារជាមួយជាងខាងក្រៅពេលមានការងារពុំអាចធ្វើបាន ឬបន្ទាន់ច្រើន។• ទទួលខុសត្រូវរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ការងារគម្រោងតាមបណ្ណស្នើសុំ ភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនិងបណ្ណការងារ។• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើសម្ភារដែលបើកចេញពីស្តុក និងសម្ភារអ្នកស្នើសុំដាក់ទិញ ពេលយកទៅប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងគម្រោងការងារ បើមានការបាត់បង់ ឬមិនបានកត់ត្រាចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍បណ្ណការងារ។• ទទួលខុសត្រូវផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់របាយការណ៍សម្ភារបើកចេញពីស្តុកជាមួយ និងបណ្ណការងារស្នើសុំបើកសម្ភាររៀងរាល់ចុងខែ។• ទទួលខុសត្រូវការងារខ្លួនឯងពី ចាប់ផ្ដើម រហូតដល់បញ្ចប់ការងារ។• ចូលរួមសហការ ការងារជាមួយបុគ្គលិកក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។• បង្កើតនៅគំនិតថ្មីៗ ដែលជួយសម្រួលទៅដល់ការងារនៅក្នុងផ្នែកឱ្យដំណើរការបានល្អប្រសើរ។• ជួយសម្របសម្រួលការងារទូទៅមួយចំនួនជំនួសប្រធានផ្នែក។• ត្រួតពិនិត្យឃ្លាំងសម្ភារ ជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ ដើម្បីទិញសម្ភារចូលស្តុកប្រចាំខែ។• ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីឧបករណ៍ ក្នុងផ្នែកមួយ ជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុក។• ទទួលខុសត្រូវការថែរក្សាឧបករណ៍ ដែលសាលាបើកឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់។• ទទួលការងារពីប្រធានផ្នែក។បញ្ជាក់៖• ត្រូវប្រកាន់ខ្ជាប់នូវអត្តចរិកការងារមួយចំនួនដូចជា មានក្រមសីលធម៌វិជ្ជាជីវៈ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ការងារត្រូវធ្វើឱ្យទាន់ពេលកំណត់ ប្រើពាក្យសម្ដីឱ្យបានសមរម្យ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ហ្មត់ចត់ មិនលម្អៀង រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងរហ័សរហួន ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម  មិនបង្អូសបន្លាយ ឬកេងប្រវ័ញ្ចកិបកេងពេលវេលា ហាមគេចវេសការងារ មានចិត្តចេះសហការគ្នា ចេះសន្សំសំចៃ  និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ និងត្រូវមើលបញ្ហា ឱ្យឃើញជាបញ្ហា។• ធ្វើការងារដោយគោរពទៅតាមគោលការណ៍ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបានចែង។• ការចេញពីទីតាំងការងារដោយគ្មានការអនុញ្ញាត ពីប្រធានផ្នែកត្រូវបញ្ឃប់ពីការងារ។• ត្រូវមានសៀវភៅឬឯកសារកត់ត្រា រាល់មានការប្រជុំ ឬពេលមានការងារពីថ្នាក់លើដាក់ឱ្យ។• ពេលបំពេញការងារ ត្រូវមានសម្ភារបួនប្រភេទ សម្ភារការពារ សម្ភារការពារសុវត្ថិភាព សម្ភារធ្វើ និងសម្ភារសម្រាប់សម្អាត។• ចេះចែករំលែករាល់ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ដែលបានទទួលទៅឱ្យបុគ្គលិកនៅក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់បានដឹង៕
Job Requirement: • បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឯកទេស ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ និងពាក់ព័ន្ធ• មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២៥ឆ្នាំ ដល់ ៥០ឆ្នាំ។• មានបទពិសោធន៍រយៈពេល ០៣ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ។• អាចប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធី Ms Word, Excel, PowerPoint ,Email។• ធ្លាប់ទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលទាក់ទងជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស និងមានឯកសារដែលទទួលស្គាល់។• អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់។• មានការព្យាយាម និងភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ។• មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ។• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ។• ការដំឡើងកន្ទុយម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ (ត្រូវសិក្សាពីទីតាំងខ្យល់ចេញចូលម៉ាស៊ីន)។• ការថ្លឹងម៉ែត្រទឹកឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។• ការរៀបចំប្រអប់ទុយោហ្គែន។• ការប្រើប្រាស់ទុយោស្ពាន់ត្រឹមត្រូវតាមស្តង់ដារបស់ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់។• គុណភាពជួសជុល។• ការងារលាងសម្អាតម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់។• ការងារមុនដំឡើងម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ (ត្រូវមានរៀបចំសម្ភារជាគម្រោងទុកមុន)។• ការងារបិទរុន្ធជញ្ជាំង។• ការដោះដូរទីតាំងម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់។• ការប្រើប្រាស់ឧបករណ៍តាមបទដ្ឋានបច្ចេកទេសឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។• ការងារធ្វើតាមប្លង់ដែលប្រធានផ្នែកដាក់ឱ្យ។• ការប៉ាន់ស្មានសម្ភារមុនពេលធ្វើគម្រោងការងារអ្វីមួយ។• ការងារធ្វើតែមួយដង។បៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនង៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564* ប្រវត្តិរូបដែលគ្មានរូបថត នឹងមិនត្រូវបានដាក់បញ្ចូលក្នុងវគ្គសម្រាំងនោះទេ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh No. 11A, Street 402, Phum 2, Sangkat Tumnup Toek, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description: - Be responsible and accountable for setting and advancing the academic strategy of the Department in line with Faculty and the Aii Language Center strategic plans and direction.- Be an active member of the Faculty Executive Board and contribute to the overall leadership and management of the Faculty: it is expected that Deputy Campus Director will carry functional responsibility for specific agreed cross-cutting Faculty areas.- Develop and sustain appropriate structures for management, consultation, decision-making and communication with staff and students.- Promote and represent the center both internally and externallyResponsibility for Teaching & Students- Ensure the best possible student experience - Refresh and develop new programs in order to attract new students and markets.Responsibility for Research- Ensure the highest levels of quality, integrity and ethics in all research undertaken.- Create a dynamic and forward-looking research environment for both staff and students.- Create and exploit new opportunities for knowledge transfer activity in order to secure additional income streams and new areas of teaching and/or research.- Contribute to the center-wide initiatives in order to improve understanding and communication of this area.- Ensure that School HR policies and procedures are implemented.- Ensure that staff performance is managed appropriately and in a way that is consistent with the expectations of the Management & the Senate, and that fair workload allocation processes are in place- Ensure all staffs have access to the necessary support to enable them to contribute fully and develop their skills and experience.- Engender a culture of excellence, co-operation and respect both within and beyond the department.- Make effective use of all staffing resources and seek opportunities for collaboration and joint working with others beyond the department and beyond the Faculty.- Ensure students are included as appropriate in the various decisions making within the department.- Ensure a safe and healthy environment for both staff and students, and full compliance with health and safety requirements.- Supervise & work collaboratively with the head teachers.- Take responsibility for devolved budgets and comply with the centers financial regulations.- Manage income and expenditure in order to promote financial sustainability.- Ensure adherence by all Departmental members, with the Center Financial Regulations and other financial operating procedures and regulations.- Ensure that Center’s equipment/facilities under the department´s control are properly maintained and serviced as required.- Ensure all activities are carried out to the highest possible standards and put in place the necessary evaluation and monitoring procedures to ensure both compliance and improvement: such procedures will include teaching, research and management of all resources.- Comply with auditing, quality assurance and management procedures both internal and external development of Academic & Research- Develop and implement all short term and long term strategies and ensure consistency in same.- Assist management with accurate information as required for all campus associate activities and initiate decisions.- Determine and ensure effective maintenance on organized structure on campus.- Supervise effective working of all subordinates and provide business and managerial assistance to all and develop effective team.- Analyze all fiscal requirements for campus and execute strategies to achieve same.- Ensure adherence to all statutory and regulatory regulations.- Develop and implement various business plans on quarterly and monthly basis ensure effective working of everyday operations- Monitor all objectives and strategic goals for operations and finances and ensure achievement of same.Develop various new academic programs and provide modification to all current programs.- Administer all student recruitment.
Job Requirement: - Master degree in Education or related field- Management experiences in education and related fields- Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative- Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views- Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks- An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude- Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media- Ability to understand and keep within a budget- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English- Strong administrative and organizational skills. How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

Job Description:
- រៀបចំកិបកាសែតរៀងរាល់ព្រឹក នៅជាន់ផ្ទាល់ដី និងការរក្សាទុកទិន្នន័យ (Hard and Soft)
- តាមដាន ដោះស្រាយ ត្រួតពិនិត្យការខ្ចីសៀវភៅយឺត ឬបាត់ និងការផាកពិន័យ
- រៀបចំទុកដាក់សៀវភៅ តុកៅអី ក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យឲ្យមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ របៀបរៀបរយ និងអនាម័យ
- បោះត្រាក្នុងសៀវភៅ
- អ៊ុតក្របសៀវភៅ
- ធ្វើបារកូដ (Barcode) សៀវភៅ
- បញ្ចូលកាតឡុកសៀវភៅ
- គ្រប់គ្រងការខ្ចី និងសងសៀវភៅក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ
- បញ្ចូលពាក្យសុំចូលជាសមាជិបណ្ណាល័យ បោះត្រា និងចុះហត្ថលេខា
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលសិស្សពេលសិស្សចូលបណ្ណាល័យ និងការសម្របសម្រួលផ្សេងៗ
- ថតរូបភាពសកម្មភាពសិស្សអានសៀវភៅក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ
- ស្រង់ស្ថិតិអ្នកចូលប្រើប្រាស់បណ្ណាល័យរៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃ
- បោសសម្អាតអនាម័យ បន្ទប់បណ្ណាល័យ ធ្នើសៀវភៅ និងកុំព្យូទ័រ
- ធ្វើបញ្ជីរបាយការណ៍ និងប្រាក់ផាកពិន័យ ទៅកាន់ផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ
- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ ប្រចាំខែ ប្រចាំវគ្គសិក្សា ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- បំពាក់សម្ភារផ្សេងៗ ឱ្យឯកសារ (បិទលេខកូដ សលាកប័ត្រខ្ចីសង Barcode ពាក្យកម្មសិទ្ធ និងស្លាកផ្សេងៗ
- បកលេខកូដចាស់ចេញពីសៀវភៅ
- ស្នើសុំសម្ភារដែលត្រូវប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
- ប្រគល់កាសែតទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបណ្ណសារដ្ឋាន(សប្តាហ៍ទី១នៃខែបន្ទាប់)
- ផ្តល់ជូនកម្មវិធីនិទានរឿង បត់រូបភាព កែច្នៃសម្ភារ ដល់សិស្សថ្នាក់ទី១-៦ ដែលចូលតាមកាលវិភាគ
- ស្រង់ឈ្មោះ និងធ្វើបញ្ជីបញ្ជីឈ្មោះសមាជិកដែលបានចំណាយពេលច្រើនក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ
- ចែកបណ្ណសរសើរដល់សមាជិកដែលបានចំណាយពេលច្រើនក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ
- សម្អាតអនាម័យតាមធ្នើសៀវភៅទាំអស់ (រៀបសៀវភៅតាមធ្នើឡើងវិញ)។
- រៀបចំតុបតែងសោភ័ណភាពបណ្ណាល័យ
- ធ្វើបញ្ជីចំណងជើងសៀវភៅដែលត្រូវស្នើសុំទិញបន្ថែម
- ចុះបញ្ជីសារពើភ័ណ្ឌសម្ភារ
- ទទួលការចុះអធិការកិច្ចរបស់ក្រសួង-មន្ទីរអប់រំ សម្រាប់ថ្នាក់មធ្យមសិក្សា បឋមភូមិ និងទុតិយភូមិ កំឡុងខែវិច្ឆិកា-មករា នាដើមឆ្នាំសិក្សា
- ចូលរួមវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធបច្ចេកទេសបណ្ណាល័យ។

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh No. 11A, Street 402, Phum 2, Sangkat Tumnup Toek, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description: . Oversee daily operations.. Enforce all workplace policies and procedures.. Monitor patient’s condition and assess their needs to provide the best possible care and advice.. Observe and interpret patient’s symptoms and communicate them to physicians.. Recoding patient’s vital signs and medication information and fill in patient’s charts.. Adjust and administer patient’s medication and provide treatments according to physician’s order.. Inspect the facilities and act to maintain excellent hygiene and safety (decontaminating equipment, sanitizing surfaces, preparing beds etc.…).. Provide instant medical care in emergencies.. Check and maintain nursing supplies.
Job Requirement: . Bachelor’s degree in nursing required.. 1-3 years nursing experiences.. Basic computer skills.. Experiences in home health care.. Experiences in emergency room or intensive care.. Ability to effectively communicate with patients, families, physician and staff.. Professional friendly attitude.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

Job Description: ** Overall Purpose of the Role:Aii Academic Secretaries help to keep the school running smoothly, taking care of the administrative and organizational tasks that make the school function• To provide administrative support for the academic office such as teaching and learning Management, including certificates, exam paperwork and results letters;• To assist with the supervision of exams;• To collect the student attendance regularly and to monitor student attendance records;• To prepare teaching material, control and maintain teaching equipment such as LCDs, office computers, Laptops, TVs and speakers;• To help with general office/school duties when the need arises;• To handle student and parent enquiries about the absences;• To compile and coordinate academic staff portfolios;• To Receive and make official school phone call;•To coordinate and prepare document and materials for parent-teacher association meeting;• To maintain the order and the cleanliness of the office and the facilities;• To take meeting minutes and history report of the office of secretary;• To assist student opinion survey with administration staff;• To coordinate fixed asset movement;• To check and update office and classroom bulletin board;• To count the stock of supply, and do report every month;• Other tasks are assigned by Head of Aii Academic Secretary.
Job Requirement: ** EDUCATION:• Bachelor degree is desirable, Business Administration Degree or relevant disciplinary 2 to 4-year experience in Com & Ben** KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:• Proven record in retention development;• Proven record in Salary Survey, job grading creation and salary structure;• Strong analytical skills;• Advanced understanding of all elements of compensation, including long-term incentives;• Strong research and interpretation skills;• Strong knowledge of Ms Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook;• Problem solving, Time Management, Communication and negotiations, presentation skill, network;• Strong knowledge of Cambodia Labor Law Compliance and Payroll process;• Can-do attitude, self-confidence, firm stance.APPROVALHow to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

Job Description: • Follow and maintains knowledge of all school policies and procedures.• Perform general office duties including answering multi-line phones, routing telephone calls or messages to appropriate staff, greeting the public, typing, proofreading, filing, sorting and handling incoming and outgoing mail, as needed.• Research, create, input, format, organize and edit relevant data as needed or requested and prepare in a usable format for the school.• Completes a high volume of computer work, using school computer and programs, to input a high volume of data with speed and accuracy, including confidential data, in an environment with constant interruptions.• Processes and tracks employee timesheets and work with the personnel officer and the HRD for approval.• Assists in preparing school materials (i.e., brochures, newsletters, learning materials etc.).• Reconciles account balances and financial documentation (Request form, cash receipts, and approval) ensuring accuracy.• Independently or in accordance with general instruction, composes correspondence on a wide range of subjects, requiring knowledge of procedures and policies of the assigned area.• Serves as receptionist and gives information or directs visitors and parents to appropriate offices, as needed.• Answers inquiries concerning standardized policies, procedures, and regulations.• Coordinates scheduling of meetings, appointments and travel and assists with all other administrative needs.• Schedules conferences, programs, events and teachers individual schedule as required including creating schedules, contacting all invited parties, preparing confirmation and distributing materials to teachers.• Places orders for all classroom and office supplies, as needed or requested.• Professionally represents the school and the District in interactions with parents, community, staff and students.• Maintains appropriate certifications and training hours as required.• Attends work regularly and is punctual.• Supervise academic secretary• Check and process the sick and annual leave• Process and confirm teacher and staff probation with HR• Monitor and report the monthly teacher tardiness• Arrange and monitor with the personnel officer the teacher written test• Help and arrange the teacher interview with the personnel officer.• Work and check with the personnel officer the in and out process of the teachers• Work with Personnel officer and Submit the monthly staff movement:• Promotion• Change position• Change campus• Change working hours• Suspension, fire, lay off, ditch• Write and keep Aii Academic Secretary history record (All Campuses)• Update Academic and secretary staff details• Ensure and evaluate all teaching materials and equipment are in good condition.• Ensure and maintain the order of the academic office• Maintain records and files especially teachers and other staff CVs• Write and submit history of the academic events every month• Process new teacher and academic staff the username, email and MJQ server etc.• Other assigned tasks.
Job Requirement: • A bachelor degree in Education/Administration or related fields• Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media• Ability to understand and keep within a budget• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English• Strong administrative and organizational skillsHow to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: 012 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

Job Description: • Assist customers with purchases• Prepare displays of books/school uniforms and assist with relocation of stocks when needed• Maintaining Intercon bookstore stock inventory control records, providing a list of low stock items for reorder• Respond to or direct telephone and walk-in inquiries as appropriate, and provide information concerning stock availability and other Intercon Bookstore activities to employees and students• Check the quality of products when receive the new shipment by comparing with the Master Sample on hand• Prepare daily sale report to the accountant department• Prepare monthly sale return report to the accountant department• Prepare administrative and operational reports such as Staff detail, History, Event history, Staff movement, AI&SL and record the minute meeting• Perform routine closing procedure, counting cash drawer, shutting down computer system and cash registers• Open or closes the Intercon Bookstore in accordance with detailed procedures.• Perform assigned responsibilities, duties, and tasks according to established practices procedures, techniques, and standards in a safe and efficient manner and with minimal supervision.

Job Description: ● Manage and oversee the digital marketing department, including digital marketing staff, consultants, agencies, and vendors● Collaborate with other departments (such as sales, academic, finance,business unis etc.) to understand the objectives and requirements of each project and ensure that the digital marketing output aligns with the brand identity and vision of Mengly J. Quach Education● Develop digital marketing strategies and tactics to boost the company’s reputation and drive qualified traffic to our website and social media accounts● Deploy successful digital marketing campaigns from ideation to execution using various organic and paid acquisition channels such as content creation, content curation, email marketing, SEO, SEM, PPC ads, video or display ads, etc.● Produce valuable and engaging content for our channels● Build strategic relationships and partner with key industry players, media outlets, influencers, and stakeholders● Prepare and monitor the digital marketing budget on a quarterly and annual basis and allocate funds wisely● Oversee and approve digital marketing material before they are published or distributed to ensure that they meet the quality standards and guidelines of Mengly J. Quach Education.● Measure and report on the performance of digital marketing campaigns using web analytics tools such as Google Analytics or other middle tools and provide feedback and recommendations for improvement.● Analyze consumer behavior and market trends and adjust digital marketing campaigns accordingly.● Identify new opportunities and channels to expand the reach and growth of Mengly J. Quach Education.
Job Requirement: ● Bachelor’s degree in marketing, communication, business administration, or a related field. Self-learners can apply for the position of Creative Designer at Mengly J. Quach Education with a proof portfolio.● At least 2 years of experience in a senior digital marketing role or a similar position.● Proven track record of designing and implementing successful digital marketing campaigns that achieve business goals.● Excellent knowledge of digital marketing software and tools such as Google Analytics, Google Ads, Facebook Ads Manager, other middle tools, etc.● Strong communication and presentation skills both written and verbal.● Ability to work effectively with different teams and stakeholders across the organization.● Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and prioritize tasks according to deadlines.● Ability to think strategically and creatively and solve problems.● Passionate about education and social impact.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: 012 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

position: Executive Secretary to the Vice President for Operations
Job Description: . Manage VP's calendar schedule appointments, meetings, visits, etc. Coordinate travel arrangements, including booking flights, hotels, ground transportation. Handle and prepare correspondence, including emails, letters, and reports. Organize and maintain all files of a highly confidential nature, such as personnel actions, contracts, and legal documents. Provide administrative assistance, such preparing reports, presentations for the vice president. Work closely with head principals and interacts with other departments to facilitate the work of school operations. Perform related clerical tasks such as filing, copying, managing office budget, maintaining office supplies inventory, and managing operating office equipment; initiate requests for goods, services or information, dialogues with Procurement. And other assigned tasks. Excellent time management and organization skills, especially the ability to prioritize and multitask. Effective and professional communication abilities, including being able to communicate with all levels of employees, vendors and clients or guests. Good written and verbal communication skills. Professional writing capabilities, including emails, memos, letters and other industry-related reports, documents, and correspondence. Project management skills, like goal setting, budget management and planning. Great customer service and interpersonal skills. Good computer skills, including basic troubleshooting skills. Familiarity with word processing software for creating and contributing to spreadsheets, drafting, and sharing documents and creating engaging and informative presentations. In-depth understanding of the industry or office s/he works in. Systematic thinker with detailed research proficiencies. Thorough understanding of clerical and secretarial principles, policies, and guidelines. Strong knowledge of databases and tracking systems. Fantastic organizational skills and detail oriented. Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines
Job Requirement: . Bachelor Degree in Management, Education or other related fields.. Administrative and Organizational Skills. Job Description: • Key liaison between Commercial Department and all other BUs to ensure all communications are aligned and updated regarding public relations, media planning and buying. • Ability to write content, articles and press releases both in Khmer and English.• Ensure brand voice consistency across all content for online and offline marketing assets • Work with internal staff and external partners to deliver content and creative assets that are coherent with our brand voice and strategy.• Represent the brand and perform public relations in an external networking function.• Coordinate with potential brand partners for the company and relevant business units.• Track and advance the content calendars, and regularly measure and refine progress results to apply data-driven insights to future content strategies.• Apply SEO, content development, distribution and measurement to effectively tailor content to reach audience personas.• Develop & align traditional media and social content channels including email or publication distribution.• Integrate content strategy with previous brand campaigns pillars to ensure brand voice consistency• Create content strategy, mobilizing storytelling opportunities on all channels — owned, earned and paid platforms.• Establish strategies for media relations, seeking placements in print, broadcast and online channels, and create the corresponding content including press releases, articles and presentations.• Expend media network while gathering knowledge of industry trends.• Test and implement innovative and relevant methods of measuring content, campaigns and tools, optimizing future campaigns from the results.
