Job Description: • Keep under review all corporate governance arrangements or developments which might impact the Company to ensure that the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trust are fully briefed on these matters and has regard to them when taking decisions.• Provide specialized advice and guidance to Executive and Non-Executive and Managements on all matters of governance, legality, risk, compliance and business conduct and will manage and reconcile conflicting views in relation to governance issues.• Ensure that the Executive and Non-Executive remains compliant with applicable standards of corporate governance and has the necessary infrastructure to support the governance rationale and governance framework.• Ensure that the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, Board’s and each of Trustees and each of their committees conduct their business in compliance with applicable legal and regulatory frameworks and associated codes of governance and practice, and in a manner which is otherwise appropriate for a public body.• Take corporate responsibility for the formulation and implementation of a framework for the development and management of legal and compliance procedural documents (policies, procedures, protocols and guidance) and to ensure its implementation.• Address any non-compliance with the applicable Codes of Conduct and Accountability.• Monitor the suitability and efficacy of risk management provisions and advise on improvements in support of the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trustees ability to make quarterly (or monthly) and annual statements and returns to the Regulator.• Ensure good information flows within the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trustees and its committees and between senior management, non-executive directors and managements. • Ensure that the requisite types of governance information are made available, either on the company’s website or in documents circulated to stakeholders;• Ensure the preparation, publication, distribution and presentation of the annual report;• Make available, where appropriate, for public inspection:  o A copy of the current constitution, registrations  o A copy of the latest annual accounts and any report of the auditor on those accounts  o A copy of the latest annual report• Ensure that all returns and self-certifications required by monitor, the Independent Regulator, are submitted in full and on time.• Ensure that the company complies with its constitution and that amendments to it are drafted and incorporated in line with correct procedures;• Attend Executive Management Team meetings to ensure congruence between the business of the Executive Management Team.• Bring to the attention of the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trustees any areas of unmanaged risk, or unique risks that are not otherwise addressed;• Ensure that appropriate arrangements are made for the planning and production of agendas, reports and the subsequent minutes for meetings of the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Boar of Trustees. • Contribute to a range of corporate projects relating to business proposals and developments.Legal Service• Provide a comprehensive Legal Service to deal with legal issues including inquests, employment law, litigation, commercial and contract law, and other judicial processes such as the management of claims arising from clinical negligence, complaints, disciplinary procedures and where relevant, untoward incidents reports and external enquiries;• Manage in-house staff and external legal service contract and associated budgets.• Ensure that appropriate procedures and protocols in place for the management of requests for legal advice and instructions on behalf of the Company;• Establish and communicate procedures for Management to take legal advice if required;
Job Requirement: • Master’s Degree in Law, private law, and corporate law.• 5 years management experience.• Strong knowledge in commercial and business laws, civil code, civil procedure,legal statutes and legislations on construction, development, and land laws.• Khmer and English (other languages are an advantage).• Microsoft Word, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Excel…• Hand-on legal practitioner.• Relational and People-centered.• Attention to Detail and Focus.• Trustworthy and Professional.• Committed and Loyal.• Highest level of Character and Integrity.• Strong leadership and management skills.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: 012 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

Job Description: • Write news articles on topics related to education.• Create and write education chronicle articles.  • Write in-depth news related to education tips or reform.• Write & edit articles assigned by head of news. • Review and edit draft articles such as spelling, grammar, punctuation, syntax, and scientific proof.• Work effectively towards specific timelines and deadlines.• Identify needs and develop content for various communication medium to increase visibility of the program.• Develop high-quality written press, web, and social media materials.• Update weekly and monthly report.• Other tasks assigned by Line Manager.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor Degree in related fields, Master in Education is more preferred.• At least 3 years’ experience from news institution especially Education News.• A proven ability to work both collaboratively and independently, and produce high-quality work on a defined timeline.• Young, energetic, Westernized concept of news and media outlet, creative, innovative and in-depth writing.• Good both Writing and Speaking.• Clearly understand on topic of news that assigned to writes and edit.• Good connection to the cycle of news group in the kingdom of Cambodia.• Be creative and quick follow up on news that’s happening in the country.• Be able to contact to sources effectively.• Have strong passion in writing news for education.• Be able to work well under pressure.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: 012 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

job title: គ្រូផែនដីវិទ្យា (មធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ និងទុតិយភូមិ)
position: គ្រូផែនដីវិទ្យា (មធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ និងទុតិយភូមិ)
Job Description: • ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងកែកិច្ចការសិស្សដោយគោរពតាមគោលការណ៍សាលា• ធ្វើរដ្ឋបាលថ្នាក់ឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់• អាននូវកំណត់ចំណាំ សេចក្តីជូនដំណឹង ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ជាប្រចាំ និងអនុវត្តន៍ឱ្យបាន១០០%• ចូលរួមរាល់សកម្មភាពរបស់សាលាដូចជាទិវាវប្បធម៌​ កម្មវិធីតាំងពិព៌រណ៍…• គោរពបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងសាលាឱ្យបាន១០០%• បង្រៀនមុខវិជ្ជាជំនាញថ្នាក់មធ្យមសិក្សា• ពិនិត្យអវត្តមាន និងសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ថ្នាក់រៀន• ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងកែកិច្ចការសិស្សដោយគោរពតាមគោលការណ៍សាលា• ធ្វើរដ្ឋបាលថ្នាក់ឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់• សរសេររកិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀន និងផែនការបង្រៀនប្រចាំថ្ងៃ• ផលិតនិងកែច្នៃសម្ភារៈឧបទ្ទេសសម្រាប់បង្រៀនមុខវិជ្ជជំនាញ• មើលសិស្សពេលចេញលេង និងពេលចេញទៅផ្ទះ• រៀបចំកិច្ចការផ្ទះ វិញ្ញាសាប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ប្រឡងពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស និងឆមាស និងកែឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ• ចូលរួមថែរក្សាទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិសាលា• សិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវរកវិធីសាស្រ្តបង្រៀនល្អៗ និងថ្មីៗ• អប់រំសិស្សអោយក្លាយជាកូនល្អ​ សិស្សល្អ​ មិត្តល្អ ពលរដ្ឋល្អ• ត្រូវបង្កើតបទបញ្ញត្តិថ្នាក់រៀននីមួយៗ• ផ្តល់ចំណេះដឹងពិតប្រាកដមួយដល់សិស្ស• គោរពបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងសាលាឱ្យបាន១០០%• បង្រៀនសិស្សតាមគោលការណ៍ដែលសាលាដាក់ជូន• រៀបចំផែនការការងារបង្រៀនបានល្អ• បង្រៀនអោយទាន់កម្មវិធីសិក្សាសាលាប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធិភាព​​• ប្រគល់កិច្ចការឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលាដែលសាលាបានកំណត់ជូន• សហការគ្នាឱ្យបានល្អរវាងក្រុមការងារ• ចូលរួមរាល់សកម្មភាពរបស់សាលាដូចជាទិវាវប្បធម៌​ កម្មវិធីតាំងពិព៌រណ៍…• អាននូវកំណត់ចំណាំ សេចក្តីជូនដំណឹង ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ជាប្រចាំ និងអនុវត្តន៍ឱ្យបាន១០០%• ដឹងច្បាស់នូវរចនាសម្ព័ន្ធសាលា• ធ្វើជាទូតដ៏ល្អរបស់ស្ថាប័ន• មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយមិត្តរួមការងារ• បំផុសទឹកចិត្តសិស្សឱ្យចូលរួមកម្មវិធីរបស់សាលាឱ្យបានផុសផុល• ផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ដល់ចាងហ្វាង ឬក្រុមការងារពេលឃើញមានបញ្ហា• គោរពមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈគ្រូបង្រៀនឱ្យបាន១០០%៕
Job Requirement: • មានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញវិជ្ជាជីវៈ• ចេះប្រើប្រាស់ Computer ​(Word Excel Power Point and email…)• ជាអ្នកប្រឹក្សាសិក្សាដ៏ល្អជាមួយសិស្ស និងអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល• គោរពម៉ោងការងារ• មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ• ព្យាយាម និងអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារជាមួយសិស្សានុសិស្ស• យកចិត្តទុកដាក់ជាមួយសិស្ស និងមានមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈខ្ពស់• មានសុខភាពល្អ កាយសម្បទាមាំមួន• មានភាពម៉ត់ចត់ និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ• មានភាពជឿជាក់លើមុខវិជ្ជាជំនាញដែលខ្លួនបង្រៀន• មានបទពិសោធបង្រៀនច្រើនឆ្នាំទៅលើមុខវិជ្ជាបង្រៀនផ្នែកជំនាញ៕របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនង៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564* ប្រវត្តិរូបដែលគ្មានរូបថត នឹងមិនត្រូវបានដាក់បញ្ចូលក្នុងវគ្គសម្រាំងនោះទេ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh No. 11A, Street 402, Phum 2, Sangkat Tumnup Toek, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description: • Write various business news such as Economic news, Stock Market news, IPO news,and some type of business topics for a short feature video.• Write and edit news. • Research and write business editorials for weekly publication on Facebook page.• Review and edit draft articles such as spelling, grammar, punctuation, syntax, and scientific proof.• Work effectively towards specific timelines and deadlines.• Identify needs and develop content for various communication mediums to increase visibility of the program.• Develop high-quality written press, web, and social media materials.• Update weekly and monthly reports.• Other tasks assigned by line Manager
Job Requirement: • Bachelor's Degree in related fields, Master's Degree is more preferred.• At least 3 years’ experience from news institution, especially Business News• Young, energetic, Westernized concept of news and media outlet, creative, innovative and in-depth writing, involving more with students and interns.• Good in both Writing and Speaking.• Clearly understand on topic of news that is assigned to write and edit.• Good connection to the cycle of news groups in the kingdom of Cambodia.• Good connection with the Media team and agency.• Be creative and quickly follow up on news that’s happening in the country.• Be able to contact sources effectively.• Have a strong passion for writing news for business.• Be able to work well under pressure.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: 012 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

Job Description: • Do data collection and draft planning including sampling of a department and submit for Senior Officer, Campus Internal Audit;• Conduct internal audit mission at a department and ensure high quality of the audit conduct;• Provide immediate recommendations as the result of both the compliances, risk and operational audits;• Draft internal audit report on own findings and report to the Sr. CIA and communicate findings to auditee for comments;• Ensure constant capacity building and up-to-date of company group’s performance;• Focus on functions at campus level such as Aii Academic Services, Aii Academic Support Services, AIS Academic Support Services, Athletic Department, AIS Study Program, Support Services (Bursar, Administrative Office, Information Office, MJQ Library, MJQ Student Health Center, School Bus Services…) and so on;• Other tasks required by the IA Director/Supervisor, Campus IA /Senior Officer, Campus IA.
Job Requirement: • University degree in banking/finance, accounting, business or economics, preferably a specialized accounting degree.• At least 1 year of experience in internal audit position or at least 2 years of experience of finance/account in the microfinance/banking/audit sector;• Good understanding of internal control and practices;• Ability to write timely, clear and concise reports on the findings;• The ability to use your own initiative;• Analytical thinking and attention to detail;• The ability to work effectively on your own and as part of a team;• Strong ethical standard and high levels of integrity;• Resilience under pressure;• Flexible thinking and ability to adapt to change;• Strong advance excel skill.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

job title: ប្រធានគ្រូនៃកម្មវិធីភាសាអង់គ្លេស_សាខាខេត្តតាកែវ
position: ប្រធានគ្រូនៃកម្មវិធីភាសាអង់គ្លេស_សាខាខេត្តតាកែវ
Job Description: - គ្រប់គ្រង រៀបចំ ចាត់ចែងរាល់កិច្ចការទាក់ទងនឹងកម្មវិធីភាសាអង់គ្លេស ធានាធ្វើយ៉ាងណាឱ្យការបង្រៀន និងរៀនដំណើរទៅដោយរលូន និងមានប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្ពស់- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ តាមដាន និងវាយតម្លៃលើគុណភាពបង្រៀនរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ- ធានាគុណភាព និងសុក្រិតភាពក្នុងការវាយតម្លៃសមត្ថភាព និងលទ្ធផលសិក្សាសិស្ស- អភិវឌ្ឍកម្មវិធីសិក្សា និងគោលការណ៍ប្រតិបតិ្តដើម្បីទទួលប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្ពស់ក្នុងការបង្រៀន និងរៀន- រៀបចំផែនការការងារ ដឹកនាំការប្រជុំប្រចាំខែ និងចែករំលែកព័ត៌មានជូនដល់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ- ចូលរួមប្រជុំរៀបចំផែនការការងារតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់គណៈគ្រប់គ្រង- ចូលរួម រៀបចំ និងចាត់ចែងសកម្មភាពផ្សេងៗរបស់សាលាតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់គណៈគ្រប់គ្រង- រៀបចំវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលទាក់ទងទៅនឹងអភិវឌ្ឍវិជ្ជាជីវៈគរុកោសល្យសម្រាប់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ- ពង្រឹងការអនុវត្តបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងរបស់សាលាឱ្យមានប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្ពស់- ជួបប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ និងដោះស្រាយរាល់បញ្ហាទាក់ទងជាមួយសិស្សានុសិស្ស អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ ក្នុងករណីចាំបាច់- ចូលរួមសហការ និងធ្វើការយ៉ាងជិតស្និទ្ធជាមួយចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក និងផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធផ្សេងៗ- បំពេញភារកិច្ចផ្សេងៗតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់គណៈគ្រប់គ្រងសាលា- ដើរតួនាទីជាទូតដ៏ល្អរបស់សាលា និងក្រុមហ៊ុន៕
Job Requirement: - មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកភាសាអង់គ្លេសស្ទាត់ជំនាញ- មានបទពិសោធបង្រៀន និងគ្រប់គ្រងយ៉ាងតិច៥ឆ្នាំ- មានជំនាញប៉ិនប្រសព្វក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនងប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធិភាព- មានចំណេះដឹងទូលំទូលាយខាងផ្នែកបច្ចេកវិទ្យាកុំព្យូទ័រជាពិសេស Ms Word, Excel, PowerPoint- មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងលើការងារប្រតិបត្តិដោយឯករាជ្យ ម្ចាស់ការ និងទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ - មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យ- មានភាពជាអ្នកដឹកនាំ មានម្ចាស់ការ និងចេះបទបែនតាមកាលទេសៈ៕របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនង៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564* ប្រវត្តិរូបដែលគ្មានរូបថត នឹងមិនត្រូវបានដាក់បញ្ចូលក្នុងវគ្គសម្រាំងនោះទេ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh No. 11A, Street 402, Phum 2, Sangkat Tumnup Toek, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Location: Phnom Penh，Phnom Penh，Phnom Penh，Phnom Penh，Phnom Penh，Phnom Penh，Phnom Penh，Phnom Penh
Job Description: - Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).- Teach Literacy and numeracy along with personal, social and emotional skills.- Employ a variety of instructional techniques and teaching strategies to meet different aptitudes and interests of students, including whole group/ small group or individual learning.- Follow course syllabus provided by Aii Language Center.- Help with the integration of technology into the classroom, helping set up computers and projectors, for example.- Be well planned for her/ his class. Design and follow a complete teaching plan.- Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).- Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.- Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English/Chinese study and focus on a specific aspect of language use.- Teach students English/Chinese skills, such as listening, reading, writing and speaking.- Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.- Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.- Contribute productively to the school as a whole.- Write student report cards using the online continuous assessment with their overall performance.- Organize learning materials and resources.- Use a variety of activities and instructional methods.- Assess student’s performance and progress to ensure they are mastering the skills on regular basis.- Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing.- Follow and comply with teaching standards.- Establish and enforce rules for behavior, and procedures for maintaining order.- Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students’ varying needs and interests.- And other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor degree in Education or equivalent- Master degree is a plus- Excellent problem-solving skills, and able to use initiative- Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views- Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks- An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude- Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media- Ability to employ technology- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English- Strong administrative and organizational skills.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: 012 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

Job Description: • Translate technical documents and communications related to manufacturing processes from Chinese to Khmer and Khmer to Chinese.•Ensure the accuracy and consistency of translations.•Collaborate with cross-functional teams to facilitate effective communication between Chinese and English-speaking team members.•Provide language support during meetings and presentations.•Other tasks as assigned.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor's degree in Translation, Linguistics, Engineering, or a related field preferred.• Fluency in both Chinese and Khmer, with exceptional written and verbal communication skills in both languages.• Proven experience in technical translation, particularly in the steel structure industry.• Proficiency in translation tools and software, such as CAT tools and Microsoft Office Suite.• Attention to detail, with the ability to maintain accuracy and consistency in translations.• Strong research skills and the ability to quickly grasp complex technical concepts.• Excellent organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects and prioritize tasks effectively.• Team player with strong interpersonal skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.• Previous experience in interpretation and knowledge of relevant industry standards and regulations would be an advantage.Competitive offer:• Annual Salary Increment• Annual Performance Bonus• Learning and Development• Lunch Allowance• Group Personal Accident Insurance ( Forte )• Working Accident and Health care Insurance ( NSSF )• Pension Funds• Company Events• Uniforms• Other terms and conditions follow to Company’s internal policy.Notice: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview.Send us your resume to recruitment@fuxin.com.khKindly note that only shortlisted candidate will be contacted for an interview!
Company Profile:
Founded under the principle of innovation, FUXIN is Cambodia's first pre-engineered steel buildings manufacturer for industrial application, commercial and retail outlets, storage, logistics, sports and leisure structures.

We thrive to be leader in supplying steel building solutions that are more superior in quality, more cost efficient, more time-saving and environmentally sustainable.

A member of ISI GROUP, FUXIN builds upon extensive experience and expertise of the Group in the area of manufacturing and industrial development. Today we have completed over 450 projects including some of the country’s most well-known projects Aeon Mall Sen Sok Parking Structure, and International Exhibition Hall.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment Team  010484535 recruitment@fuxin.com.kh F14, KMH Industrial Park, Phum Trapang Thleung, Sangkat Chom Chao, Khan Porsenchey, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 010484535

Job Description:
-Proactively identify new inquiry and maintain full information of opportunity
-Identify the needs of customers and provide a sufficient resolution in order to fulfill customer expectation
-Conduct frequent communication with customer by phone call, mail, written letter and visiting customer premises and build strong relationships
-Ensure minimum company sales target with high commitment
-Update customers profile (customer-by-customer) in the system
-Produce timely and accurate daily report to Team Leader in Excel report
-Provide daily verbal report to Team Leader/GM in the morning and before leaving office regarding today plan & today result and tomorrow plan
-Collect, analyze, and evaluate competitor to create sales strategy
-Support colleagues as and whenever necessary
-Prepare document for participating in the bidding
-Create Sales Talk Script for new and existing vehicles
-Follow up tax exemption process with agent and follow up shipping schedule with logistic
-Create and collect Sales Tool Kit of models assigned by Team Leader
-Apply plate registration number for both duty paid and duty free vehicles
-Promote and offer after sales services to customers
-Other tasks assigned by Leader/ Assistant Manager/ Manager
Job Requirement:
-Bachelor Degree of English Language/ Management or other related fields
-2-year experiences in Professional Sales
-Excellent communication skill
-Good English communication both spoken and written
-Chinese Speaking is a plus
-Good team player, initiative, friendly, fresh and service oriented
-Professional knowledge of computer (Ms. Word, Excel and Power Point)
Company Profile: Toyota (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. is a sole exclusive distributor for all TOYOTA vehicles, Genuine Parts and Quality Service in the Kingdom of Cambodia. With the endless and massive support from our manufacturer, we have always taken into consideration regarding the right selection of suitable products into Cambodian market. To make the best choice, the critical survey on market condition such as road condition, fuel quality, driving behavior, weather and so forth is thoroughly conducted and analyzed for the aim of ensuring the conformity of our products. As a result, many different varieties of TOYOTA models have been introduced to satisfy our customer's needs and wants.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  086333198 recruitment@toyota.com.kh Russian Federation Blvd, Phum Borey 100 Khnong,Sangkat Teuk Thla , Khan Sen Sok, Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia. 086333198

Job Description: -	Conduct communication with customers by phone call and via social media platform and direct visit in order to build a strong relationship.						-	Conduct outdoor activities, networking and chasing customers.-	Effectively carry out 8-touchpoints of the customer purchasing experiences both in showroom and Online					-	Call for Periodic Service Maintenance reminder, Booking Appointment and Post Service Follow up for sold out customers.						-	Identify the needs of customers and provide a sufficient resolution in order to fulfill customer expectations. 						-	Utilize the relationship with customers to generate potential leads. -	Ensure minimum company sales target with high commitment.					-	Update customer profiles in the company database system					-	Ensure the display in showroom is clean and create new ideas of showroom decoration when on showroom standby duty.						-	Timely and accurately produce daily report to supervisor. 	-	Understand and update competitors' movement and propose any new ideas to gain sales.-	Conduct Special training/meeting  or share experience among Sale team members-	Join event, roadshow, or other idea to increase number of new prospector		-	Support colleagues as when necessary 						-	Create your own digital's content to get more customer's inquiry (leads)		-	Participate in all sales-related trainings and most of other assigned training by receiving at least average result-	Provide customer high satisfaction through Sales Satisfaction Index evaluation and always do your best support solving customer problem if any.-	To share the best welcoming experience to customer to make them feel they are the VIP Guest visit our showroom.-	Perform other tasks assigned by supervisor.
Job Requirement: -	Bachelor’s degree in management/marketing or related fields		-	At least 2 years’ experience in sales preferably in automotive sector		-	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills		-	Good command of both spoken and written English		-	Team player, initiative, friendly, fresh, and service oriented		-	Knowledge of computer, Ms. Word, Excel, and Power Point		-	Having a valid driving license is a must.		-	Having knowledge of digital sales is a must.

Job Description: - ថែរក្សា និងសំអាតនូវរថយន្តដែលត្រូវបើកបរ- ត្រួតពិនិត្យនិង រៀបចំឡានមុន និងក្រោយពេលប្រគល់រថយន្- បញ្ចូនឯកសារដូចជាសន្លឹកកិច្ចការវិក័យបត្រ និងឯកសារ ផ្សេងៗពីជាន់មួយទៅជាន់ដទៃទៀត- ធានាមិនអោយមានគ្រោះថ្នាក់ឬ ការបះទង្គិចផ្សេងៗទាំងក្នុងនិងក្រៅបរិវេណក្រុមហ៊ុន- បើកបររថយន្តចេញ និងចូល រោងជាងពីប៉ុងសំរាប់ជួសជុលកន្លែងលាងសំអាតរថយន្ត និងពីជាន់មួយទៅជាន់ដទៃ     ទៀតដោយអនុវត្តន៍តាមគោលការណ៍សុវត្ថិភាពដែលបានកំណត់- បើករថយន្តជូនជាងនិងបុគ្គលិកដើម្បីបំពេញភារះកិច្ចតាមខេត្តនិង ក្នុងទីក្រុង- ទិញសំភារះនិងដឹកជញ្ជូនសំភារះ និងឧបករណ៍សំរាប់រោងជាង ឬការិយាល័យ- ផ្លាស់ប្តូរវេនប្រចាំការរៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃចុងសប្តាហ៍ នឹងថ្ងៃឈប់សំរាកផ្សេងៗជាក្រុមដើម្បីសម្រួលដល់ប្រតិបត្តិការណ៍           ផ្សេង- ការងារដទៃទៀត ដែលកំណត់ដោយប្រធានក្រុម/ប្រធានផ្នែក
Job Requirement: - មានអាយុចាប់ពី 18 ដល់ 30 ឆ្នាំដែលមានសុពលភាពនៃប័ណ្ណបើកបរប្រភេទD​ (ឃ)- ផ្តល់អាទិភាពចំពេាះអ្នកដែល​បានបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាថ្នាក់វិទ្យាល័យ ឬ ការអប់រំទូទៅ- អាចអាន និងសរសេរខ្មែរ​ និង​និយាយភាសាអង់គ្លេសបានច្រើន- ត្រូវមានភាពស្មោះត្រង់,អត់ធ្មត់,រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់,និង មានឆន្ទៈឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមក្នុងការងារ

Job Description: • Set team weekly, monthly goals, activities, and target and daily monitor their result.• Conduct daily review on prospect, A-Card, quotation, key activities, and sales performance of each Sales Consultant.• Review issues and provide solutions and best practices to increase the sales volume to each and all Sales Consultants in a PDCA manner.• Being available lo support and intervene team to solve the concerns and problems with customer or related parties• Review feedback from customers/ account regularly and taking concern action to increase sales and customer satisfaction• Help in preparing monthly and 3M forecast, reviewing customer pool, pending A-Card and set new customer segment by industry or category• Implementing sales strategies to maintain customer loyalty, repeat sales and expand sales channels• Help in preparing monthly and 3M forecast, reviewing customer pool, pending A-Card, set new customer segment by industry or category and sales activities proposal to achieve the target• Provide daily update on fleet sales performance versus plan and its key activities to management• As needed to develop fleet Sales SOP. Policy manual, guideline, and memo in compliance to company's rule, regulations and best practice.• Continually provide clear guidance, collaboration, meeting, and instruction to team or colleagues with the aim to exceed sales quotas and sustain target in a win-win context• Work together with Admin to monitor vehicle stock and inventory and exchange with other branches• Work closely with other departments to upskills Sales Team's knowledge, skills, and productivity• Work closely with Soles and Marketing Deportment in designing and implementing sales campaign, product launching, marketing too, and materials• Work with AM to prepare weekly, monthly sales performance reports and update• Perform other tasks as assigned by supervisor

jobUrl: https://www.camhr.com/a/job/10582781?title=ជាងបាញ់ថ្នាំរថយន្ត
job title: ជាងបាញ់ថ្នាំរថយន្ត
position: ជាងបាញ់ថ្នាំរថយន្ត
Job Description:
- ធ្វើការវាយតំលៃនិងព្យាករណ៍ចំពោះពេលវេលា និង តំលៃនៃការជួសជុល
- ធ្វើការរៀបចំការលាយថ្នាំពណ៌ និងការងារបាញ់ថ្នាំ
- មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវចំពោះការងារ និង ប្រាកដថារាល់ការងារទាំងអស់មានគុណភាពល្អ និងប្រគល់ជូនអតិថិជនទាន់ពេលវេលាតាមកាលកំណត់
- រៀននូវបច្ចេកទេសថ្មីនិងចូលរួមវគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលដែលបានផ្ដល់ឲ្យពីក្រុមហ៊ុន
- រាយការណ៍ភ្លាមៗអំពីភាពជាប់គាំងឬភាពមិនប្រក្រតីក្នុងកំឡុងពេលដំណើរការបាញ់ថ្នាំជាមួយរថយន្ដ
- ថែរក្សាឧបករណ៍ឱ្យបានស្អាត និងយកទុកកន្លែងដើមបន្ទាប់ពីប្រើប្រាស់រួច
- បញ្ចប់ការងារបាញ់ថ្នាំដោយអនុវត្ដតាមការណែនាំនិងពេលវេលាដែលបានកំណត់
- ធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពនិងកត់ចំណាំការងារដែលបានធ្វើរួច ដើម្បីរាយការណ៍ទៅថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ សំអាតកន្លែងធ្វើការមុននិងចាប់ផ្ដើមធ្វើការជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃដើម្បីធានានូវសុខុមាលភាព និងសុវត្ថិភាព
- ធានាមិនអោយមានការបាញ់ថ្នាំសងភ្ញៀវវិញឡើយ
- ការងារផ្សេងៗនឹងត្រូវបានចាត់ចែងដោយប្រធានផ្នែក
Job Requirement:
- ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច២ឆ្នាំលើជំនាញបាញ់ថ្នាំ
- បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាថ្នាក់មធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ (ថ្នាក់ទី៩)
- ចេះអាននិងសរសេរភាសាខ្មែរបានល្អ
- ចេះធ្វើការលាយពណ៌បានល្អ
- មានប័ណ្ណបើកបរ
- មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស (កាន់តែប្រសើរ)
- ការងារក្រុមល្អនិងចេះគ្រប់គ្រងពេលវេលា

Job Description: • Design Expertise: Develop and review structural designs for steel structures, ensuring compliance with codes and standards.• Detailing: Supervise the preparation of detailed structural drawings, including plans and specifications, ensuring accuracy and adherence to project requirements.• Quality Assurance: Implement quality control processes to guarantee the accuracy and integrity of structural designs and drawings.• Team Leadership: Lead a team of engineers and drafters, providing guidance and technical support to ensure project goals are met.• Collaboration: Coordinate with architects, contractors, and other stakeholders to integrate structural requirements into overall project plans.Code Compliance: Stay current with industry standards and codes, ensuring all designs and detailing meet regulatory requirements.• Innovation: Explore and implement innovative solutions in structural design and detailing to enhance project efficiency and cost-effectiveness.• Project Management: Oversee project timelines, budgets, and resources, ensuring successful completion of steel construction projects.• Problem-solving: Address and resolve technical issues and challenges encountered during the design and detailing phases.• Communication: Effectively communicate complex engineering concepts to non-technical stakeholders and collaborate with interdisciplinary teams.• Continuous Improvement: Identify opportunities for process improvement and professional development within the structural engineering team.• Perform other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor’s degree in civil engineering or equivalent• At least 5+ years in steel structural design and detailing.• Skills: Proficient in Tekla, ETABS, or SAP2000, and CAD tools like AutoCAD or Revit.• Leadership: Proven leadership skills, guiding engineering teams effectively.• Skill in time management, problem-solving, analyzing, communication and teamwork• Good command of English.Competitive offer:• Annual Salary Increment• Annual Performance Bonus• Learning and Development• Lunch • Coffee• Forte Private Insurance (Life + HNS)• Working Accident and Health care Insurance (NSSF)• Company Events• Uniforms• Other terms and conditions follow to Company’s internal policy.Notice: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview.
Company Profile:
Founded under the principle of innovation, FUXIN is Cambodia's first pre-engineered steel buildings manufacturer for industrial application, commercial and retail outlets, storage, logistics, sports and leisure structures.

We thrive to be leader in supplying steel building solutions that are more superior in quality, more cost efficient, more time-saving and environmentally sustainable.

A member of ISI GROUP, FUXIN builds upon extensive experience and expertise of the Group in the area of manufacturing and industrial development. Today we have completed over 450 projects including some of the country’s most well-known projects Aeon Mall Sen Sok Parking Structure, and International Exhibition Hall.

Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

Job Description:
Job Purpose
Provide an unforgettable service to our every customer and close the sale deal as the same time.

** Responsibilities
* Customer service
▪ Welcome and ensure customer care while respecting local tradition. 
▪ Provide excellent customer experiences and guest journey activities. 
▪ Provide a courteous, professional, efficient and flexible service at all times, following the Thaanjaya Standards of Performance.

* Sales 
▪ Advise customers on product needs, prices and payment terms.
▪ Solicit new customers and maintain positive business relationships to ensure future sales.
▪ Achieve agreed upon sales targets and outcomes within schedule.
▪ Coordinate sales effort with team members and other departments.
▪ Prepare report for the management like sales, customer lead generation and customer complaints.
Job Requirement: ▪ Willing to be trained with sales and customer service skills.▪ Outstanding customer service abilities.▪ Pleasant appearance.▪ Excellent formal verbal communication and negotiation skills.▪ Ability to take initiative, meet deadlines and commitments and complete tasks as required. ▪ Maintain a high level of project knowledge and be able to answer in every question with confidence. ▪ Problem solving skill ▪ Presentation skill ▪ Fluent written, spoken and read in both Khmer and English. ▪ Required Khmer candidate only. ▪ Minimum 2 years working experience. ▪ Age between 28 – 37 years old ▪ Minimum Bachelor degree* Benefits▪ Sales commission▪ 18 days annual leave▪ Public holidays (follow company’s calendar)▪ Accident insurance (After passed probation)▪ Free transportation from Head office to Sales Gallery (By company’s car)▪ Sales and customer service training▪ Uniform- HQ : Norodom Blvd, Tonle Bassac, Chamkarmorn- Work Location : Road 6, Preak Leap, Chroy ChangvarTransportation will be provided from HQ to work location.

Job Description: This position is accountable for the management of warehouse’s operation, Inventory Control and staff for our construction projects. Within the Operations department, he will work closely with the construction and Procurement departments to coordinate the safe receipt, storage, inventory preparation, retrieval, and timely dispatch of goods. This position will report directly to the Project Manager and Accounting Manager.Warehouse organization & process• Define, implement or improve warehouse processes, procedures, policies and forms for the company consistent with Quality standards• Prepare and manage a yearly budget for the department while ensuring objectives are met• Work closely and support Planning team, Construction team, Site Admin, Project Manager, and Procurement Team to avoid any negative variances or delay on projects• Participate to the definition and implementation of warehouse organization for any new projects• Continuously improve warehouse organization, tools and documentation• Coordinate warehouse team and monitor their performance and progress• Train and inform company’s employees on warehouse procedures and policies• Ensure quality, security, cleanliness and safety of the warehouse environment• Report to the management on Warehouse activities on a weekly basis• Alert management and other departments on any operational issues and propose solutions as much as possibleWarehouse operations• Plan the arrangement of goods within the warehouse and organize special requirements for certain stock, such fragile products• Oversee picking, packing and distribution activity for consumables, tools and equipment• Check stock availability for project request, and confirm quantity to order if needed• Ensure stock inward process with documentation.• Monitor variance between actual and planned stock.• Arrange periodical stock check with aging analysis.• Monitor and update the stock through ERP system.• Guarantee the good match between computed stock and physical ones.• Interfere with other departments for broken and lost equipment to find the right solution for the company• Keep stock control systems up to date and plan future capacity requirements• Guarantee that the returned tools and equipment are in good shape and ready to be used
Job Requirement: • 3 years’ experience in warehouse management (experienced with construction/ property developer company is a plus)• University degree in Management, Accounting, Business Administration or related field• Computer knowledge of MS Office, Excel good skills mandatory• Good command of English• Excellent communication skills and ability to communicate with other departments, subcontractors, suppliers.• Able to work under pressure, flexible and honestly• Be rigorous and flexible, dynamic, confident and self-motivated• Voluntary, proposal oriented and Analysis skills• Skillful in stock control such as planning, organizing and record keeping

Job Description:
Senior Payable Officer is mainly responsible for managing AP team and overseeing the oversea and local payables
to suppliers and make sure the payables are paid within due dates and proper supporting documents. Moreover,
it is important to make sure daily petty cash and cash balance is sufficient for operation and reconciled to daily
transactions. Reporting to line supervisor and management is strongly required for this position.
• Review aged payable report and to ensure accuracy and completeness
• Manage and arrangement payment to supplier both oversea and local accordance to the terms following
the company’s policies
• Prepare AP invoices on local expenses and outgoing payments in the system accordance to purchase
document cycle and cheque issuance.
• Monitoring staff advance balance and transaction to ensure that all incurred transactions is recording in
timely basis and following up to the in-charge person for clearance accordance with the company’s
policies
• Prepare daily payment and bank balance report
• Petty cash balance monitoring and arranging daily transaction and report
• Perform monthly bank reconciliations
• Deal with suppliers and banks for related payment matters.
• AP invoice documentation for tax declaration purpose to tax’s sections
• Regular contact with concerned departments or/and suppliers (if any) to ensure payments of outstanding
invoices are within due date.
• Other assignments from managements
Job Requirement:
• University graduated, major in accounting and finance is preferred
• Minimum of 2 years’ working experiences in related field
• Prior experience with SAP Business One is preferred
• Advanced in Ms. Excel is preferred
• Good analytical and logical reasoning skills
• Ability to work under pressure
• Good presentation, written communications, and report-writing skills in English and Khmer
• Good interpersonal skills

Job Description:
Officer, Warranty is to manage our warranty claims. In this role, you will discuss the
order and expectations with the customer, prepare warranty documents, submit paperwork to
the manufacturer, and track requests to ensure the dealership is paid for all warranty work done.
If a claim is denied, you will resubmit and follow up to try to move the claim forward for approval.
You will also be responsible for scheduling warranty appointments, coordinating with vendors
for replacement parts, and keep up-to-date on factory recalls and announcements.
- Discuss the warranty claim and expectations with customers
- Prepare and process warranty documentation according to manufacturer guidelines
- Submit claims quickly and efficiently
- Follow up with manufacturers to ensure claims are being processed properly
- Adjust and resubmit any denied claims to secure payment for warranty work
- Keep accurate inventory of ordered warranty parts and organize vendor paperwork
Other tasks assigned by Superior
Job Requirement:
- No required experience
- Must have Bachelor/Associate degree in Automotive Engineer or equivalent.
- Competence to build effectively manage interpersonal - -- --- relationship at all levels in the
company
- Able to be trusted with confidential information
- Good logic thoughts, high sense of responsibility, - -- ----- proactive, well-organized and mature
- Knowledge of cross-cultural communication
High Self-motivation
** Personality Requirement
- Be honest, trustworthy and support team
- Strong in interpersonal and communication skill
- Willing to learn and has strong commitment
- Be flexible and be able to work under pressure

and inventories

Superior computer skills: Microsoft Word, Excel and Outlook

Self-motivated

Job Description:
• Reconciling accounts with the general ledger.
• Work with the accounting system to ensure transactions are properly and timely recorded
• Collaborating with internal departments to gather, analyze, and interpret relevant financial information
• Entering financial data such as accruals, deferrals, reclassifications, and interdepartmental entries into the ledger every month, as well as preparing reports.
• Performing account analysis to ensure that journal entries and balances are correct.
• Monitoring and analyzing accounting data and producing financial reports or statements
• Oversee the monthly / Annually financial statements
• Performing review of financial data to assure its accuracy and truthfulness.
• Ensuring that financial information complies with professional and regulatory standards.
• Ensure all financial accounting & finance workflow are done correctly
• Ensure business confidentiality to be respected
• Assists in overseeing tax compliance, filings, and suggest strategies to improve the organization's tax position.
• Other tasks will be assigned by the Top Manager.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s degree accounting, Finance, related field.
• Minimum 5 of progressive accounting experience, preferably a multinational environment.
• Strong knowledge of accounting, finances and taxation
• Good in computer Microsoft application and accounting software (QuickBooks preferable)
• Excellent analytical problem-solving skills.
• Effective communication interpersonal skills.
• Ability work independently collaboratively a fast-paced environment.
• Confidentiality, good interpersonal, communication, safety awareness, and teamwork.
• Protects organization’s value by keeping information confidential.
• Good English

Job Description:
• Monitor instructional and managerial processes to ensure that program activities are related to program outcomes and use findings to take corrective actions.
• Regularly consult the campus-level committee about planning, operation, supervision, and evaluation of campus education program. Include students and community representatives when appropriate.
• Provide instructional resources and materials to support teaching staff in accomplishing instructional goals.
• Provide for two-way communication with superintendent, staff, students, parents, and community.
• Communicate and promote expectations for high-level performance to staff and students. Recognize excellence and achievement.
• Ensure the effective and quick resolution of conflicts.
• Build common vision for school improvement with staff. Direct planning activities and put programs in place with staff to ensure attainment of school’s mission.
• Identify, analyze, and apply research findings (e.g., effective school correlates) to promote school improvement.
• Develop and set annual campus performance objectives for each of the Academic Excellence Indicators using the campus planning process and site-based decision-making committee.
• Develop, maintain, and use information systems and records necessary to show campus progress on performance objectives addressing each Academic Excellence Indicator.
Job Requirement:
• Master’s/Bachelor’s in Education or related fields.
• Special Knowledge/Skills:
• Strong understanding in Academic Skill
• Working knowledge of curriculum and instruction.
• Ability to evaluate instructional program and teaching effectiveness.
• Ability to manage budget and personnel Ability to coordinate campus functions.
• Ability to implement policy and procedures Ability to interpret data.
• Strong organizational, communication, public relations, and interpersonal skills.
• Experience:
• At least three years’ experiences in campus management.

- ត្រូវមានការបត់បែនតាមការងារជាក់ស្តែង

- មានភាពវៃឆ្លាតក្នុងការរៀបចំ និងមានជំនាញក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងពេលវេលា
- ត្រូវមានការយល់ដឹងអំពីច្បាប់ចរាចរណ៍ផ្លូវគោក

2)	Planning, organizing, and controlling the activities and actions of the HR department. 
3)	Develop and implement strategies, goals, and policies for the HR/Admin department ensuring they support the overall company-wide objectives and goals.
4)	Coordinate the onboarding and orientation of new employees ensuring the Hiring Manager has the necessary information to provide the best introduction for all new employees.
5)	Manage and coordinate the performance development process and develop supportive procedures for the provision of relevant and useful feedback between Managers and employees and the broader team.
6)	Recommending new policies, approaches, and procedures
7)	Perform other administrative tasks such as payroll, staff attendance, staff disciplinary action, staff appraisal, Staff movement, staff safety and fine out staff problems.
8)	Develop contract, agreement and others necessary document
9)	Make monthly expense budget and record all expense incurred
10)	Motivate and train staff, Issue warning letter,
11)	Manage Security, Office Hygiene, and safety
12)	Prepare report for management (monthly Employee Master List, Monthly Attendance Report, Monthly Department Expense, Daily Weekly Monthly Recruitment Report, Test Ride List Movement, Laptop & Computer List Movement, Leave management list, and yearly staff turnover).
13)	Other tasks assigned by BOD
Job Requirement:
1)	Bachelor Degree in Business Administration 
2)	6 years’ experience in HR field
3)	Excellent verbal and written communication skills both English and Khmer
4)	Excellent interpersonal, negotiation, and conflict resolution skills.
5)	Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.
6)	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
7)	Ability to prioritize tasks and to delegate them when appropriate.
8)	Ability to act with integrity, professionalism, and confidentiality.

Job Description:
- ចុះទៅតាមតំបន់គោលដៅដែលថ្នាក់លើបានចាត់ចែង
- ចុះ​ផ្សព្វផ្សាយ​អំពី​ផលិតផលដើម្បើជម្រុញការលក់
- ព្យាយាម​​​សម្រេច​​​គោលដៅ​តាមផែនការថ្នាក់លើបានកំណត់
- ធ្វើការ​កត់ត្រា និង​តាមដាន​អតិថិជន​របស់​ខ្លួន 
ហើយរាយការណ៏ជូនប្រធានក្រុមរាល់ថ្ងៃ
- ចេះរក្សាទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយអតិថិជន​
- មានគំនិតថ្មីៗ និងចេះអភិវឍ្ឃន៏ខ្លួន
- ចេះធ្វើការជាក្រុម និងស្រលាញ់ក្រុមការងារ
- ស្មោះត្រង់ គោរពម៉ោងការ និងតស៊ូជាមួយការងារ
Job Requirement:
- មិន​មាន​បទពិសោធន៍​ក៏បាន
- ចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២
- ចេះ​ភាសាអង់គ្លេសបន្តិចបន្តួច
- មាន​ម៉ូតូ​ផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន
- មានភាព​ស្នោះត្រង់
- មាន​ការទំនាក់ទំនង់​និង​ការ​ប្រាស្រ្រ័យ​ទាក់ទងល្អ
- មាន​ភាព​អំណត់​ចំពោះការងារ
- មានប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភថ្លៃសាំង​ ​កាតទូរស័ព្ទ និងប្រាក់​លើក​ទឹកចិត្តពី​ការ​លក់ 

* Salary Range:  200$ - 300$
- Location     : Phnom Penh  4 Pax

               : Kratie     2 Pax
               : Poipet    2 Pax
               : Preah Sihaouk   2 Pax 
               : Banteay Meanchey

Company Profile:
Established in 2021, Mango Finance PLC is a digital microfinance startup based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, capitalized by an investment from Vipar Auto FZCO, Dubai. With direct access to over 100,000 customers, we are capturing the opportunity to lend digitally and securely.

Mango Finance PLC intends to transform the microfinance landscape in Cambodia by leveraging the powers of technology and data. We believe in improving access to capital for the unbanked in Cambodia, with our proprietary credit scoring engine.

Mango Finance PLC is a licensed Microfinance Institution, regulated by the National Bank of Cambodia. Please visit www.mangofinance.net for more information.

Job Description: i) តួនាទីដែរត្រូវធ្វើ1) ស្វែងរកប្រភពថ្មីៗពីទីផ្សារសម្រាប់ប្រាក់កម្ចីទិញម៉ូតូនិងផលិតផលផ្សេងទៀត។2) ត្រូវជួបជាមួយម្ចាស់ហាងម៉ូតូជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃដើម្បីពិភាក្សា ផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផលប្រាក់កម្ចី។ ជំរុញការលក់ផលិតផលតាមរយះការបង់រំលោះ3) ពិភាក្សាអំពីផលិតផល....លក្ខណៈពិសេសនៃប្រាក់កម្ចីជាមួយអតិថិជន ព្រមទាំងផ្តល់គំនិត សំរាប់ពួកគាត់អំពីអត្ថប្រយោជន៍នៃប្រាក់កម្ចីពីក្រុមហ៊ុនរបស់យើងនិងលក់រាល់ផលិតផលបង់រំលោះរបស់យើង។4) ទាក់ទងទៅអតិថិជននិងពិភាក្សាដើម្បីស្វែងយល់ពីអំពីប្រាក់ចំណូល ៕ ត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលឯកសារប្រាក់ចំនូលជាក់ស្តែង ហើយប្រាកដថាឯកសារទាំងអស់ពិតប្រាកដនិងត្រឹមត្រូវ។5) គ្រប់ឯកសារប្រាក់កម្ចីទាំងអស់ត្រូវបំពេញពាក្យស្នើសុំ រួចបញ្ចូនទៅប្រធានមន្រ្តីឥណទាន។ មន្រ្តីឥណទានត្រូវតែប្រាកដនិងធានាថាគ្រប់ព័ត៌មានទិន្នន័យដែរបានបញ្ចូនទៅនោះគឺគ្រប់គ្រាន់ពេញលេញ។6) ត្រូវតាមដានឯកសារ និង តាមដានពាក្យស្នើសុំកម្ចីនេះបានទទួលការយល់ព្រមឬបដិសេធពីប្រធាន។7) ត្រូវចុះពិនិត្យមើលផ្ទះនិងទីកន្លែងអាជីវកម្ម/ ហាង ព្រមទាំង យកឯកសារប្រាក់ចំណូល។8) ត្រូវបំពេញរាល់ឯកសារទាំងអស់ដោយផ្នែកតាមបញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យ។9) រៀបចំឯកសារសម្រាប់ដំណើរអនុញ្ញាតការផ្តល់កម្ចីនេះ។10) ចូលរួមក្នុងការបង្កើតនូវទំរងនៃប្រាក់កម្ចី ហើយនិង ដំណើរការនីតិវិធីផ្សេងៗទៀតដែរពាក់ព័ន្ធ។11) រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ហើយផ្ញើទៅអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់
Job Requirement: ** គុណវុឌ្ឍិរបស់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន:1- ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងទូទៅ និងមានអទិភាពសម្រាប់និស្សិតថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រគ្រប់ជំនាញ2- ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍ 1ឆ្នាំ លើការងារឥណទាន 3- មានចំណេះដឹងដូចជា៖ លេខនព្វន្ត និងការកត់ត្រាឱ្យមានភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ ភាសាអង់គ្លេស ដែលអាចអានស្តាប់ និងសរសេរបានខ្លះៗ4- មានប្រវត្តិ និងអត្តចរិតល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ សុភាពរាបសារ មានសុជីវធម៌ល្អ និងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការធ្វើការងារជាមួយប្រជាជនក្រីក្រនៅតាមសហគមន៍5- មានប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អ ចូលចិត្តធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម ជាមនុស្សឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និងមានការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ចំពោះការងារ(  ​ខេត្ត្ដកំពង់សោម ខេត្តសៀម និង បន្ទាយមានជ័យ) ២៥០ ដុល្លារ
Company Profile:
Established in 2021, Mango Finance PLC is a digital microfinance startup based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, capitalized by an investment from Vipar Auto FZCO, Dubai. With direct access to over 100,000 customers, we are capturing the opportunity to lend digitally and securely.

Mango Finance PLC intends to transform the microfinance landscape in Cambodia by leveraging the powers of technology and data. We believe in improving access to capital for the unbanked in Cambodia, with our proprietary credit scoring engine.

Mango Finance PLC is a licensed Microfinance Institution, regulated by the National Bank of Cambodia. Please visit www.mangofinance.net for more information.
Contact Info: Contact Information Set Punleu HR Manager 069777629 recruitment.specialist@mangofinance.net Phnom Penh Street Samdach Cheasim,Phum Chres, Sangkat Kouk Khleang, Khan Sens Sok, Phnom Penh. 069777629

Job Description:
- Manage recruitment to ensure that on time with efficiency as per business required
- Planning, organizing, and controlling the activities and actions of the HR department. 
- Develop and implement strategies, goals, and policies for the HR/Admin department ensuring they support the overall company-wide objectives and goals.
- Coordinate the onboarding and orientation of new employees ensuring the Hiring Manager has the necessary information to provide the best introduction for all new employees.
- Manage and coordinate the performance development process and develop supportive procedures for the provision of relevant and useful feedback between Managers and employees and the broader team.
- Recommending new policies, approaches, and procedures
- Perform other administrative tasks such as payroll, staff attendance, staff disciplinary action, staff appraisal, Staff movement, staff safety and fine out staff problems.
- Develop contract, agreement and others necessary document
- Make monthly expense budget and record all expense incurred
- Motivate and train staff, Issue warning letter,
- Manage Security, Office Hygiene, and safety
- Prepare report for management (monthly Employee Master List, Monthly Attendance Report, Monthly Department Expense, Daily Weekly Monthly Recruitment Report, Test Ride List Movement, Laptop & Computer List Movement, Leave management list, and yearly staff turnover).
- Other tasks assigned by BOD
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in Business Administration 
- 6 years’ experience in HR field
- Excellent verbal and written communication skills both English and Khmer
- Excellent interpersonal, negotiation, and conflict resolution skills.
- Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Ability to prioritize tasks and to delegate them when appropriate.
- Ability to act with integrity, professionalism, and confidentiality.

Job Description: A vehicle plate processing and ownership transfer officer is a position that involves handling the administrative and legal aspects of transferring the ownership of vehicles between individuals or entities. A vehicle plate processing and ownership transfer officer may be responsible for:•	Processing the applications and documents for vehicle plate ownership transfer, such as the registration certificate, the insurance policy, the pass report, and the identity proof of both parties•	Verifying the eligibility and authenticity of the applicants and the vehicles, such as the payment of traffic fines, the validity of the insurance, the condition of the vehicle, and the absence of any outstanding loans or disputes•	Collecting the fees and charges for the vehicle plate ownership transfer, such as the service fee, the valuation fee, and the plate fee•	Issuing the new vehicle plate and registration certificate to the new owner, and updating the records in the system•	Providing guidance and assistance to the applicants and answering their queries
Job Requirement: •	A high school diploma or equivalent•	A valid driver’s license and a clean driving record•	Knowledge of the rules and regulations related to vehicle plate ownership transfer in the relevant jurisdiction•	Proficiency in using the computer and the software applications related to vehicle plate ownership transfer•	Good communication and customer service skills•	Attention to detail and accuracy•	Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines•	Wiling to travel and can drive Tuk Tuk•	Know how to use use google form/ Microsoft 365

Job Description: •	Organize and maintain support documents and loan files.•	Coordinate with the team working on the field using GPS technology to track their locations, monitor their progress, and help give the technical assistance as needed.•	Compile data and prepare collection reports, ensuring that they are complete and informative.•	Maintain and update databases and systems related to the collection department, ensuring data integrity and security.•	Collaborate with other departments, such as operation department, and Finance, to obtain necessary information and documentation for the collection process.•	Support in repossession activities and reselling the repossessed units.•	Assist in resolving customer inquiries and complaints related to collection activities in a timely and professional manner.
Job Requirement: •	2+ years of experience in administrative support roles, preferably in a collection or financial services department.•	Excellent organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.•	Know how to handle GPS and other supporting technical/technological support. •	Strong facilitation skill, with the ability to effectively communicate with team members and clients.•	Knowledge of collection techniques and principles, including legal and regulatory requirements.•	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and other relevant software applications.•	High level of integrity and professionalism when handling sensitive and confidential information.

Job Description: Invoicing: Generate and send out invoices to customers promptly, ensuring accuracy and completeness of billing information.Payment Tracking: Monitor incoming payments and reconcile them with invoices. Keep accurate records of all transactions.Debt Collection: Follow up with customers on overdue accounts through phone calls, emails, or letters. Negotiate payment plans and resolve any billing issues or disputes.Account Reconciliation: Regularly reconcile accounts receivable ledger to ensure that all payments are accounted for and properly posted.Reporting: Prepare and analyze aging reports, cash flow statements, and other financial reports related to accounts receivable. Provide regular updates to management on the status of outstanding accounts.Customer Service: Respond to customer inquiries regarding billing issues, payment methods, and account statements in a timely and professional manner.
Job Requirement: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field.Proven experience as an Accounts Receivable Officer or similar role, with a strong understanding of accounts receivable principles and practices.Proficiency in accounting software and Microsoft Excel, with the ability to work with large datasets and perform complex reconciliations.Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with a keen attention to detail and a commitment to quality and accuracy.Strong communication and interpersonal abilities, with the capability to interact professionally with customers and internal stakeholders.Ability to prioritize tasks, manage multiple deadlines, and work effectively in a fast-paced environment.

Company Profile:
Borey Peng Huoth was founded in 2005 and becomes one of the most prominent Property Development companies in Cambodia today. Job Description: 1. Scope of Working:Learning and Development Manager  will be responsible for designing, implementing, and overseeing various learning and development programs to enhance employee skills, knowledge, and performance.2. Duties & Responsibilities:•	Develop and implement a comprehensive learning and development strategy aligned with the organization's goals and objectives.•	Design, deliver, and evaluate a range of learning initiatives, including workshops, e-learning modules, on-the-job training, and leadership development programs.•	To develop high-quality learning materials, including training manuals, presentations, videos, and other multimedia resources.•	Oversee the selection, implementation, and maintenance of learning management systems and other learning technologies.•	Deliver innovative and provide learning solutions, track learner progress, and measure the impact of training initiatives.•	Analyze data and feedback to identify areas for improvement and make recommendations for future learning initiatives.•	Collaborate with department managers to understand learning needs and priorities.
Job Requirement: 3. Qualification & Requirement:•	Master or bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Management or related major •	5 years’ experience in HR management•	Strong understanding of adult learning principles, instructional design methodologies, and learning technologies.•	Analytical mindset with the ability to collect, analyze, and interpret data to drive decision-making and measure learning effectiveness.•	Certification in instructional design, training facilitation, or related field is a plus.•	Communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage and influence stakeholders at all levels of the organization.•	Excellent project management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks, manage deadlines, and adapt to changing priorities.•	Fluent in written and spoken English.4. Working Days and Hours:•	Monday to Half-Saturday: 	8:00am to 12:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm•	Lunch time: 12:00pm to 1:00pm5. Workplace:L&D Manager is based at Head Office of Borey Peng Huoth, Human Resource department.6. Relationship:L&D Manager works under & report directly to Senior HR Manager.

Job Description: 1. UI Component Design: Design and implement user interface components by collaborating with the development team to translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code.2. Development of Reusable Components: Build reusable React.js components and front-end libraries for future use, ensuring efficiency and scalability.3. Performance Optimization: Optimize the performance of components across a broad range of web-capable devices and browsers to ensure a smooth user experience.4. Collaborative Development: Work closely with testers, designers, web developers, and project managers to develop robust and practical applications.5. Scalable Code: Write scalable, maintainable code and maintain documentation for the frontend, supporting ongoing development and future enhancements.
Job Requirement: 1. Educational Background: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.2. Professional Experience: Proven experience as a React.js Developer.3. In-depth knowledge of JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and front-end languages.4. Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools such as Webpack, Enzyme, Redux, and Flux.5. Experience with user interface design and development.6. Communication: Excellent command of English, both verbal and written.

សាកលវិទ្យាល័យវិទ្យាសាស្រ្តសុខាភិបាល គឺជាសាកលវិទ្យាល័យបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិស័យសុខាភិបាល ដែលមានវ័យចំណាស់ ជាងគេបំផុត នៅក្នុងព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា។ សាកលវិទ្យាល័យវិទ្យាសាស្រ្តសុខាភិបាល ត្រូវការជ្រើសរើសគ្រូបង្រៀនទ្រឹស្ដី និងណែនាំអនុវត្តត្រាប់ ចំនួន ០២រូប លើមុខវិជ្ជា Complex conditions និងមុខវិជ្ជា Decision making in complex and Community PT នៅសាលាបច្ចេកទេសថែទាំវេជ្ជសាស្រ្ត នៃសាកលវិទ្យាល័យវិទ្យាសាស្រ្តសុខាភិបាល ដែលមានភារកិច្ច និង គុណវុឌ្ឍិ ដូចខាងក្រោម៖
-	ចូលរួមរៀបចំ និងធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព គម្រោងមេរៀនប្រកប ដោយគុណភាព និងស្របតាមសម្ថភាពគោល
-	បង្រៀនទ្រឹស្តី និងអនុវត្តត្រាប់
-	រៀបចំការតាក់តែងការបង្រៀន តាមការណែនាំរបស់ ស.វ.ស
-	ចូលរួមក្នុងការវាយតម្លៃចំណេះដឹងនិស្សិត លើមុខវិជ្ជាដែលបានបង្រៀន
-	ចូលរួមក្នុងការវាយតម្លៃចំណេះដឹងនិស្សិត នៅកន្លែងចុះកម្មសិក្សាគ្លីនិក
-	ដឹកនាំការពិភាក្សា និងការស្រាវជ្រាវឯកសារថ្មីៗ ទាក់ទងនឹងមេរៀនដល់និស្សិត
-	បង្រៀនមុខវិជ្ជាខាងលើតាមបែបអន្តរកម្ម ប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព ទៀងទាត់តាមពេលវេលា និងតម្លាភាព
-	ចូលរួមធ្វើផែនការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល អនុវត្តបង្ហាញត្រាប់ប្រកបដោយគុណភាព និងមានលក្ខណៈគរុកោសល្យ
-	ចូលរួមតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ ស.ប.ថ.វ និង ស.វ.ស។
Job Requirement:
-	មានសញ្ញាបត្រ កម្រិតបរិញ្ញាបត្រព្យាបាលដោយចលនា ឬខ្ពស់ជាង ដែលមានបទពិសោធន៍លើជំនាញព្យាបាលដោយចលនា
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍ជំនាញវិជ្ជាជីវៈ ផែ្នកព្យាបាលដោយចលនា យ៉ាងតិចចំនួន១ឆ្នាំ នៅមន្ទីរពេទ្យ វិទ្យាស្ថាន មជ្ឈមណ្ឌលស្ដារលទ្ធភាពពលកម្ម គ្លីនិកឯកជន និងគ្រឹះស្ថានសុខាភិបាល ដទៃទៀត ដែលទទួលស្ដាល់ដោយក្រសួងសុខាភិបាល
-	មានក្រមសីលធម៌រស់នៅល្អ ថ្លៃថ្នូរ ស្លូតបូត គោរពគ្នាទៅវិញទៅមក និងគោរពវិន័យ ស.វ.ស បានល្អ
-	មានស្មារតីធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម និងមានអំណត់អត់ធន់ 
-	មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស សម្រាប់បំពេញការងារស្របតាមភារកិច្ច នៃគ្រូបង្រៀន បង្ហាត់នៃមុខវិជ្ជា ដែលត្រូវជ្រើសរើស
-	ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធី Word, Excel, PowerPoint, WatApp, Email, Internet, Zoom, Google meet ។
Company Profile: សាកលវិទ្យាល័យវិទ្យាសាស្រ្តសុខាភិបាល គឺជាសាកលវិទ្យាល័យបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិស័យសុខាភិបាល ដែលមានវ័យចំណាស់ជាងគេបំផុត នៅក្នុងព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា។
Contact Info: Contact Information HR UHS  011549179 chakriya_kem99@uhs.edu.kh ឡូតិ៍លេខ៧៣ មហាវិថីព្រះមុនីវង្ស សង្កាត់ស្រះចក ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ 011549179

job title: ផ្នែកសិក្សា មហាវិទ្យាល័យទន្តវទនសាស្រ្ត (270$/1month)
position: ផ្នែកសិក្សា មហាវិទ្យាល័យទន្តវទនសាស្រ្ត (270$/1month)
Job Description:
សាកលវិទ្យាល័យវិទ្យាសាស្រ្តសុខាភិបាល គឺជាសាកលវិទ្យាល័យបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិស័យសុខាភិបាល ដែលមានវ័យចំណាស់ជាងគេបំផុត នៅក្នុងព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា។ សាកលវិទ្យាល័យវិទ្យាសាស្រ្តសុខាភិបាល ត្រូវការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក ចំនួន ០១រូប៖ ឲ្យចូលបម្រើការងារ នៅការិយាល័យ សិក្សាបណ្តុះបណ្តាល ផ្នែកសិក្សា មហាវិទ្យាល័យទន្តវទនសាស្រ្ត នៃសាកលវិទ្យាល័យវិទ្យាសាស្រ្តសុខាភិបាល ដែលត្រូវមានភារកិច្ច និង គុណវុឌ្ឍិដូចខាងក្រោម៖
-	បញ្ចូលទិន្នន័យពិន្ទុរបស់និស្សិត តាមការណែនាំរបស់ប្រធានការិយាល័យសិក្សាធិការ
-	រៀបចំព្រឹត្តិបត្រពិន្ទុ លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ការសិក្សា វិញ្ញាប័នប័ត្រ សញ្ញាប័ត្ររបស់និស្សិត
-	ធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពបញ្ជីឈ្មោះនិស្សិត និងស្ថិតិនិស្សិតគ្រប់ជំនាន់
-	ផ្សព្វផ្សាយឯកសារ និងផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានផ្សេងៗ តាមការណែនាំ របស់ប្រធានការិយាល័យសិក្សា
-	ជួយរៀបចំឯកសារសម្រាប់ការងារ IQA នៅការិយាល័យសិក្សាធិការ 
-	រៀបចំ និងរក្សាទុកឯកសារផ្សេងៗ ឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវតាមលក្ខខណ្ឌ និងគោលការណ៌របស់ ស.វ.ស	
-	ការងារផ្សេងៗ គោរពតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ ព្រឹទ្ធបុរស និង ការចាត់តាំងរបស់ ស.វ.ស ។
Job Requirement:
-	មានសញ្ញាបត្របរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬ សញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃប្រហាក់ប្រហែល
-	មានអាយុមិនលើសពី ៣៥ ឆ្នាំ 
-	មានចំណេះដឹងជំនាញ  Microsoft Office, Internet and Email 
-	មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកភាសាអង់គ្លេសអាទិភាព
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារផ្សេងៗ ទាក់ទងនឹងការងារបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលយ៉ាងតិច ០១ឆ្នាំ
-	មានសាមគ្គីភាព ស្មារតីទទួលខុសត្រូវការងារជាក្រុម 
-	មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងគោរពវិន័យ ស.វ.ស ឱ្យបានល្អ
-	មានការប្រាស័្រយទាក់ទងល្អ រួសរាយ រាក់ទាក់ ស្លូតបូត សុភាពរាបសារ និងសីលធម៌សង្គមល្អ
-	មានគំនិតផ្ដួចផ្ដើម និងមានភាពជាអ្នកដឹកនាំ។	
-	ទទួលបានការចាក់វ៉ាក់សាំងការពារជំងឺ Covid-19 តាមការណែនាំរបស់ក្រសួងសុខាភិបាល។
១-អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ដែលទទួលបាន៖
-	ឱកាសក្នុងការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលជំនាញបន្ត។
-	ទទួលបានប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភប្រចាំខែចាប់ពី ២៧០ដុល្លារ រួមនឹងផលប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗ ទៀតតាមការកំណត់ដោយ ស.វ.ស។
២- ព័ត៌មានលម្អិត៖
-	បេក្ខជនមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមទាញយកទម្រង់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារនៅលើវេបសាយ (www.uhs.edu.kh) ឬ តាមរយៈ Link: https://www.uhs.edu.kh/staff/index.php# និង សូមផ្ញើមកផ្នែកបុគ្គលិក នៃលេខាធិការដ្ឋាន ស.វ.ស តាមរយៈប្រព័ន្ធអេឡិចត្រូនិក (E-Mail) ៖ chakriya_kem99@uhs.edu.kh ឲ្យបានមុនថ្ងៃ.......................ខែ....... ឆ្នាំ....................ស័ក ព.ស ២៥....... ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី....... ខែ............. ឆ្នាំ២០២...... វេលាម៉ោង១៦:០០នាទី ជាកំហិត។

Company Profile: សាកលវិទ្យាល័យវិទ្យាសាស្រ្តសុខាភិបាល គឺជាសាកលវិទ្យាល័យបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិស័យសុខាភិបាល ដែលមានវ័យចំណាស់ជាងគេបំផុត នៅក្នុងព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា។

Job Description:
Key performance: 
- Lead Generation for each product/services
- Growth in overall product/services revenue
- Increase awareness & educate customers on MekongNet product & service offerings

• Responsible for all marketing programs supporting all MekongNet Services/Products (Local & International Connectivity, Data Centre & Hosting, SMS, Solutions and Products).
• As part of the Marketing team, you will work closely with various internal stakeholders including Sales, Solutions and Finance to develop and execute campaigns in accordance with company's strategic goals.
• Identify key target segments and develop lead generation programs to reach out and engage with appropriate products, services or solutions through the most appropriate communication channel or media.
• Develop and track marketing launch plans for both new and existing products/solutions, ensuring that each plan yields the desired ROI and achieve growth for Corporate Business.
• Work closely with Solutions Team to develop sales enablement materials, content or tools to ensure internal stakeholders are educated and trained on new product / solutions launches.
• Develop quality content and content calendar to engage key target audiences and stakeholders.
• Establish and own relationships with key product / solution partners for joint Go-To-Market programs.
• Conduct regular market industry research and analysis to ensure MekongNet product and services offerings are competitive in the market.
Job Requirement:
1. Education & Certification:
   • Bachelor Degree of Marketing, Business, or related field.

2. Experiences & Skills:
   • 3-5 years of experience in telecommunication field
   •Proven track record in executing product launches and lead generation programs
   • Good communications and able to drive marketing programmes independently and work well as a team player 
   • Experienced in driving both online and offline marketing campaigns, and events
   • Strong analytical skills and strong knowledge of market segmentation and market trends
   • Well-presented and attractive personality
   • Be open for travelling and field works
   • Good written and spoken English, Khmer or other languages: Chinese/Vietnamese/Thai is preferable

3. Attitude:
   • Focus and goal-orientated
   • Team player
   • Patient and can work under pressure

job title: Sr. Manager, Customer Service (Freight Forwarding & Logistics)
position: Sr. Manager, Customer Service (Freight Forwarding & Logistics)
Job Description:
Brief Description
This position reports functionally & administratively to the Group General Manager. He / She will be part of the logistics team that is responsible for account management of the global key accounts, supporting to GGM for achieving the global account financial budget and making sure of all
service level agreement and KPIs are meant.

Job Scope
• Managing Global Key Accounts with full financial budget accountabilities.
• Responsible for the selection and management of vendors to ensure qualities delivery.
• Able to motivate and groom subordinates for skills upgrade.
• Updating & negotiating rates with shipping companies, co-loaders, and customs brokers, trucking companies to compliment our business growth.
• Developing strong relationships with shipping lines and co-loaders
• Continuously communicating with all stakeholders and providing growth directions to develop new businesses.
• To lead in Requests for Proposal/Quotation as needed
• Ensuring on the safety, quality, customer service and all corporate compliances are observed.
• Ability to evaluate and manage project resources and making sure all KPIs are met.
Job Requirement:
• Diploma or Degree preferably in commerce, accounting, or logistics.
• Minimum 5 years or more experience in logistics and freight forwarding industry.
• Proficiency in English language is a must.
• Chinese language proficiency is a bonus.
• Problem solving and conflict resolution Skill.
• Good in utilizing Microsoft Office Suite - Outlook, Word & Excel.
• Willing to learn new things and can work with minimum supervision.
Company Profile: OV Logistics Cambodia, a member of the Phee Group of Companies, provides global freight forwarding and logistics services since 1993. Headquartered in Singapore, we have our own operations in the In-China region, and provide services to more than 200 countries and territories worldwide. Our Culture of ABC encourages our people to be Energetic, Fun-loving and Resourceful. Our employees and young leaders are Accountable, Evolving and Perseverance. Our people are Loyal, Passionate and Inspirational. We provide a healthy and conducive work place with career growth opportunity. If you are looking for an exciting and challenging career in the freight forwarding and logistics Industries we are the company for you. Find out more about the Phee Group of Companies by visiting us at: www.pheegroup.com
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  023 986 874/ 023 950 074 / 077 555 375/ 011 72 02 04 mom@ovlog.com #A-11 (Airway Complex), Russian Blvd, Sangkat Kakab, Khan Posenchay, Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia. 023 986 874/ 023 950 074 / 077 555 375/ 011 72 02 04

Job Description:
FaceLine Cambodia is specialized in providing the best results to satisfy your beauty and aesthetics need in ways that avoid harsh and potentially harmful effects of plastic surgery using non-invasive techniques.
Dermatology, to Cosmetics, and everything about skin care. Faceline only chooses leading industry experts, along with well tested premium cosmetic brands and advanced technological innovations to help our clients get their desired natural look.
Our goal is to help solve skin problems, avoid wrinkles, delay aging, fight acne, increase skin vitality, revitalize dull aged skin, erase blemishes, accelerate your natural skin regeneration, to give you that firm, soft and younger looking skin, as safe and as painless as possible.
Faceline is a beauty and aesthetic skin care clinic that would make you Look Younger Without Plastic Surgery.

position: Electrical Engineer (ជាងភ្លើង និង​ទឹក)
Job Description:
•​ ដំឡើង ជួសជុស ថែទាំ និងត្រួតពិនិត្យ ការប្តូរឧបករណ៍អគ្គីសនី ខ្សែភ្លើង ឲ្យស្របតាមបទដ្ឋានបច្ចេកទេសអគ្គីសនី ។
• ធ្វើតេស្តិ៍នូវឧបករណ៍អគ្គីសនីផ្សេងៗគ្នា ដើម្បីកំណត់នូវបញ្ហាមិនប្រក្រតីនៃអគ្គីសនី ។
• ផ្តល់ការគាំទ្រសម្រាប់ការត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងថែទាំប្រព័ន្ធទឹក អាងហែលទឹក ម៉ូទ័របូបទឹក ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ អំពូលភ្លើង ប្រព័ន្ធ   ផ្តល់សញ្ញាអាសន្ននៃអគ្គីសនី (Fire Alarms) និងប្រព័ន្ធអគ្គីសនីផ្សេងៗទៀត ដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ។
• ត្រូវធានាថា រាល់ប្រព័ន្ធបណ្តាញអគ្គីសនី និងប្រព័ន្ធទឹក ត្រូវបានអនុវត្តតាមស្តង់ដាសុវត្ថិភាព ។
• ត្រូវធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យជាប្រចាំនៃស្ថានភាពគុណភាពសម្ភារ និងឧបករណ៍ប្រព័ន្ធអគ្គីស និងទឹក នៃ អាគាររបស់ អាណាគ្រុប ដើម្បីធានាថា សម្ភារត្រូវបានការពារ និងថែទាំឲ្យបានល្អប្រសើរ ។
• ធានាថា រាល់ឧបករណ៍សម្ភារ ត្រូវបានថែទាំសំអាត និងទុកដាក់បានយ៉ាងល្អ ។
• ត្រូវបង្ហាញវត្តមាន ២៤ម៉/២៤ម៉ រាល់ពេលមានតម្រូវការពីក្រុមហ៊ុន ។
• បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗ តាមតម្រូវការចាំបាច់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ។
Job Requirement:
• តម្រូវការមានកំរិតវប្បធម៌ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ បរិញ្ញាបត្ររង និង វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈបច្ចេកទេសផ្នែកអគ្គិសនី
• មានបទពិសោធន៍ និងជំនាញផ្នែកអគ្គីសនី និងផ្នែកប្រព័ន្ធទឹក ២ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
• ចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកកុំព្យូទ័រដូចជាកម្មវិធី Word, Excel, Power Point និង Email
• ចេះអាន និង ចេះសរសេរ
• អាចធ្វើការទៅតាមពេលវាលា និងទីកន្លែងដែលបានចាត់តាំង
• មានការតាំងចិត្តខ្ពស់និងអាកប្បកិរិយាវិជ្ជមាន
• ស្មោះត្រង់, ខិតខំធ្វើការងារ, មានការទំនាក់ទំនងល្អនិងធ្វើការជាក្រុម
• ធ្វើការក្រោមគំនាប និងម៉ោងការងារអាចបត់បែន២៤ម៉/២៤ម៉ រាល់ពេលមានតម្រូវការពីក្រុមហ៊ុន
